story:
Short Summary

My sisterger calls me a "Jersey dirty softy who likes to cry to his own music and has a rough sense of humor". It's pretty accurate to be honest.

If you must know, I'm the love child of James Bay, Gregory Alan Isakov, John Mayer, Derek Trucks + maybe some more. At least I would really like to be.

Join me in this wild ride of recording my first ever debut album with grammy-nominated music veterans Maggie Rose and Bobby Holland at Starstruck Entertainment. Holy moly, can't believe I just wrote that out. It's a dream. If you google them, you're gonna be like "wait what? HOLY MOLY IS RIGHT!"

Anyway, I'm currently an independent artist so don't have a record label to fund this, and I spend all my time in my basement writing all these songs, so we need some help with that "m" word (money, I'm talkin bout money). So I'm here on Indiegogo asking you all to help with funding - aka be my record label! Let's make an album! please, help me pay for gas and food because this is my dream and it's finally actually coming true and I need your help. I love you thank you.

Where the money goes (hint: NOT beer)

Take a look on over to the right and you'll see a bunch o' boxes describing what you can get in exchange for sharing some dollar bills with us. I tried to make it fun, cause I'm a fun guy. Money will be going towards:

  • paying my producer, sound engineer, mixer, + amazing musicians who are going to do session work with me in the studio. Genius' don't come cheap y'all.
  • paying the studio for letting me sing in there.
  • paying for marketing so the album doesn't flop.
  • paying for travel and food so I can get to Nashville and hopefully not be too hungry while I'm in Nashville.
  • paying for a few music videos so people can stare at my face on a screen and hopefully sing along to songs they hopefully like.

The Impact

Indiegogo suggests that I let you know the impact funding this campaign is going to have. Well one, you're gonna make me feel like the luckiest guy in the world. I can't believe people believe in me enough to keep asking me for music. It's truly a gift. But also, I really just want people to FEEL. I want them to sit down, close their eyes and understand the world and themselves in a new way when they're done listening to this album. I want it to create some peace for a lot of people. If you can help me make that happen, that would be pretty freakin rad. It would also make my mom really happy she says.

Other Ways You Can Help

Honestly, just spam the crap out of people. Please share this far and wide. I promise you the music wont suck! I really hope it wont! If it does you can make me into a funny internet meme! Either way it'll be worth it!

Go ahead, don't be scared. Send this campaign to your mom and grandkids saying "delilah have you seen this kid dillan hardigan you should try and send him some mail and go on a date" and then Delilah will say "we're already dating grandma" and we'll all live happily ever after crying at Thanksgiving dinner while listening to my new album that you helped fund.

Cool, cool, I think that's everything - hope I did this right.

love you,

dyl

story:
Introduction

My name is Jeremy Joyce and I am a songwriter, guitarist, and full time working musician in New Orleans. I have been playing music for 25 years and writing songs for about 13. I've lived in Philadelphia, Brooklyn, Saint Louis and performed in each of these cities. I've also toured the country several times, sometimes as a solo musician, sometimes as a lead guitarist.

Every place I've lived and each place I've visited has influenced me musically. I'd played Punk, Metal, Country, Americana, and Rock. Out of all the places that I've lived it's New Orleans that has had the most profound impact musically, and it is here that I transitioned to a full time working musician.

At 16, in high school, I bought my first guitar with money I made working the late shift at a gas station. I didn't know what the notes were but I taught myself to play. Years later in New Orleans I would study the music of the city, learning Traditional Jazz, Blues, and Funk.

I had written a lot of songs before arriving in New Orleans, but something happened once I began to learn the city's music. The styles that I was studying became a part of my music.

Performing live I used the opportunity to try out the music I was writing. I found that I could play the songs I was writing for complete strangers and that they enjoyed them. If I played a song and no one seemed to like it, then I went back to the drawing board and re-examined that song.

It's a unique experience to try out a new song on an audience of strangers. For example one song "Come Back To New Orleans (to celebrate the Mardi Gras)" became a closing song for every gig that I played at BB King's during my residency there.

I am confident the in the quality of the songs because I been testing them night after night.

The Project

We will record an album of all original material.  I will be working with Grammy Nominated engineer and producer Mike Harvey. We've worked together on several projects including a Christmas Song and an EP of Jazz Ballads.

 

 
 

NOLA Recording Studios & Mike Harvey

Below is a selection of projects that Mike has worked on. His recent projects include : Shamarr Allen, Jonathan Long, South Jones, Wild Magnolias, and Hot 8 Brass Band.

 
 

 
We will record a lot of songs that I play with my rock band, but it's totally possible that as we are going through material, some of my jazz tunes may make an appearance. No matter what we end up doing this is going to be an entirely New Orleans album.
 

Why Contribute?

By contributing to my campaign funders will help me move my career forward and also contribute to the overall musical culture of New Orleans. With a new album I can work harder on marketing myself and book more work. I will be looking for bigger and better opportunities. Having an album that reflects the sound I have been creating is key for that. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Here's the nitty gritty!

Our Costs

I am setting a fairly low budget of $5,000. The breakdown is as follows.

  • Recording Costs - $3,000
  • CD Manufacturing Costs- $1,000
  • Promotion - $1,000

If we make above the goal, additional money will be put toward promotion.

I believe that we can make an excellent recording in a shorter time on a lower budget because we will be using great musicians, many of whom already know the material. Mike and I also have a successful track record of working together at his studio.

The main promotion focus will be digital in order to keep promotions costs low.

What I Deliver

Not only will we be producing Physical CDs, but there are tons of great other perks you can get such as Posters, Shirts, Stickers, Lyric Sheets, Custom Songs, and a House Concert!

Budget Concerns

If we don't make the full amount the following items are at risk Promotion, Physical CDs, and Recording Quality. As this if my first crowdfunded recording project I am taking a risk. No matter the amount we raise I will still make the record but may have to find creative ways to fund the key components. The release could also be delayed.

 

The Impact

The main impact of this project is to release great songs into the world. And by doing so I will also be moving my career forward. I currently work fulltime as a performing musician but don't have a physical album that represents my current sound. With this album I will be able to share the music with new fans and increase my income and share the music

Radio Success

Many of my songs have been played on American and International radio. "I'm Easy" regularly receives Satellite AirPlay. "Why Don't We Get Together on Christmas Eve" was played by all the New Orleans local radio stations. Recently "The Weight of the World" was played in Cape Town, South Africa. This kind of success tells me that the songs are strong. I believe that this new batch of songs will have similar radio success.

If You're in New Orleans

If you're in New Orleans, come out and see me play! I play regularly at clubs on Frenchmen Street with my band including at The Apple Barrel, Bamboula's, and 30x90.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk to the success of this project is funding, but I am personally committed to ensuring this project's success. As a self-starter and and independent musician I encounter challenges every day. It is my job to come up with the solutions. If we don't reach our funding goal it's possible the project could be delayed, but it will not be cancelled under any circumstances.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that's ok! Please tell your friends about the project and don't forget to use the IndieGoGo Sharing Tools to help spread the word.

story:
Amuse-Bouche:

Man Made Fire (Album Preview)

Man Made Fire (Music Video from the Album)

No No More (Music Video from the Album)

Qui est Petite Celine?

Petite Celine is a Franco-American indie singer-songwriter & multi-instrumentalist based out of Brooklyn, NY. Born to a French Air Force colonel and an American lawyer-gone-psychic-detective, Celine rebelled into the arts, excelling first in acting for film & TV, working with directors such as Steven Spielberg and Clint Eastwood by the age of 10, and picking up a handful of instruments along the way.

As a native New Yorker growing up between two countries, a very petite Celine noticed some pretty big differences in the music that got airplay internationally. French radio aired a diverse selection of music, featuring a wide variety of languages and cultures - exciting Celine, a multi-linguist herself - while US radio cemented her love for American Pop.

But it wasn't until college, when Celine found herself homeless with only a small suitcase and the guitar on her back, that she started performing her own compositions for complete strangers. Busking on the streets of Lower Manhattan, she discovered the power music has to bring people together from all walks of life.

Today, Petite Celine plays regularly across the Tristate area, where her LED paintings have also become accompaniment to the act. Her mission, a Petite World, is to celebrate cultures from around the globe and build bridges not borders. Petite Celine’s sound is fueled by fusion and uplifted by her love for Pop. This can be heard on her debut Folk album, Young Soldier, as well as in a wide variety of collaborations with American & French songwriters / producers. But most notably on the upcoming World Pop album, Man Made Fire, scheduled to release March 15th, 2019, which incorporates several languages and musical influences. 

Listen to the Young Soldier album

& 2 singles already released off the Man Made Fire album:

Apple Music 

Spotify 

YouTube 

What You're Contributing:

Man Made Fire is a project that I have been passionately working on for a little over 2 years, and I'm so excited for it to finally be out there in the wild! Though it may have taken me a little more time than I would've liked, I was able to coordinate and fund the entire production of the album myself. But now? I'm out of personal funds. And the problem is, the album came out so good that I think it deserves some attention and a decent shot! But that costs more money. So that's where you come in!

With your contributions I hope to achieve these things:

  • Pressing the CDs, showcasing the beautiful album photography by Dutch Doscher, and designed by Emily Claire Smith.
    • $770.97 for 300 eco-friendly CDs 
  • Shipping and handling costs to ship the CDs to radios, journalists, bloggers, networks, festivals, etc...
    • $775.00 to send 100 CDs
  • Merchandise, designed by the fabulous Emily Clare Smith, to sell stuff on tour and get people hyped! Also so I can thank you guys somehow!!
    • $57.92 for 1,000 stickers
    • $103.00 for 400 guitar picks
    • $108.00 for 500 temporary tattoos of the Petite World "flag," designed by Mitus Andronica. (500 is the minimum lol but the design was actually made by a tattoo artist!)
    • $72.14 for 500 Album Release Flyers, to display at coffee shops and hand out when I'll be at SXSW in March for the release.
    • $364.01 for 48 knit beanies with the Petite World flag
    • $243.40 for 15 canvas prints
  • PR campaign with Rock Paper Scissors, including submitting to festivals, getting the CD to radio stations (& actually having them listen), booking gigs & appearances, and outreaching to press, among other services.
    • $4,000.00 flat for the entire 3 month campaign.

What You're Receiving:

When you contribute, you get access some exclusive perks, and of course my undying gratitude. Depending on which perk you choose, you could get anything from a signed CD and guitar picks, to a Petite World beanie, tickets to the album release party, or an original painting!

Indeed, I'm also a painter (mostly impressionist & abstract) and I'm offering a lot of original works as perks (at a discounted price)! Many of them are part of my Electric Lynx collection (or my "Adult Night Light" collection, as I like to call it), which showed for Frieze Week at Superfine! Art Fair last year in NYC. It's a series of Acrylic & LED paintings that play with the transition from day to night. The idea was inspired by music actually, an art form which can only exist within the linear perception of time. But paintings tend to express a captured moment in time. By using several techniques and some light-boxing, I was able to create paintings that change with the passing of time. Feel free to check them out YouTube or on my Etsy page for a better look.

The Impact:

This is an important time for nuanced material created by women, and this project definitely reflects that, as it illustrates the triumphs and struggles of the independent woman. This is a dear album to me that represents a lot, not just personally but idealistically. A sort of One Love project, if you will. My favorite thing to witness is two people who couldn't appear to be any more different, singing or dancing along to the same exact song. I've seen it happen many times before. This album is tailored to that experience.

Musically the album is a manifestation of the fusion of several genres. From New York to Paris, folk to jazz, celtic to latin, with 5 languages and soulful backbone, the intention of my music is to embody reverence for those who have influenced me, reverence for diversity and the cultural context in which music genres have developed.

After taking a lengthy hiatus to record the album, I've actually only been back to playing shows with my new (and incredible) touring band for a year. Despite that, we're already making waves in the Greater New York City Area, especially with the material from this album. We play local venues regularly (1-3 shows a month) and already have residencies, we've been on the air several times, and are planning an east-coast tour. Plus releasing the album at SXSW this March! Obtaining the much-needed financial backing for the remaining costs will make all the difference in opening new opportunities, reaching new audiences, branching out, and playing new venues. And most importantly, giving this album a shot in the world. 

Risks & Challenges:

It's pretty well known that choosing the indie musician path is tough, and living in New York City presents its own unique challenges. So your support, even the tiniest donation, really does go a long way to saving an arm and a leg.

Despite the risks, I love writing and playing music and am dedicated to using every dollar you contribute toward making music for our Petite World community. And no matter what happens, the CD will be released!

Short on Cash? No Problem.

I totally understand that not everyone can contribute in a financial way. Maybe you're an artist in the same boat! Not to worry! You can still contribute a whole bunch to this campaign! Because everything is such a numbers game these days, one way you can really lend a hand is to follow, like, and SHARE! If you use Spotify, put Petite Celine in a playlist and share with friends!

Instagram

Facebook

Spotify

YouTube

Soundcloud

Share this campaign with your followers and friends on social media. 

Every bit of support helps!

story:
Short Summary

Hi lovers, Ralphy here! For those who don't know, here's a little about me. I'm an independent pop artist from Australia living in LA. For the past few years I've been performing and recording, releasing music with messages about things I strongly believe in. I've brought these messages of love to life with music videos and live shows comprised of elaborate handmade costumes and artistic visuals.  

This campaign is about taking my love of visual arts to the next level. With your contributions, you are helping bring these visions to life where we can all escape the realities of everyday life together, and live in a world of pop fantasy. 

What We Need & What You Get

For this project, the total cost comes to about $2,500. This will be for two full days of shooting. Price breakdown below:

  • Director / Editor = $1,200
  • Location Rental = $600 
  • Wardrobe & Makeup = $400 
  • Food while shooting on set = $150 
  • Transportation = $150 

In return for your contributions, depending how much you put in, you will get to see behind the scenes, first look before release, sneak previews, merch giveaways, and more. Contributors rewards below:

Lovers Engage ($20-$100): Behind the scenes photos & videos. Sneak previews. 

Lovers Elevate ($100-$200): Everything included in the previous reward, including preview of the song before release as well as a free copy of the single. 

Lovers Unite ($200-$400): Everything included in the first two rewards, including 1 free merch item, i.e. signed CD, poster, or T-shirt. 

Lovers Paradise ($400 and up): Everything included in the first three rewards, including a personalized thank you on my socials. You will also receive one of the handmade wardrobe pieces featured in the video! 

The Impact

I am very passionate about this project because with everything that is happening in our world and our personal lives, it's nice to escape to a place of positivity. I hope this pop fantasy project brings you to a safe place of peace and love. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Sharing the link to this project as much as possible and on as many platforms as possible would mean so much to me. Spreading the world to your friends and family helps me in so many ways. Thank you for taking the time to read about my project. I can't wait to share this journey with you!

story:
I'm Kimberly. 

When I was very little I used to go up in front of crowds and tell everyone "Ladies and Gentlemen! Give me your attention please!!" And then I would sing! Usually it was Stevie Wonder... but singing has always been a dream. I would write songs, song after song would come to me, in the private seclusion of my home and only sometimes, would I ever share my recordings.

For years I have helped many other artists to promote their music and watched excitedly as they made beautiful music on my show! You may already know of me from my interview show called The Red Booth. I created that show from scratch and it's now broadcasting in 417 cities across the US. I created an interview show to help support artists. I love what I do. But I have always had a passion for music and singing myself. I have written some 100 songs, melodies, hooks and chorus most of which have sat collecting dust. I've gotten more and more brave about sharing. I put out one little song a few years ago. And then waited and wondered how to create the true vision I have for my style of music, while I worried over my own insecurities and fears of performing. Last year I made a big breakthrough with myself and decided to really find the right way to do this for me. 

Now I have an amazing opportunity. I have Chris Leon, a Multi Platinum, OSCAR winning music producer who has just been nominated for a Grammy, for his work producing the soundtrack for The Greatest Showman, producing my first EP! 

He loves my music style, he loves my lyrics and melody and he is coming to LA to record my vocals. He's doing the composing and will also record all the instruments. It's going to be big band, piano and so much more! 

This is truly a dream come true and I can't wait to share my music with you. This is a very personal passion of mine and I am going to come out with this beautiful EP that will truly represent the style of music I have always dreamed of and imagined I would release. 

And with such a fantastic talent in the music industry behind me I know that it will succeed. I also have a consultant that has proven stats getting songs on the top of streaming services and I am going to release this EP with a bang, get it into the press and then.... DUN DUN DUN actually sing these songs, on my TV SHOW where so many other's have performed. 

I need to raise the money to produce this, from composing to, recording all of the instruments and vocals, the mixing and mastering and all of it, is in total 9K. Usually this is what a record label would cover, but I am doing this directly with Chris Leon. Plus the cost of CDs and final music products to ship out. 

If you will help me to create this lifelong dream come true, I will send you not only the EP when it comes out, but a personal signed letter and message thanking you. Check out all the perks for this campaign! For those who help with larger amounts I would give you special thanks on my EP and a special invitation to be on set while I perform the songs in studio. 

But mainly what you will be doing is helping a very determined artist, who has made it her career to help other artists, finally also get to share hers with the world. My music is very old school sounding. I have watched as the songs I wrote sometimes 10 years ago had similar new artists coming out with similiar themes and ideas, Postmodern Jukebox, Lana Del Ray, Elle King, all have met with wild success. And Chris Leon also believes that what he's got from me has the same potential. I have shown them to a few people in music and have had overwhelmingly good feedback. 

 
If you know me, you've been following the creation of my TV show from my garage onto national TV and you know how determined I am when I decide to do something. I am determined to get this beautiful new EP done and ready to deliver. 
 
Chris is coming out to record my vocals the week before the Grammys. Those of you who help me with this very important part of the process will also get special updates on the journey, behind the scenes videos and stories and personal updates from me and Chris. 
 
All of the money raised will go straight to the production of this EP and the creation of the materials to send out when the EP is finished. I will be eternally grateful to those who believed in me despite my closeted love of singing and life long stage freight. I am finally going to have the support to believe in the music I love writing, so much. 
 

If you can't donate to this right now then please help me by sharing this and helping me to spread the word! Every little bit counts! Thank you so much for reading this and I love you my friends! Here's to art lifting the world from darkness. <3

story:
Fightin' The Wars

Think about that phrase for a moment. At one point in your life, you have probably felt as if your life was in turmoil, you were all alone, or that the experiences in your life were piling up so much that you just couldn't take much more.

For me, during those times, music has always been the answer. For this reason, I am deeply honored and incredibly excited to share what were once just words on a page and will now be brought to life as songs on this album as my gift to YOU.

My name is Michael Dart and I'm a singer, songwriter and  bandleader that began and spent the first half of my music career in CA singing and playing in some of the last remaining authentic country venues along with many true country players and legends.  Fast forward to my current home here in Texas where I have done much of the same for the past  11 years and was recently honored with a 2014 Academy of Western Artists Award for Pure Country Group of The Year as well as a 2015 Ameripolitan nomination for Honky Tonk Male.

I am so thrilled to bring you into my journey of recording and releasing my new album, Fightin' The Wars from start to finish and beyond.  The songs I've picked for this project are a collection of songs I have written or co-written with the exception of three. One of those three, I will be singing as a duet with my daughter Isabella (her FIRST time recording).  The other two were written by two of my mentors Al Bruno and Archie Francis.

You need to know that most of these songs have been rigorously tested on barroom stages, dancehalls, listening rooms, coffeehouses, as well as the great outdoors.  They have passed the crowd approval test through invoking TEARS and GOOSEBUMPS from listening and SWEAT and LOVE from dancing. Some, however, have only seen the light of day from the inside of my songbag.

It's TIME, time to explore our vulnerabilities together and with your contribution/involvement, we can reap the benefits from the harvest of this album!

Plant the songs, harvest the album

This will TRULY be a DIY endeavor, from beginning to end.  I'm asking for $12,000 to cover costs of the studio/engineer time for recording, mixing, mastering, musician time, guest musicians, cd replication, digital platform fees, taxes and album promotion not only in the Austin/Central Texas community but nationally and globally as well.  WHEN we reach our goal, we will utilize any extra funds (known as a stretch) to cover a small batch of vinyl copies of the record. 

How can YOU help?

Back in the day, unknown artists put their utmost hopes in a record executive attending one of their shows so that they might be "discovered".  In my mind, that person was a portly gentleman smoking a huge cigar and puffs of smoke surrounding his head, pushing a contract across the table, "Here Son, Sign on the dotted line..".  Well some might say those days are gone and so far, that day has never come for me.  But guess what, it is never too late and I still hold tight to my dreams.  Reaching people and hopefully soothing them with my songs is my purpose and You are the reason I feel the need to get these songs out there during what is a chaotic time for humanity.  YOU are the reason I write and share my soul.  That is why YOU are that person in the back of the room.  YOU are my record executive.  I need YOU to help me sign on the dotted line.  I need YOUR help, YOUR contribution will go directly to the making of this album.

What do I do? Click on the pink button BACK IT at the top of the page. You will then be guided through the payment process. You can contribute any amount you wish. You may contribute without receiving a perk.  You may also contribute and receive a perk by picking out one that you would like from the section located on the right side of the page.

 

Risks & Challenges

This is a flexible campaign, meaning that even if the goal of $12,000 is not met, all funds contributed will still be managed appropriately toward the making of this album.

Any perks that require band performance will be scheduled around existing band commitments.

Other perks will be fulfilled within the time period. You will be notified about any date or shipping changes if they arise.

 

Other ways to contribute.

You are able to contribute in other ways if you are unable to do so monetarily:

You can follow the campaign by clicking the heart next to the back it button.

You can use the included icons to share through Facebook and Twitter.

You can also copy links for embedding or sending the link itself through email lists to your friends.

We appreciate all efforts to SHARE SHARE SHARE this campaign through all other forms of social media as well.

Of course, word of mouth is and has always been the best form of spreading news so by all means, please tell anyone who you think might be interested in this project!!

We appreciate you!

THANK YOU on behalf of my band and whole team involved for your support on this wonderful project!!

 Yours truly,

Michael Dart

story:
• Hello. This is Mister City.

        • So why do you never see my face?
        • Because it’s not about me. It’s about the 'Caged Birds'!

        • So who are they? And where do they come from… and why don’t you know their work?
        • These 'Caged Birds' come from the area along the Mekong River which is sometimes referred to as ‘Indochina’.

        • This project is to make a top-quality Album that will give some exceptional people an opportunity to have their talents appreciated on the world stage; and you can help...
        • We are not trying to bring the folk music of Indochina to the outside world. There are splendid festivals and cultural events in Europe and America doing just that. 
        • We are making full-on, high-end, contemporary pop-dance music.
        • But there is a lot of that around, so what makes this special? We are incorporating the unique sounds of Indochina, created by local musicians using the traditional instruments of the area. 
        • Our goal is to finish the Album and to promote it with a high-class Music Video, and Live Performances. My Campaign is to raise $50,000 US, which will be enough to push the project to the point where it creates its own momentum.
        • So how will the money be used? Obviously, doing all this locally is going to be considerably cheaper than it would be in London, New York, Tokyo or Seoul; and the facilities are already in place. 
        • Recording: $15,000
        • Video $15,000 
        • Initial CD & DVD Manufacturing, Packaging, Campaign costs, etc.: $8,000 
        • Create & develop social media presence: $3,000
        • Live Performances (incl. rehearsals, etc.): $9,000.
        • Thank you for taking the time to look at my Campaign.
        • Now help me bring 'The Birds' out of the cage!
story_txt:
Hello. This is Mister City.

So why do you never see my face?
Because it’s not about me. It’s about the 'Caged Birds'!



So who are they? And where do they come from… and why don’t you know their work?
These 'Caged Birds' come from the area along the Mekong River which is sometimes referred to as ‘Indochina’.


This project is to make a top-quality Album that will give some exceptional people an opportunity to have their talents appreciated on the world stage; and
     you can help...

We are not trying to bring the folk music of Indochina to the outside world. There are splendid festivals and cultural events in Europe and America doing just that. 
We are making full-on, high-end, contemporary pop-dance music.
But there is a lot of that around, so what makes this special? We are incorporating the unique sounds of Indochina, created by local musicians using the traditional instruments of the area. 

Our goal is to finish the Album
     and to promote it with a high-class Music Video, and Live Performances. My Campaign is to raise $50,000 US, which
     will be enough to push the project to the point where it creates its own
     momentum.

So how will the money be used? Obviously, doing all this locally is going to be considerably cheaper than it would be in London, New York, Tokyo or Seoul; and the facilities are already in place. 
Recording: $15,000
Video $15,000 
Initial CD & DVD Manufacturing, Packaging, Campaign costs, etc.: $8,000 
Create & develop social media presence: $3,000
Live Performances (incl. rehearsals, etc.): $9,000.
Thank you for taking the time to look at
     my Campaign.
Now help me bring 'The Birds' out of the cage!

story:
-- // Magyar leírásért kérlek, görgess lejjebb! // --

Are you looking for a really awesome book to blow your mind? Are you keen to find something fresh and exciting music to go crazy for? Are you bored with the huge soulless shops, mass production and mass consuming with no time for the real things? And you definitely have good taste? You are looking for us!

NOW Books & Music is the first completely independent publisher and record label of Hungary, concentrating on the high-standard underground literature and music.

Why is it unique?

Our aim is to bring bits of good quality of culture into Hungary, and to support the authors and musicians as well just as the small independent shops. NOW Books & Music is independent from other publishers and labels, and also from the massive dryasdust stores too where they skim the cream off of everything so nothing goes back to the roots: the artists themselves. Besides our webshop we only ship to small shops, where they know the books not just from the blurb, where you easily recognise the shop-keeper from the gig last night.

We are guerrillas. We will suddenly appear anywhere in the country to show you our product. We’ll be on gigs, at parks, at shops and behind the bar at your favourite ruin-pub. We will be the ones in a teddy bear suit who gives balloons for the kids, we will be those who plant some flowers by the sidewalk overnight and leave just our business card behind. We repair your bikes or give you the best sandwiches from the deli. And most of all: we are the ones who present you awesome books and records!

There will be only a few titles and albums released every year so we can take good care of them. There will always be three versions available, whichever suits you more: digital, physical and deluxe edition. The deluxe edition will be very limited, numbered, with hand binding covers of books and vinyl for the music, comes with the free digital copy (just like the physical edition) so you can take it with you anywhere in your pocket. In case you’d love something more unique, even custom editions would be available by your design.

We see how the things work here in the publishing scene. We want to change that. We want the name of NOW Books & Music to be a prestige to print on every books and records. With no prejudice for any genres but have open minds and eyes. With the quality literature and music we would like to hand you a different point of view to our culture and society.

What to cover with this project?

I already have offers/ideas of manuscripts and music demos to start with, also the best people to work with. This project will cover the pre-advertising the whole idea with the titles and bands, produce two titles and at least one record, then continue advertising and managing them.

- In progress: Ördöggerinc (Devil's Backbone) Project, read more here

One title has the cost of the strict and good eyed editor, the page-setting, creative cover design, printing and the limited edition's binding by an amazing binding artist. An album has the cost of the studio, mastering, producing and printing the discs and the limited edition vinyls with handmade covers.

And after these? If there's a bit of money left, let's have a party. I truly hope and believe people will love what we do and we can carry on with the publishing.

Thank you for your all support in advance. :)

-----------//-----------//---------------

Egy könyv kellene, amitől eldobod az agyad? Régóta nem találod a zenét, amiért igazán rajongani tudnál? Eleged van a hatalmas, lelketlen boltokból, a tömegtermelésből és tömegfogyasztásból? Nincs elég időd az értékes dolgok felkutatására? Minket keresel!

A NOW Books & Music az első valóban független kiadó Magyarországon, ami a kortárs underground irodalom és zene tehetségeire fókuszál.

Miért különleges?

Célunk a kortárs kultúra kiemelkedő darabjainak bemutatása, az írók, a zenészek és a független boltok támogatása. A NOW Books & Music nem csak a többi kiadótól független, hanem a nagy bolthálózatoktól is, amik akkora haszonkulccsal dolgoznak, hogy a végére nem marad semmi annak, aki a legtöbbet tette egy mű megszületéséért: magának a művésznek. A saját webshopunk mellett kizárólag kis könyves- és zeneműboltoknak szállítunk, ahol az eladók egy regény tartalmát nemcsak a fülszövegről ismerik, ahol a pénztárgép mögött könnyen olyan személyt fedezhetsz fel, akivel előző éjjel egy koncerten találkoztatok.

Gerillák vagyunk. Igazi harcosok. A legváratlanabb helyeken bukkanunk fel. Ott vagyunk a koncerteken, a parkokban, a kedvenc antikváriumodban és a pult mögött a romkocsmában. Mackójelmezbe bújva mi adjuk a lufit a gyerekeknek. Mi ültetünk virágot a járda szélére éjszaka, és csak egy névjegykártyát hagyunk hátra. Mi javítjuk a biciklidet vagy adjuk a legjobb szendvicset a kedvenc kávézódban. És legfőképpen: mi vagyunk azok, akik a legjobb könyveket és lemezeket adják a kezedbe!

Évente csak néhány könyvet és lemezt szeretnénk kiadni, hogy minden megjelenéssel megfelelőképpen tudjunk foglalkozni. Mindenből három változat készül, hogy eldönthesd a te ízlésednek mi felel meg leginkább: digitális, hagyományos és a gyűjtőknek/szerelmeseknek ajánlott különleges kiadás. Ez utóbbi nagyon kis példányszámban készül majd: egyedi, számozott, kézzel kötött könyvek és gyönyörű borítóba bújtatott bakelitlemezek formájában. Minden kézzelfogható verzió mellé elküldjük a digitális változatot, hogy magaddal vihesd bárhova. Adott esetben ezek akár a te elképzeléseidhez igazítva, egyedi megrendelésre is készülhetnek.

Tudjuk, látjuk, hogy mennek a dolgok Magyarországon a könyv- és zenekiadás terén, mi pedig változtatni akarunk. Azt szeretnénk, ha a NOW Books & Music egy olyan kiadó lenne, ahol megjelenni presztízs és öröm. Célunk, hogy az emblémánk garanciát jelentsen rá, hogy az adott alkotás nagyon magas minőséget képvisel. Nyitott szemmel és előítéletek nélkül válogatjuk, és adjuk tovább nektek a különleges olvasni- és hallgatnivalókat.

Mit fedez ez a projekt?

Már van néhány felajánlás/ötlet a potenciálisan kiadásra kerülő kéziratokra és zenére, hogy belevágjunk, ahogyan összeállt egy igazán izgalmas csapat, akikkel borzalmasan jó lesz együtt dolgozni. Ez a projekt fedezi az ötlet elő-reklámozását, két könyv és legalább egy lemez, avagy egy könyv és két lemez elkészítését, illetve ezek megjelenés utáni menedzselését.

- Előkészületben: Ördöggerinc Projekt, részletekért klikk ide!

Egy kötet megjelentetésének költsége egy jó szemű, szigorú szerkesztő, a tördelés, egy jó borítódizájn, nyomdaköltségek és a különleges, kisebb számú kiadásnál a zseniális könyvkötő. Egy lemez megjelenésének költsége a jó stúdió és az utómunkálatok, a producer és a lemezek elkészítése, illetve a kisebb példányszámú bakelitek elkészítése.

És mi lesz ezután? Ha marad pénz, megünnepeljük az indulást. Hiszünk, és bízunk benne, hogy az emberek imádni fogják a munkánkat és folytathatjuk majd a jövőben is a kiadást.

Előre is köszönünk minden segítséget! :)
story_txt:
--  // Magyar leírásért kérlek, görgess lejjebb! // --Are 
you looking for a really awesome book to blow your mind? Are you keen to
 find something fresh and exciting music to go crazy for? Are you bored 
with the huge soulless shops, mass production and mass consuming with no
 time for the real things? And you definitely have good taste? You are 
looking for us!NOW Books & Music is the first 
completely independent publisher and record label of Hungary, 
concentrating on the high-standard underground literature and music.Why is it unique?Our
 aim is to bring bits of good quality of culture into Hungary, and to 
support the authors and musicians as well just as the small independent 
shops. NOW Books & Music is independent from other publishers
 and labels, and also from the massive dryasdust stores too where they 
skim the cream off of everything so nothing goes back to the roots: the 
artists themselves. Besides our webshop we only ship to small shops, 
where they know the books not just from the blurb, where you easily 
recognise the shop-keeper from the gig last night.We are 
guerrillas. We will suddenly appear anywhere in the country to show you 
our product. We’ll be on gigs, at parks, at shops and behind the bar at 
your favourite ruin-pub. We will be the ones in a teddy bear suit who 
gives balloons for the kids, we will be those who plant some flowers by 
the sidewalk overnight and leave just our business card behind. We 
repair your bikes or give you the best sandwiches from the deli. And 
most of all: we are the ones who present you awesome books and records!There
 will be only a few titles and albums released every year so we can take
 good care of them. There will always be three versions available, 
whichever suits you more: digital, physical and deluxe edition. The 
deluxe edition will be very limited, numbered, with hand binding covers 
of books and vinyl for the music, comes with the free digital copy (just
 like the physical edition) so you can take it with you anywhere in your
 pocket. In case you’d love something more unique, even custom editions 
would be available by your design.We see how the things work here in the publishing scene. We want to change that. We want the name of NOW Books & Music
 to be a prestige to print on every books and records. With no prejudice
 for any genres but have open minds and eyes. With the quality 
literature and music we would like to hand you a different point of view
 to our culture and society.What to cover with this project?I
 already have offers/ideas of manuscripts and music demos to start with,
 also the best people to work with. This project will cover the 
pre-advertising the whole idea with the titles and bands, produce two 
titles and at least one record, then continue advertising and managing 
them.- In progress: Ördöggerinc (Devil's Backbone) Project, read more hereOne title has the cost of the strict and good eyed editor, 
the page-setting, creative cover design, printing and the limited 
edition's binding by an amazing binding artist. An album has the cost of
 the studio, mastering, producing and printing the discs and the limited
 edition vinyls with handmade covers.And after these? If there's a
 bit of money left, let's have a party. I truly hope and believe people 
will love what we do and we can carry on with the publishing.Thank you for your all support in advance. :)-----------//-----------//---------------Egy
 könyv kellene, amitől eldobod az agyad? Régóta nem találod a zenét, 
amiért igazán rajongani tudnál? Eleged van a hatalmas, lelketlen 
boltokból, a tömegtermelésből és tömegfogyasztásból? Nincs elég időd az 
értékes dolgok felkutatására? Minket keresel!A NOW Books & Music az első valóban független kiadó Magyarországon, ami a kortárs underground irodalom és zene tehetségeire fókuszál.Miért különleges?Célunk a kortárs kultúra kiemelkedő darabjainak bemutatása, az írók, a zenészek és a független boltok támogatása. A NOW Books & Music
 nem csak a többi kiadótól független, hanem a nagy bolthálózatoktól is, 
amik akkora haszonkulccsal dolgoznak, hogy a végére nem marad semmi 
annak, aki a legtöbbet tette egy mű megszületéséért: magának a 
művésznek. A saját webshopunk mellett kizárólag kis könyves- és 
zeneműboltoknak szállítunk, ahol az eladók egy regény tartalmát nemcsak a
 fülszövegről ismerik, ahol a pénztárgép mögött könnyen olyan személyt 
fedezhetsz fel, akivel előző éjjel egy koncerten találkoztatok.Gerillák
 vagyunk. Igazi harcosok. A legváratlanabb helyeken bukkanunk fel. Ott 
vagyunk a koncerteken, a parkokban, a kedvenc antikváriumodban és a pult
 mögött a romkocsmában. Mackójelmezbe bújva mi adjuk a lufit a 
gyerekeknek. Mi ültetünk virágot a járda szélére éjszaka, és csak egy 
névjegykártyát hagyunk hátra. Mi javítjuk a biciklidet vagy adjuk a 
legjobb szendvicset a kedvenc kávézódban. És legfőképpen: mi vagyunk

egyedi, számozott, kézzel kötött könyvek és gyönyörű borítóba bújtatott 
bakelitlemezek formájában. Minden kézzelfogható verzió mellé elküldjük a
