story:
"LA MÚSICA LLEGA AL ALMA...PERO UN MENSAJE POSITIVO LA LLENA"

Hola mi nombre es Jose Cañas y veo la vida a través de unas Gafas Rojas. Con ellas,  recorro ciudades y países cantando y llevando un mensaje de esperanza a través de la música.

Vivo en Costa Rica, país que se ha denominado como "El más feliz del mundo" y creo que la influencia de esta tierra -en la cual no tenemos ejército- ha rebozado mis letras de la paz que transpira nuestro entorno y mucho amor a la vida.

Desde niño aprendí que unir la música con mensajes positivos resultaba en experiencias enriquecedoras de vida. La música nos acompaña en todo a lo largo de nuestra estancia en este mundo y a pesar de que, comercialmente, tenemos excelentes canciones hoy día; existen muy pocas que nos motiven a avanzar y a buscar buenos cambios en nuestra rutina diaria.

Retado continuamente por ese pensamiento fue que empecé -hace aproximadamente 10 años- de manera formal y  profesional mi carrera como cantante y compositor. Hace unos 3 años, mi carrera dio un giro y empecé a acompañar mi imagen con las Gafas Rojas.

Viendo el mundo desde las Gafas Rojas también las vi convertirse en una plataforma social que ha ayudado y apoyado a varias fundaciones costarricenses, ONGs y organismos internacionales como FAO de las Naciones Unidas, siempre a través de la música.

Es que la música tiene el poder de llegar al alma y de alegrar momentos; pero también de ayudar a construir diferentes realidades sociales. El proyecto musical que les presento hoy no solo busca alegrar a las personas que lo escucharán sino también motivar e ir un poco más allá, proponiendo cambios y aportando con buen material para que suenen más canciones con propósito y mensajes de vida en medios comerciales.

Lejos de comprometerse en el intento, el mensaje y la calidad musical se potencian para que -comercialmente- la música sea exitosa y llegue a más personas de las que regularmente son impactadas por estas canciones con mensajes positivos. Mi proyecto consiste de dos discos EP que formarán un solo álbum titulado: "Del corazón...al alma".


ACERCA DE LOS DISCOS "Del corazón" será un disco producido 100% en Costa Rica, junto al importante productor costarricense, Carlos Tapado Vargas. Tapado ha destacado en el ambiente nacional e internacional al ser ganador en múltiples ocasiones de premios Latin Grammys junto a Rubén Blades y el Grupo Editus, entre muchos otros éxitos de su carrera. Recientemente trabajó junto a Alanis Morissette con quien produjo el soundtrack de un documental sobre Costa Rica.

El disco reunirá también a grandes compositores costarricenses con quienes, a través de ritmos latinoamericanos que nos harán bailar, cantar y disfrutar, inspiraremos almas con mensajes de amor perfecto en sus canciones.

“Del corazón” contará con la Marca País “esencial Costa Rica”, una licencia otorgada debido a la exposición internacional que tendrá esta producción tan llena de talento costarricense. De hecho, soy el primer artista en mi país que recibe dicha mención y eso me llena de orgullo, porque con este disco queremos hacer algo de Costa Rica para el mundo.

Algunos nombres que estarán presentes en este disco son los de Debi Nova, con quien en un pasado canté la canción “Alimento para el alma” y el del Grupo Malpaís, grandes músicos que han llevado la música costarricense a otro nivel, entre otros.

El otro disco titulado "Al alma" es un disco que ya compuse con Jesús Adrián Romero, Daniel Fraire y Mike Rodríguez y será producido por estos dos últimos grandes músicos en Monterrey (México). Las canciones tendrán un mensaje de esperanza y ánimo para motivar a la gente a encontrar lo que los acerque a su espiritualidad y les brinde paz. Tendremos invitados muy queridos en este medio como lo es el cantante Daniel Calveti.

Al ser un artista independiente no cuento con el apoyo de disqueras; sin embargo, el poder de la música radica en unir a las personas en sentimientos o “lugares comunes”. Como todos quienes soñamos por alcanzar metas, hacer este proyecto involucra no solo un anhelo sino también trabajo y recursos por los cuales estoy dispuesto a seguir esforzándome como lo he hecho con mi equipo hasta el día de hoy, con quienes veo orgullosamente hacia atrás todo lo que  hemos alcanzado. Es increíble que de manera independiente y con recursos tan limitados, hayamos llegado tan lejos. Definitivamente, hemos visto la ayuda de Dios.

Es imposible para mí realizar una obra que no contemple la visión a través de la Gafas Rojas y su proyecto social. Es por eso que la música de este proyecto no solo dejará un impacto en quienes la escuchen, sino que beneficiará a la Asociación Síndrome de Down en Costa Rica (ASIDOWN), quienes con un trabajo constante y tangible han luchado por la inclusión social en nuestro país. Con las ventas del disco se destinará un 15% para ASIDOWN y además, contaremos con unos paquetes de donativos mediante los cuales usted también podrá ser parte de Gafas Rojas y ayudar directamente a dicha organización al destinarse un 10% de su donación a esta buena causa.

 

LOS MONTOS Para realizar este proyecto que llevará 10 canciones, producidas por grandes productores en Monterrey (México) y Costa Rica, necesitamos los siguientes recursos:

-Pre Producción (Promoción mediática para el nuevo proyecto -México DF, Dallas, Houston, Miami y Orlando), estudio, músicos para sesiones, viajes para escribir canciones con algunos músicos (México DF/ Monterrey y Miami) $14.870 USD 

- Costos de grabación (Productores, músicos para sesiones, studio, mixing, mastering, arreglista) $43.100 USD (10 canciones)

-Trabajo artístico para el álbum, fotos y diseño de embalaje $850 USD

-Manufactura del álbum (1.000 unidades) $1.534 USD

- Relaciones públicas, publicidad y mercadeo para promoción -primera parte- en Centroamérica (Guatemala, Costa Rica, Panamá y El Salvador), Estados unidos  (Miami, Dallas and Houston) y México (DF y Monterrey. Agencia comunicativa y gastos de viaje $17.000 USD

-2 Videoclips para los sencillos $4.500

El costo total del proyecto es de $81.854 USD, sin embargo, hemos logrado avanzar trabajo e invertir en el proyecto $27.353 USD. Este dinero se ha utilizado en etapas de promoción internacional y preproducción así como composición del disco. Para poder continuar con el proyecto y terminar los discos, el financiamiento básico total que necesitamos es de $54.501 USD. 

Sé que es una cantidad fuerte de dinero, pero hemos llegado tan lejos, cosechando grandes éxitos con recursos tan limitados que me atrevo a soñar que hay personas que, como yo, saben que la música  tiene el poder de cambiar el mundo y nos ayudarán a terminar esta buena obra.

 El sueño y el proyecto no son sencillos, pero tenemos la bendición de contar con el respaldo que brindan los grandes alcances logrados y eso habla del grado de compromiso y trabajo que tenemos con una labor que tiene ya más de 10 años, tres discos compactos grabados, muchas giras exitosas de conciertos junto a grandes artistas y participación en grandes medios de comunicación internacional.

El proyecto ya inició, por lo que -en el desafortunado escenario de no lograr recoger todos los fondos- con las donaciones que recibamos emprenderemos el trabajo de igual manera y produciremos la cantidad de canciones que podamos pagar, las cuales promocionaremos para crear empatía con nuestro trabajo y así seguir en la búsqueda de oportunidades que generen recursos para ir logrando sacar el proyecto adelante. Así seguiríamos, sin rendirnos, hasta sacar el álbum completo; ambos conceptos  juntos: "Del corazón...al alma".

Diariamente escuchamos música en las radios y medios, pero la imperante necesidad de más canciones que nos acerquen a lo bueno nos obliga a comprometernos al máximo con el proyecto y extraer de este álbum canciones comercialmente exitosas. Con los dos discos pasados he tenido la oportunidad de compartir escenario con Fonseca, Gaby Moreno, Marc Anthony, Juan Luis Guerra, Franco De Vita, Jesús Adrián Romero, Michael W Smith, Newsboys, Jarabe de Palo, Debi Nova, Alex Campos y Tercer Cielo, entre otros. Con este nuevo disco queremos repetir y aumentar el alcance que ya hemos logrado.

Tengo la fe puesta en que lograremos el propósito del disco. Su donativo es de suma importancia para este proyecto, y -por trillado que suene- el tamaño del donativo no lo hace menos, ya que su valor reside en que aún hay gente que tiene en su corazón la esperanza de ver un proyecto como éste y poner en acción sus intenciones; mismas que sabemos inspirarán a otros a ser parte de esta música con propósito. Ayúdenos a compartir esta campaña en sus redes para ser más y llegar a más personas. Indiegogo tiene herramientas a través de las cuales podemos hacer pública esta información y ser de bendición y apoyo en este proceso. ¡Un millón de gracias y bendiciones, nos escuchamos pronto! 

Jose Cañas. 


ENGLISH

"MUSIC GETS TO THE SOUL… BUT A POSITIVE MESSAGE FILLS IT”

Hello, my name is Jose Cañas and I see life through a pair of Red Glasses. With them, I travel cities and countries; singing and bringing a message of hopethrough music. 

I live in Costa Rica, a country that has been denominated as the “Happiest country in the world” and I think the influence of this land -in which we have no army- has fulfilled the lyrics of my music of the peace the country exhales and a lot of love for life. 

Since I was a little kid I learned that fuse music with positive messages gave as a result enriching life experiences. Music accompanies us lifelong and although, commercially, we have excellent songs nowadays; there are very few that will motivate us toseek changes in our daily routine in that pursuit of happiness we are all in.

Dared by that thought, I started -about 10 years ago- my songwriting career in a professional and formal manner. 3 years ago, my career turned and I started to relate my image to the Red Glasses. 

Watching the world through my Red Glasses I also saw them develop into a social platform that has helped and supported many costarrican foundations, non-governmental organizations and International Organizations such as United Nation´s FAO; always through music. 

Music has the power to reach to one’s soul and makejoyful moments, but also to help constructing different social realities. The musical project that I’m presenting today, not only searches to cheer people up but to motivate and go a little bit further, proposing changes and contributing to the porpoise of getting more songs with true value and life messages to the “commercial media”.

During that process, nor the message or the music quality gets compromised, actually, they are both potentiated for the music to be commercially successful and gets to more people. My project consists of two EP disks,together they will form the record named “Del corazón… Al alma” (From the heart… to the soul)

ABOUT THE ALBUMS "Del corazón" will be a disk produced 100% in Costa Rica, next to the respectable costarrican producer, Carlos “Tapado” Vargas. Tapado has distinguished in both the national and international music ambience as a multiple winner of Latin Grammy awards next to Rubén Blades and the Editus group among many other recognitions in his carrer. Recently, “Tapado” worked next to Alanis Morissette to produce the soundtrack for a documentary about Costa Rica.

The disk will reunite great costarrican music writers and composers with whom we will engrave the perfect love concept into Latin-American songs that will make us dance, sing, enjoy and overall… Inspire us. 

“Del corazón” will also have the “essential Costa Rica” country trademark stamp, as a part of its importance for the international exposition of this costarrican talent filled production. In fact, I´m proudly the first artist in my country who receives this mention and it fills me with joy because with this disk we want to make something from Costa Rica to the world. 

I´ll be featuring some songs with great artist like Debi Nova –with whom I previously recorded the song “Alimento para el alma- and the national group Malpaís, remarkable musicians that have taken costarrican music to another level, among others. 

The other disk named "Al alma" is a disk I already composed with the Mexican Singer Jesús Adrián Romero as well as Daniel Fraire y Mike Rodríguez, and it will be produced for Fraire and Rodríguez; big musicians fromMonterrey (México). The songs will have a hope message and they will motivate people to look for a greater spiritual balance in their life that will ultimately bring them peace. We will have guest artists on this disk too, like cherished musicians such as Daniel Calveti.

As an independent artist, I don´t have the support of a record label; however, the power of Music lies on its ability to bring people together through feelings or common life stages. Like everyone who´s struggling for a goal, this Project not only involves a yearning but also lots of work and resources that I´m willing to keep working on as I have done it with my team until today. With them, I proudly look back and we see everything we have accomplished so far, it is truly amazing that as an independent Project and with very limited resources we´ve come this far. Definitely, it’s only through the support God has given us. 

It is impossible for me to start a project that doesn´t contemplate the vision thorugh the Red Glasses. Therefore, the music produced on this project will not only impact the people that will hear it but also it will benefit The Costarrican Down Syndrome Association (ASIDOWN for its name in Spanish) an association with a constant and tangible work in programs that look for social inclusion From the disk sales response, there will be a 15% destined ASIDOWN and also we havepackages in which your contribution will directly help ASIDOWN with a 10% of your donation.

THE AMOUNTS For the realization of this project that will consist of 10 songs produced by the greatestproducers in Monterrey (México) and from Costa Rica, we need the following resources:

-Pre Production (media promotion for the new project -México DF, Dallas, Houston, Miami y Orlando), studio, session musicians, travel for songwriting with some composers (México DF/ Monterrey y Miami) $14.870 USD

-Recording costs (producers, session musicians, studio, mixing, mastering, musical arranger) $43.100 USD (10 songs)

-Album Artwork, photos and packing design $850 USD

-Album manufacture (1.000 Units) $1.534 USD

-Promotion PR (First stage) in Central America (Guatemala, Costa Rica, Panamá y El Salvador), USA (Miami, Dallas and Houston) and Mexico (DF y Monterrey. PR Company and travel $17.000 USD

-2 Video clips for the singles $4.500

The total cost of the project is: $81.854 USD, however, we have been able to advance some of the work and invest $27.353 USD on it, all used for the international promotion and pre-production stages as well as disk composition. To be able to finish the disk and deliver the whole project, the basic total financing we need is $54.501 USD.

I know this is a really strong amount of money, but we´ve come so far, we´ve achieved so many with such limited resources that I know this will be a successful project and I can assure you is worth it. 

The dream and the project are not simple, but we have the blessing to have many past triumphs that can back us up and that demonstrates the amount of commitment and work we have done with this career of over 10 years, 3 CD´s recorded, many successful concert tours and participation in big international communication media chains. 

JOINING THE PROJECT The rewards that we´ll sent upon your support are very personal and unique since we want to transmit that really each person who says yes to this project becomes a part of it, whether you´re in Latin-America or US.

$1 or more: Thank you for your support and for becoming part or the dream. Bless you! 

$20. You will get 2 digital CD´s ("Quiero vivir" and "Megapositivo"). Thank you for your support and enjoy the music. 

$50. You´ll get 2 digital CD´s ("Quiero vivir" and “Megapositivo") for you to enjoy the Music you believed in plus 2 music videos of the singles from my last CD“Quiero Vivir”.

$110. This donation is only for mi beloved costarricansince I know my Friends and the people who follow the Project will give me their donation. We have only 250 spots. You will not only receive 2 physical CD´s but also you will get a ticket to join us in a concert on the known venue Jazz Café. You can pick from 2 different dates set to September or November. I´ll be honored to play that night for people like you who believes in Music, dreams and great efforts. 

$150. This is a really special one! With this donation you´ll get 2 digital CD´s ("Quiero vivir" and “Megapositivo") plus a pair of emblematic Red Glasses for you to see the world in a different way… For you to see it with Perfect Love. 

$500. WOW! If you support me with this donation, you´ll definitely get us closer to our goal. For this one, you´ll get 2 digital CD´s ("Quiero vivir" and “Megapositivo") plus 3 musical videos from our last CD. Plus, I would like to thank you and get to know you in a 1 hour session via Skype in which we can sing, laugh and spend a great time together. Besides that, we will give 10% of your donation to The Costarrican Down Syndrome Association. This donation has 50 spots open.

$800. This is a special and very exclusive one. Besides getting the digital package (2 digital CD´s -"Quierovivir" and “Megapositivo"- plus 3 musical videos from our last CD), my musicians and I will record something live that will be sent through and email to you and will be posted in our Social Media as well. We will choose from 5 different cover proposals you send us and we can dedicate this song to anyone you like. Once the acoustic version is recorded, we will send you the video for you to post it on your Social Networks or just share it with that special someone. Besides that, as part of the Red Glasses organization, we will give 10% of your donation to The Costarrican Down Syndrome Association. This donation has 10 spots open.

$1000. Red Glasses have really become an icon of my image. That is why I want to thank your donation giving you something really mine: A pair of original deluxedition Red Glasses like the ones I use. I encourage you to put on your Red Glasses and see the world in a more positive way. Besides that, as part of the Red Glasses organization, we will give 10% of your donation to The Costarrican Down Syndrome Association. We will have only 10 pairs of Red Glasses exclusively for our US friends who will also receive the physical edition of our CD´s “Megapositivo” y “Quiero Vivir”.

$3.000. The guitar is the instrument through I learned how to create and compose songs. I want to share with you a special edition of a guitar decorated artistically with the Red Glasses theme, for you to see the world differently and even sing about it if you want to. We have so many good plastic artists in Costa Rica that you can choose from 5 different commemorative guitars with beautiful artistically paintings that we can send to any part of Latin-America or US. Also, when you receive the guitar I´d like to share an hour over Skype to get to know you, we can even make a duet! Besides that, as part of the Red Glasses organization, we will give 10% of your donation to The Costarrican Down Syndrome Association. We will have 10 spots for this donation. 

$4.500. In my personal life I learned many lessonsthrough experiences and instead of beating me I manage to beat them and be able to tell a story that has inspired thousands of people and teaches us that our biggest weakness could be our biggest strengths. A stutterer that manages to became a journalist and was able to attend and perform many important interviews, live, in many different mass media channels and scenarios. My voice has carried messages, whether singed or through words next to great personalities, motivating people to live and see the world differently. I overcome personal insecurities, the early symptoms of anorexia and bulimia and I´m still beating some since I learned how to fight. This donation is only available for Mexico, US and Central America and we have only 3 spots, it consists on me travelling personally to your country and under auditorium conditions I´ll give the motivational speech: “Journalist, singer and stutterer… What´s the story you need to beat?” It consists in confronting our fears, difficulties and insecurities and through a story make you think and believe you have everything you need to make it, turning your weakness into your greatest virtues and blessings in life. All travel and accommodations will be assumed by us and besides that, as part of the Red Glasses organization, we will give 10% of your donation to The Costarrican Down Syndrome Association. We will have 3 spots for this life changing speech. 

$7.000. Share music and celebrate life is an invaluable thing to do. This project was born first of all because God put in my life reasons to sing and celebrate that I have a second chance and second, because of the music and the strength a song and its message have. I have a deep gratefulness for your donation and as I said, I´d like to celebrate it but this time in your house with an acoustic showcase in a trio formation. Together we will define a date of mutual convenience and I will arrive on that date with the musicians to share with your family part of my Music and all this beautiful Project you are now a part of. We will have 2 spots for this donation and I will travel either to US or Central America to share my music and a coffee in the comfort of your own house. All travel and accommodations will be assumed by us and besides that, as part of the Red Glasses organization, we will give 10% of your donation to The Costarrican Down Syndrome Association. We have 3 spots for this donation. 

The project already began so if -in an unfortunate scenario- we cannot raise the whole amount we need to raise; the ones that we did received will start the job either ways and we´ll record the songs we can afford. They will be promoted to create empathy in our work and generate opportunities that may lead is to complete the amount to have both “the heart” and “the soul” out on the market. 

We have lots of Music in the radio and different mass media, but we do need more songs to lead us to the good, to the positive and get us closer to what is really worth itat the same time we make them commercially appealing. With the 2 previous CD´s I´ve been able to perform in different concerts with Fonseca, Gaby Moreno, Marc Anthony, Juan Luis Guerra, Franco De Vita, JesúsAdrián Romero, Michael W Smith, Newsboys, Jarabe de Palo, Debi Nova, Alex Campos, Tercer Cielo, among others. With this new disc our aim is to repeat and increase the reach we have had. 

I have my faith sold on this being a success and us being able to finish the Project. Your donation is really important to this project, it doesn´t matter how big or small it is: What matters is the heart that you put in your donation and the inspiration that it will be to others, to motivate and inspire them to be a part of this Project of Music with porpoise you decided to believe in. You can also help us sharing this campaign in you social media networks and reach more people. Indiegogo has the tools for you to share this and be a great support and bless us through that on this Project. ¡Thank you so much, we will hear each other soon! 

Jose Cañas
story_txt:
"LA MÚSICA LLEGA AL ALMA...PERO UN MENSAJE
POSITIVO LA LLENA"
Hola mi nombre es Jose Cañas y veo la vida a través de unas
Gafas Rojas. Con ellas,  recorro
ciudades y países cantando y llevando un mensaje de esperanza a través de la
música.
Vivo en Costa Rica, país que se ha denominado como "El
más feliz del mundo" y creo que la influencia de esta tierra -en la cual
no tenemos ejército- ha rebozado mis letras de la paz que transpira nuestro
entorno y mucho amor a la vida.
Desde niño aprendí que unir la música con mensajes positivos
resultaba en experiencias enriquecedoras de vida. La música nos acompaña en
todo a lo largo de nuestra estancia en este mundo y a pesar de que,
comercialmente, tenemos excelentes canciones hoy día; existen muy pocas que nos
motiven a avanzar y a buscar buenos cambios en nuestra rutina diaria.
Retado continuamente por ese pensamiento fue que empecé
-hace aproximadamente 10 años- de manera formal y  profesional mi carrera como cantante y compositor. Hace unos
3 años, mi carrera dio un giro y empecé a acompañar mi imagen con las Gafas
Rojas.
Viendo el mundo desde las Gafas Rojas también las vi
convertirse en una plataforma social que ha ayudado y apoyado a varias
fundaciones costarricenses, ONGs y organismos internacionales como FAO de las
Naciones Unidas, siempre a través de la música.
Es que la música tiene el poder de llegar al alma y de
alegrar momentos; pero también de ayudar a construir diferentes realidades
sociales. El proyecto musical que les presento hoy no solo busca alegrar a las
personas que lo escucharán sino también motivar e ir un poco más allá,
proponiendo cambios y aportando con buen material para que suenen más canciones
con propósito y mensajes de vida en medios comerciales.
Lejos de comprometerse en el intento, el mensaje y la
calidad musical se potencian para que -comercialmente- la música sea exitosa y
llegue a más personas de las que regularmente son impactadas por estas
canciones con mensajes positivos. Mi proyecto consiste de dos discos EP que formarán
un solo álbum titulado: "Del corazón...al alma".

ACERCA DE LOS DISCOS
"Del corazón" será un disco producido 100% en Costa Rica, junto al
importante productor costarricense, Carlos Tapado Vargas. Tapado ha destacado
en el ambiente nacional e internacional al ser ganador en múltiples ocasiones
de premios Latin Grammys junto a Rubén Blades y el Grupo Editus, entre muchos
otros éxitos de su carrera. Recientemente trabajó junto a Alanis Morissette con
quien produjo el soundtrack de un documental sobre Costa Rica.
El disco reunirá también a grandes compositores
costarricenses con quienes, a través de ritmos latinoamericanos que nos harán
bailar, cantar y disfrutar, inspiraremos almas con mensajes de amor perfecto en
sus canciones.
“Del corazón” contará con la Marca País “esencial Costa
Rica”, una licencia otorgada debido a la exposición internacional que tendrá
esta producción tan llena de talento costarricense. De hecho, soy el primer
artista en mi país que recibe dicha mención y eso me llena de orgullo, porque
con este disco queremos hacer algo de Costa Rica para el mundo.
Algunos nombres que estarán presentes en este disco son los
de Debi Nova, con quien en un pasado canté la canción “Alimento para el alma” y
el del Grupo Malpaís, grandes músicos que han llevado la música costarricense a
otro nivel, entre otros.
El otro disco titulado "Al alma" es un disco que
ya compuse con Jesús Adrián Romero, Daniel Fraire y Mike Rodríguez y será
producido por estos dos últimos grandes músicos en Monterrey (México). Las
canciones tendrán un mensaje de esperanza y ánimo para motivar a la gente a
encontrar lo que los acerque a su espiritualidad y les brinde paz. Tendremos
invitados muy queridos en este medio como lo es el cantante Daniel Calveti.
Al ser un artista independiente no cuento con el apoyo de
disqueras; sin embargo, el poder de la música radica en unir a las personas en
sentimientos o “lugares comunes”. Como todos quienes soñamos por alcanzar
metas, hacer este proyecto involucra no solo un anhelo sino también trabajo y
recursos por los cuales estoy dispuesto a seguir esforzándome como lo he hecho
con mi equipo hasta el día de hoy, con quienes veo orgullosamente hacia atrás
todo lo que  hemos alcanzado. Es
increíble que de manera independiente y con recursos tan limitados, hayamos
llegado tan lejos. Definitivamente, hemos visto la ayuda de Dios.
Es imposible para mí realizar una obra que no contemple la
visión a través de la Gafas Rojas y su proyecto social. Es por eso que la
música de este proyecto no solo dejará un impacto en quienes la escuchen, sino
que beneficiará a la Asociación Síndrome de Down en Costa Rica (ASIDOWN),
quienes con un trabajo constante y tangible han luchado por la inclusión social
en nuestro país. Con las ventas del disco se destinará un 15% para ASIDOWN y
además, contaremos con unos paquetes de donativos mediante los cuales usted
también podrá ser parte de Gafas Rojas y ayudar directamente a dicha
organización al destinarse un 10% de su donación a esta buena causa.
 
LOS MONTOS Para realizar
este proyecto que llevará 10 canciones, producidas por grandes productores en
Monterrey (México) y Costa Rica, necesitamos los siguientes recursos:
-Pre
Producción (Promoción mediática para el nuevo proyecto -México DF, Dallas,
Houston, Miami y Orlando), estudio, músicos para sesiones, viajes para escribir
canciones con algunos músicos (México DF/ Monterrey y Miami) $14.870 USD 
- Costos de
grabación (Productores, músicos para sesiones, studio, mixing, mastering, arreglista)
$43.100 USD (10 canciones)
-Trabajo
artístico para el álbum, fotos y diseño de embalaje $850 USD
-Manufactura
del álbum (1.000 unidades) $1.534 USD
- Relaciones
públicas, publicidad y mercadeo para promoción -primera parte- en Centroamérica
(Guatemala, Costa Rica, Panamá y El Salvador), Estados unidos  (Miami, Dallas and Houston) y México (DF
y Monterrey. Agencia comunicativa y gastos de viaje $17.000 USD
-2 Videoclips para los sencillos $4.500
El costo total del proyecto es de $81.854 USD, sin embargo,
hemos logrado avanzar trabajo e invertir en el proyecto $27.353 USD. Este
dinero se ha utilizado en etapas de promoción internacional y preproducción así
como composición del disco. Para poder continuar con el proyecto y terminar los
discos, el financiamiento básico total que necesitamos es de $54.501 USD. 

Sé que es una cantidad fuerte de dinero, pero hemos llegado
tan lejos, cosechando grandes éxitos con recursos tan limitados que me atrevo a
soñar que hay personas que, como yo, saben que la música  tiene el poder de cambiar el mundo y
nos ayudarán a terminar esta buena obra.
 El sueño y el
proyecto no son sencillos, pero tenemos la bendición de contar con el respaldo
que brindan los grandes alcances logrados y eso habla del grado de compromiso y
trabajo que tenemos con una labor que tiene ya más de 10 años, tres discos
compactos grabados, muchas giras exitosas de conciertos junto a grandes
artistas y participación en grandes medios de comunicación internacional.

El proyecto ya inició, por lo que -en el desafortunado
escenario de no lograr recoger todos los fondos- con las donaciones que
recibamos emprenderemos el trabajo de igual manera y produciremos la cantidad
de canciones que podamos pagar, las cuales promocionaremos para crear empatía
con nuestro trabajo y así seguir en la búsqueda de oportunidades que generen
recursos para ir logrando sacar el proyecto adelante. Así seguiríamos, sin
rendirnos, hasta sacar el álbum completo; ambos conceptos  juntos: "Del corazón...al
alma".
Diariamente escuchamos música en las radios y medios, pero
la imperante necesidad de más canciones que nos acerquen a lo bueno nos obliga
a comprometernos al máximo con el proyecto y extraer de este álbum canciones
comercialmente exitosas. Con los dos discos pasados he tenido la oportunidad de
compartir escenario con Fonseca, Gaby Moreno, Marc Anthony, Juan Luis Guerra,
Franco De Vita, Jesús Adrián Romero, Michael W Smith, Newsboys, Jarabe de Palo,
Debi Nova, Alex Campos y Tercer Cielo, entre otros. Con este nuevo disco
queremos repetir y aumentar el alcance que ya hemos logrado.
Tengo la fe puesta en que lograremos el propósito del disco.
Su donativo es de suma importancia para este proyecto, y -por trillado que
suene- el tamaño del donativo no lo hace menos, ya que su valor reside en que
aún hay gente que tiene en su corazón la esperanza de ver un proyecto como éste
y poner en acción sus intenciones; mismas que sabemos inspirarán a otros a ser
parte de esta música con propósito. Ayúdenos a compartir esta campaña en sus
redes para ser más y llegar a más personas. Indiegogo tiene herramientas a
través de las cuales podemos hacer pública esta información y ser de bendición
y apoyo en este proceso. ¡Un millón de gracias y bendiciones, nos escuchamos
pronto! 
Jose Cañas. 

ENGLISH

"MUSIC GETS TO THE SOUL… BUT A POSITIVE MESSAGE FILLS IT”
Hello, my name is Jose Cañas and I see life through a pair of Red Glasses. With them, I travel cities and countries; singing and bringing a message of hopethrough music. 
I live in Costa Rica, a country that has been denominated as the “Happiest country in the world” and I think the influence of this land -in which we have no army- has fulfilled the lyrics of my music of the peace the country exhales and a lot of love for life. 
Since I was a little kid I learned that fuse music with positive messages gave as a result enriching life experiences. Music accompanies us lifelong and although, commercially, we have excellent songs nowadays; there are very few that will motivate us toseek changes in our daily routine in that pursuit of happiness we are all in.
Dared by that thought, I started -about 10 years ago- my songwriting career in a professional and formal manner. 3 years ago, my career turned and I started to relate my image to the Red Glasses. 
Watching the world through my Red Glasses I also saw them develop into a social platform that has helped and supported many costarrican foundations, non-governmental organizations and International Organizations such as United Nation´s FAO; always through music. 
Music has the power to reach to one’s soul and makejoyful moments, but also to help constructing different social realities. The musical project that I’m presenting today, not only searches to cheer people up but to motivate and go a little bit further, proposing changes and contributing to the porpoise of getting more songs with true value and life messages to the “commercial media”.
During that process, nor the message or the music quality gets compromised, actually, they are both potentiated for the music to be commercially successful and gets to more people. My project consists of two EP disks,together they will form the record named “Del corazón… Al alma” (From the heart… to the soul)
ABOUT THE ALBUMS "Del corazón" will be a disk produced 100% in Costa Rica, next to the respectable costarrican producer, Carlos “Tapado” Vargas. Tapado has distinguished in both the national and international music ambience as a multiple winner of Latin Grammy awards next to Rubén Blades and the Editus group among many other recognitions in his carrer. Recently, “Tapado” worked next to Alanis Morissette to produce the soundtrack for a documentary about Costa Rica.
The disk will reunite great costarrican music writers and composers with whom we will engrave the perfect love concept into Latin-American songs that will make us dance, sing, enjoy and overall… Inspire us. 
“Del corazón” will also have the “essential Costa Rica” country trademark stamp, as a part of its importance for the international exposition of this costarrican talent filled production. In fact, I´m proudly the first artist in my country who receives this mention and it fills me with joy because with this disk we want to make something from Costa Rica to the world. 
I´ll be featuring some songs with great artist like Debi Nova –with whom I previously recorded the song “Alimento para el alma- and the national group Malpaís, remarkable musicians that have taken costarrican music to another level, among others. 
The other disk named "Al alma" is a disk I already composed with the Mexican Singer Jesús Adrián Romero as well as Daniel Fraire y Mike Rodríguez, and it will be produced for Fraire and Rodríguez; big musicians fromMonterrey (México). The songs will have a hope message and they will motivate people to look for a greater spiritual balance in their life that will ultimately bring them peace. We will have guest artists on this disk too, like cherished musicians such as Daniel Calveti.
As an independent artist, I don´t have the support of a record label; however, the power of Music lies on its ability to bring people together through feelings or common life stages. Like everyone who´s struggling for a goal, this Project not only involves a yearning but also lots of work and resources that I´m willing to keep working on as I have done it with my team until today. With them, I proudly look back and we see everything we have accomplished so far, it is truly amazing that as an independent Project and with very limited resources we´ve come this far. Definitely, it’s only through the support God has given us. 
It is impossible for me to start a project that doesn´t contemplate the vision thorugh the Red Glasses. Therefore, the music produced on this project will not only impact the people that will hear it but also it will benefit The Costarrican Down Syndrome Association (ASIDOWN for its name in Spanish) an association with a constant and tangible work in programs that look for social inclusion From the disk sales response, there will be a 15% destined ASIDOWN and also we havepackages in which your contribution will directly help ASIDOWN with a 10% of your donation.
THE AMOUNTS For the realization of this project that will consist of 10 songs produced by the greatestproducers in Monterrey (México) and from Costa Rica, we need the following resources:
-Pre Production (media promotion for the new project -México DF, Dallas, Houston, Miami y Orlando), studio, session musicians, travel for songwriting with some composers (México DF/ Monterrey y Miami) $14.870 USD
-Recording costs (producers, session musicians, studio, mixing, mastering, musical arranger) $43.100 USD (10 songs)
-Album Artwork, photos and packing design $850 USD
-Album manufacture (1.000 Units) $1.534 USD
-Promotion PR (First stage) in Central America (Guatemala, Costa Rica, Panamá y El Salvador), USA (Miami, Dallas and Houston) and Mexico (DF y Monterrey. PR Company and travel $17.000 USD
-2 Video clips for the singles $4.500
The total cost of the project is: $81.854 USD, however, we have been able to advance some of the work and invest $27.353 USD on it, all used for the international promotion and pre-production stages as well as disk composition. To be able to finish the disk and deliver the whole project, the basic total financing we need is $54.501 USD.
I know this is a really strong amount of money, but we´ve come so far, we´ve achieved so many with such limited resources that I know this will be a successful project and I can assure you is worth it. 
The dream and the project are not simple, but we have the blessing to have many past triumphs that can back us up and that demonstrates the amount of commitment and work we have done with this career of over 10 years, 3 CD´s recorded, many successful concert tours and participation in big international communication media chains. 
JOINING THE PROJECT The rewards that we´ll sent upon your support are very personal and unique since we want to transmit that really each person who says yes to this project becomes a part of it, whether you´re in Latin-America or US.

$50. You´ll get 2 digital CD´s ("Quiero vivir" and “Megapositivo") for you to enjoy the Music you believed in plus 2 music videos of the singles from my last CD“Quiero Vivir”.

You will not only receive 2 physical CD´s but also you will get a ticket to join us in a concert on the known venue Jazz Café. You can pick from 2 different dates set to September or November. I´ll be honored to play that night for people like you who believes in Music, dreams and great efforts.

Also, when you receive the guitar I´d like to share an hour over Skype to get to know you, we can even make a duet! Besides that, as part of the Red Glasses organization, we will give 10% of your donation to The Costarrican Down Syndrome Association. We will have 10 spots for this donation. 
$4.500. In my personal life I learned many lessonsthrough experiences and instead of beating me I manage to beat them and be able to tell a story that has inspired thousands of people and teaches us that our biggest weakness could be our biggest strengths. A stutterer that manages to became a journalist and was able to attend and perform many important interviews, live, in many different mass media channels and scenarios. My voice has carried messages, whether singed or through words next to great personalities, motivating people to live and see the world differently. I overcome personal insecurities, the early symptoms of anorexia and bulimia and I´m still beating some since I learned how to fight. This donation is only available for Mexico, US and Central America and we have only 3 spots, it consists on me travelling personally to your country and under auditorium conditions I´ll give the motivational speech: “Journalist, singer and stutterer… What´s the story you need to beat?” It consists in confronting our fears, difficulties and insecurities and through a story make you think and believe you have everything you need to make it, turning your weakness into your greatest virtues and blessings in life. All travel and accommodations will be assumed by us and besides that, as part of the Red Glasses organization, we will give 10% of your donation to The Costarrican Down Syndrome Association. We will have 3 spots for this life changing speech. 
$7.000. Share music and celebrate life is an invaluable thing to do. This project was born first of all because God put in my life reasons to sing and celebrate that I have a second chance and second, because of the music and the strength a song and its message have. I have a deep gratefulness for your donation and as I said, I´d like to celebrate it but this time in your house with an acoustic showcase in a trio formation. Together we will define a date of mutual convenience and I will arrive on that date with the musicians to share with your family part of my Music and all this beautiful Project you are now a part of. We will have 2 spots for this donation and I will travel either to US or Central America to share my music and a coffee in the comfort of your own house. All travel and accommodations will be assumed by us and besides that, as part of the Red Glasses organization, we will give 10% of your donation to The Costarrican Down Syndrome Association. We have 3 spots for this donation. 
The project already began so if -in an unfortunate scenario- we cannot raise the whole amount we need to raise; the ones that we did received will start the job either ways and we´ll record the songs we can afford. They will be promoted to create empathy in our work and generate opportunities that may lead is to complete the amount to have both “the heart” and “the soul” out on the market. 
We have lots of Music in the radio and different mass media, but we do need more songs to lead us to the good, to the positive and get us closer to what is really worth itat the same time we make them commercially appealing. With the 2 previous CD´s I´ve been able to perform in different concerts with Fonseca, Gaby Moreno, Marc Anthony, Juan Luis Guerra, Franco De Vita, JesúsAdrián Romero, Michael W Smith, Newsboys, Jarabe de Palo, Debi Nova, Alex Campos, Tercer Cielo, among others. With this new disc our aim is to repeat and increase the reach we have had. 
I have my faith sold on this being a success and us being able to finish the Project. Your donation is really important to this project, it doesn´t matter how big or small it is: What matters is the heart that you put in your donation and the inspiration that it will be to others, to motivate and inspire them to be a part of this Project of Music with porpoise you decided to believe in. You can also help us sharing this campaign in you social media networks and reach more people. Indiegogo has the tools for you to share this and be a great support and bless us through that on this Project. ¡Thank you so much, we will hear each other soon! 
Jose Cañas

story:
My Bio.

Jeffrey Lewis, Sir Jeffreey 5d, originally born in Detroit Michigan is an hip hop artist that has notoriously been known for his undeniable skills both lyrically and instrumentally.

Living by the mantra of peace, unity, and love Sir Jeffreey5d is a free spirited individual and is a combination of a futuristic sound intertwined with a vintage soul. Often compared to hip hop moguls and early artists such as: Kid Cudi, Marvin Gaye, Chet Baker, Frank Sinatra, Hendrix, and Marley, Sir Jeffreey 5d delivers an incomparable sound and has undeniable talent. This mixture creates a one of a kind sound that cannot be duplicated nor replicated.

His EP's, The Sacred Covenant and Not Stoppin' 4 Nothin are being released on July 20th. Currently on Pandora, Jango Internet Radio, iTunes, and is live on MTV. Sir Jeffreey 5d is changing the way people look at hip hop and is quickly on the rise.

For booking inquiries and interview requests please contact his manager Meagan Sargent:meagan.c.sargent@gmail.com


What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking to raise $2500 that will be allocated towards a small California tour, music videos, t-shirts, marketing for the albums and much more! Also, 5% of your donations will go towards Water.org!
  • In return for your funds, we prepared some great incentives for you that will be sent to you from a place of love and genuine gratitude!
  • If we did not meet this goal, any funds donated would still be used for a small California tour.

The Impact

  • With a heavy saturation of negativity in certain areas of the music business today, your contribution would help some positive light to be shed on the situation. We must save the youth!
  • This is my second fundraiser. My first fundraiser for my "Summertime" music video was a great success, we were able to raise $500 in five days. I am hoping for the same success with this attempt!
  • Every penny that you donate will go towards helping these two albums to be delivered to the masses. I am extrememly grateful for everyone who takes the time out just to watch the video. 

Risks & Challenges

  • I don't have the help of a record label to back this project. I am just a dedicated musician with a big dream that you can help me achieve! I pay for everything out of pocket on a minimum wage salary but this has never deterred me. .

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • I completely understand that not everyone who visits this campaign can contribute and that is cool. I just ask that you spread this message in anyway that you can to help this dreamer from Detroit City to catch what I have been literally working my entire life for!
  • Indiegogo makes it super easy for you to share this on your social media! Jut hit the share button on your desired social media and share this dream with the world!

Thank you so much for stopping by and I hope to perform for you all live at a sold out show one day! Much Love! -Sir JefFREEy5D

story:
The Bodies are trying to record!

The Bodies (Peter Mulcahy Jr., Kirby Vitek, Kelly Carlin--drone pop band based in Harrisonburg, VA) are trying to record our first LP and are facing costs for: mixing, mastering, studio time, etc. Any contribution you could make would be fantastic and we would be extremely grateful. Every dollar counts and we want to be able to share our new music with you! 

 our first EP can be downloaded here ---> https://thebodies.bandcamp.com/


Plans for the album include:

  • A complete full length album with ten new songs
  • Using instruments and effects we've previously never recorded with in order to drive our sound further
  • An entirely new (and louder/better!) direction for us


Other Ways You Can Help:

  • Come out to shows and look for us on tour this spring/early summer!
  • Listen to the record when it comes out!
  • Keep supporting the band with your generous love <3


Thanks!

story:
If you haven't been to Chicago's Pilsen neighborhood lately, you're really missing out!

Pilsen offers almost everything you could ever want: great food, fantastic shopping, hip coffee shops, art galleries, and friendly people. However, one thing it DOESN'T have is a record store.  That is, until now!

Hi, my name is Scott Schaaf, and I'm the owner of Pinwheel Records, an independent record store and event space. 

Pinwheel Records opens this summer, right in the heart of Pilsen on 18th street. Pinwheel Records will be a retail music shop offering new and used records, vinyl accessories, turntables, speakers, music-related collectibles, used CDs, art, and a variety of knick knacks. The store will also serve as an event space and will host in-store performances by national and local artists.

My goal is simple – to sell a wide selection of music products to fans and collectors and to provide a comfortable atmosphere for customers to browse inventory and enjoy music.

Through your generous support of this campaign, we'll be able to purchase some of the basic equipment necessary to get Pinwheel Records off the ground - fixtures, furniture, a cash register, a sound system, signage, and most importantly inventory!

Check out a preview of some of our perks below!


: 

Here's a preview of the design for the Pinwheel tote bag:


Disclaimer: Designs subject to change.

Sizes: 
T-shirts are available in women's sizes: S-XL and men's sizes S-3XL

Baseball T-shirts are available in men's sizes: S-2XL

Zip Up Hoodies are available in men's sizes: S-3XL

story:
Dreaming in Stereo is a critically acclaimed band from Miami FL that released 2 albums that burst through the indie scene and are still played on College Radio stations all over the world.  Leader Fernando Perdomo moved to Los Angeles but still has Dreaming in Stereo in his heart. Dreaming in Stereo will reunite on July 25th for the world famous International Pop Overthow festival on July 25th 2015. Marisol Rivero, Eddie Zyne, and Vincent Cuevas need to get to LA for the show. We need you for that. We will also be recording a new 2 song single while we are there. We would like to do Vinyl for the single so lets raise money for that as well.. We also need to raise money to get it mixed. 

LETS DO THIS 

FERNANDO, MARISOL, EDDIE, AND VINCENT

DREAMING IN STEREO!!!

story:
Brief Summary

We are a rock group from Jasper, Al looking to release our first album. Music has always been our biggest passion. We are determined to make a name of ourselves, but have had some financial issues along the way. We are almost done with our album, but have hit a snag with costs.

What We Need & What You Get

  • One weekend in the studio (three days at $100/day) to finish final four songs.
  • Album production. Album production is not cheap. We are looking at $1700 to produce 1000 copies (including cases, booklets, bar codes, and online distribution).
  • By donating, you will not only help us out tremendously, but also get several perks.

Risks & Challenges

  • Obviously, as musicians, we know that money can be tight. What we are hoping for is a little alleviation from the growing amount of finances we're staring at ahead with both recording and touring.
  • We will be selling new merch and booking shows in the very near future in order to obtain income.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share, share, share!
  • Happen to like our music? We accept your love and support as well at www.facebook.com/throneofedenband and throneofeden.bandcamp.com

story:
Short Summary

Last year, 130 attendees from all around the world gathered at LambdaConf 2014 for a day of incredible workshops and presentations on functional programming. Unfortunately, we had no budget for recording the talks, so all that remains of LambdaConf 2014 is a collection of slide decks, code snippets, blogs, and tweets.

This year for LambdaConf 2015, we tried very hard to find a commercial sponsor for video. While we found a handful of companies interested in helping us reimburse travel expenses for speakers, we were unable to find any companies willing and able to sponsor the very substantial costs of video recording and production.

So based on the suggestions of attendees, we are trying something different: crowdfunding! We have 70 talks, and more than 70 hours of amazing content, most of it completely unique to LambdaConf! We want every single talk recorded and published online free of charge for generations of programmers to learn from!

Sound exciting? Then please help us reach our goal!

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $15k to have Confreaks record and produce all talks at LambdaConf 2015. Confreaks has given us an amazing discount, more than 50% off their normal rates, because they want all this awesome material shared with the world, too!
  • The full videos will be released free of charge under the Commons Creative license (with speaker copyright). We will delay their public release for 60 days as a way of thanking contributors and giving them early access to the material.
  • We've got amazing perks for contributors, including early access to all recorded talks, digital wallpapers, posters, t-shirts, and even discounts and VIP tickets for next year! There's something for everyone and for every budget.
  • Whether we reach the full goal of $15k or not, your funds will always and only be used for paying for the actual costs of video recording and production. If we do not reach our target, that leaves a shortage that organizers will have to find a way to fill.

The Impact

Talks on functional programming are viewed thousands, sometimes tens of thousands of times — all within the first year! The potential reach of LambdaConf's 70 hours of content is enormous, and can do wonders for making functional programming accessible to a large, international audience.

Risks & Challenges

Confreaks has an excellent reputation in the industry, having successfully recorded and produced video for RailsConf, MountainWest RubyConf, Lone Star Ruby Conf, and numerous others. They know exactly what they're doing and will deliver a high-quality result that will make contributors proud of the impact they made.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't able to contribute, don't worry! We still want you to enjoy the benefits of this campaign — learning from all the amazing content at LambdaConf 2015!

Instead, if you can't contribute financially, we ask that you help promote this campaign to your social and professional networks, your colleagues, and your open source friends! Every referral counts and will help us reach our goal!

For an easy way to promote, use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Meet Bailame!

Check this Bailame's Preview

"Bailame" is the most recent song of La Mano de Parisi. It is our second single and now we are working in the videoclip! But we really need your help to make this dream come true, so we can continue improving, while rocking with the best energy!


Who are we?

Checkout our first single "Que Nada te Detenga"

Que Nada te Detenga - La Mano de Parisi

Checkout two singles from our online concert "A Contraluz"

Nosotros (En vivo - A Contraluz) - La Mano de Parisi

Veo (En vivo - A Contraluz) - La Mano de Parisi

[La mano de Parisi...] born in 2013. The desire of some music students is to do what they love most, while working with people and friends who want to be part of thier story.

This story begings with four musicians, Paul, Jeremy, Sergio and Juan. Between laughter and sadness (fortunately more laughs than tears) forged friendships, shared experiences, dreams and ideas became the songs.

The name comes from the history of Parisi, a French string quartet musicians who seriously injured one of his hands. It is unknown if he could play again, but the story is so shocking to us, that we decided  as a tribute use the name "The Hand of Parisi",  a tribute that is not just for the musican, but for the concept of being a musician, the sacrifices that accompany the profession, dreams that inspire and the melody that grants a chorus of satisfaction.

In march 2015 we created “Que Nada te Detenga” our first single. This videoclip was

made by students of the Universidad de la Sabana, great friends who are now also working on the production of a new single, "Bailame".

Thanks to another great team from the Universidad de la Sabana we performed a live session online via our concert "A Contraluz" that will soon be released.

With much effort and passion and with the support of many people we will move forward to achieve our first album and grow professionally.

The project:

Our project is to create a music video for our new and second single "Bailame". It is a high quality project that needs your support to be performed. We have been working on the song since the beginning of the year, creating a wonderful idea which is the product of hard work and effort.

¿How we are going to make it?

Making a videoclip costs a lot of money, because we need to pay for all of the production and the technical requirements, and another things.

But we are not alone in this journey, we have an excellent working group, a production team composed of Audiovisual Communication students who are taking this Project on as their thesis.

This allows us to recieve many important things for the development, as human talent and other equipment are delivered by their school. We have been working on this since the beginning of the year, and we have the cooperation of many people, but we need a little more support to conclude this story, we need $ 1500 US dollars, with this we can finish our music video.

We want to make this posible, but we need your support.

Learn more about “Bailame”

“Bailame” It is a song that requires much effort because of the concept.

The main idea of the videoclip is:

"A bar of the 20s, where glamor of those who laugh and enjoy are interrupted by the presence of a woman who wakes temptation in them, thus creating chaos and foring the bar goers to face their animal instincts"

The elegance that characterizes the selected time, but also social problems and political changes which covered this decade, are justifying the adaptation of the video at a bar in the 20s, where the strength, power and energy of the song can excel. Approached from an exaggeration and harmony in action with the essence of the absurd, the imagination will complement the song and a great product will be achieved.

How we are going to use the money?

We already have the space and recording equipment but the art department demands much more work and money to complete the  video concept. With your help we can make it posible and get a high quality product. The money will be used primarily in this area.

The plan:

We want to keep growing as a band, sound at all major stations, satisfy our audience and especially continue producing quality music.

“Bailame” It is a wonderful idea that can go far, if we raise over the goal for this project, we will be very happy, because we can use this money to fund surpluses like food for the video, advertise our work and even to record a new videoclip for our next single, and more many things that will grow all our effort.

grow professionally.
The project:

Our project is to create a music video
for our new and second single "Bailame". It is a high quality project
that needs your support to be performed. We have been working on the song since
the beginning of the year, creating a wonderful idea which is the product of
hard work and effort.
¿How we are going to make it?
Making a videoclip costs a lot of
money, because we need to pay for all of the production and the technical
requirements, and another things. 
But we are not alone in this journey,
we have an excellent working group, a production team composed of Audiovisual
Communication students who are taking this Project on as their thesis. 
This allows us to recieve many
important things for the development, as human talent and other equipment are
delivered by their school. We have been working on this since the beginning of
the year, and we have the cooperation of many people, but we need a little more
support to conclude this story, we need $ 1500 US dollars, with this we can
finish our music video.
We want to make this posible, but we
need your support. 

Learn more about “Bailame”

“Bailame” It is a song that requires
much effort because of the concept. 
The main idea of the videoclip is:

"A bar of the 20s, where glamor of those who laugh and enjoy are
interrupted by the presence of a woman who wakes temptation in them, thus
creating chaos and foring the bar goers to face their animal instincts"

The elegance that characterizes the
selected time, but also social problems and political changes which covered
this decade, are justifying the adaptation of the video at a bar in the 20s,
where the strength, power and energy of the song can excel. Approached from an
exaggeration and harmony in action with the essence of the absurd, the
imagination will complement the song and a great product will be achieved.

How we are going to use the money?
We already have the space and
recording equipment but the art department demands much more work and money to
complete the  video concept. With your
help we can make it posible and get a high quality product. The money will be
used primarily in this area.
The plan: 
We want to keep growing as a band,
sound at all major stations, satisfy our audience and especially continue producing
quality music.
“Bailame” It is a wonderful idea that
can go far, if we raise over the goal for this project, we will be very happy,
because we can use this money to fund surpluses like food for the video,
advertise our work and even to record a new videoclip for our next single, and more many
things that will grow all our effort.

story:
Who We Are

Speakrs is an Indie-Pop collaboration between songwriter/producers Izaac Burkhart and Daniel Smith.  Hailing from the same hometown suburb of Minneapolis, MN the duo have been long-time friends, as well as musical associates. Expanding on the idea of a sort of “musical think-tank,” the two desired an open writing environment that placed a premium on creative liberty and a return to a simpler, less restrictive style of production. These sessions gathered a natural momentum and took shape into what would become their debut album, “Afterglow.”

What We’ve Done

We want to introduce Speakrs  to the world and create excitement about our debut release!

The Afterglow EP was entirely self-produced and engineered by us. (Izaac and Dan). The plan has been to lay the groundwork and create a sample of our vision before gathering support for the project. As totally independent artists, it can be tough to find effective ways to promote new projects; we knew an Indiegogo campaign would be the perfect way.  We are proud to introduce you to these 5 songs and excited to gather resources to bring you a debut full length!

What We Hope To Do

Our goal is two-fold:

·  First: To celebrate the release of our debut EP “Afterglow” with all of you  

   and send it out into the world with a bang!

·   Second: To bring you a debut full length record, made up of 10 all new

     tracks, by Fall 2016!

To paint it in broad strokes, we are ambitious, entrepreneurial musicians with access to limited resources. I know we are not alone, hence the massive popularity of crowd-funding. For the many of us in this category, it can be a lengthy and risky adventure creating a record at the independent level. We want to shorten the wait and keep the momentum alive. But beyond any of those reasons, we want you all to be a part of the process this time around! We hope the 5 songs off Afterglow inspire you to give your attention and support. With your help, we will be bringing you a debut full length this time next year!

Take a look at the “Perks” section to see all of the ways we have planned to keep you involved and up-to-date on the making of the record. We believe strongly in the potential of the project and accomplishing this will be a huge investment in the future of Speakrs!

Please enjoy the content we've made for the campaign and share the record release with your friends!

story:
Who Am I & how I got here:

My name is Joshua Long from Baltimore, Maryland.  At the humble age of 29 I am a professional Musician, lover of all things spiritual, Unitarian Universalist, Progressive Christian, and a Tai Chi student. 

Oh! And I still like to watch dragon ball z! LOL!

I currently serve at the Unitarian Universalist Church of Annapolis where I am Director of Contemporary Music & Music director for AWAKE ministries. I also play piano and direct the choir at Saint Lukes United Methodist church in Reiserstown, MD. I gig regularly and teach music lessons in the Baltimore Metro Area. 

“All God’s Children” is a testament to what I believe about humanity. We are all created beings on this planet, evolved over billions of years and brought into this very moment for a purpose. Over my 29 years of existence I have learned some valuable lessons along my journey, and as one of God’s children I want to share this little bit of wisdom with the rest of my family. I truly believe this music will impact lives and empower souls for the better. 

The Reaching Out Campaign will allow me to make this dream a reality. Just as my song says “I can’t do this on my own”; I need your help.

The Journey Ahead: Here is how your contributions can help me. 

Recording - I have to finish the project which does take funds. Professional studio to record drums is important.

Mastering - The universe has blessed me with the ability to write, record, and mix my own album. But this music needs to pass through other ears before it is ready for release. 

Website - Facebook and Instagram are great but to take my career to the next level I am going to need a webpage dedicated to my work. 

Pressing - Physical and Digital. CD duplication can be quite costly, sometimes over a grand. But with the audience I am marketing to I know that physical CDs will be extremely valuable in revenue stream. I will also be uploading music to iTunes, Spotify, and other digital markets.

Fees - Copyrights, legal, Advertising, publishing. 

Photos & Artwork - I-Phone camera just doesn't cut it

Merchandise - Stickers & Wristbands! (yay!)


The Impact

Ever since I became a Unitarian Universalist I noticed there was a lack of exciting music in liberal religion. In America it seems like spiritual music is dominated by Evangelical Christian society,  whether it is a sing along pop rock hit on the radio or vibrant gospel music. And while i love both types and am inspired immensely by them (I love Hillsong & Israel Houghton), I want to see some more progressive music for a liberal and new thought audience. I want to spread something positive and inspirational that speaks to people of all faiths. I am not on some crusade to change all religious music, I just want to add another side to the story that has been there for thousands of years. 

There was a report this year that the “Nones” in America, people who have no religious affiliation, are on the rise. There is a very large group of people in America who believe to be religious they have to hate their gay friends, destroy the environment, or even ignore who they really are so they want nothing to do with religion all together. There are churches that have LBGT ministers. There are churches where half the congregation are atheist or don’t believe in the literal virgin birth. Even if church just isn't for you I hope that these songs can speak to your soul. 

Releasing this album will bring me one step closer to see more of this type of sacred  music. Once the album is completed I can start looking to publish my music, getting into hymnals and worship repertoire. writing for other artist, producing other new thought composers, touring and playing this music in other cities and churches. Licensing songs for film, tv, and advertising would also be a possibility. The key point is that I need to put this music out there and let it do whatever the spirit will have it do.  


Other Ways You Can Help

Please share with everyone you come across. Even if you can’t contribute, being present and just spreading the word will do so much for this music. The positive energy you put out will come back to you. 

I love you and appreciate you just for taking time to look at this page. Please be blessed and may the God of your understanding grant you peace today. 

Thank You!!!


Links to Music:

Reaching Out: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YpXSoHDKUG4

Mystery Acoustic: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y-ijGNBjgKM

Blue Sky Snippet/Lyric Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sdGr68aoBNg

story:
Über mich

Mein Name ist Andreas Ploner. Ich komme aus Innsbruck/Österreich und bin 21 Jahre alt. Seit 2007 spiele ich leidenschaftlich Snooker.

Mein Ziel ist es, mich für die Snooker Main Tour, die Profi Liga zu qualifizieren, was bisher noch kein Österreicher geschafft hat.

Um meinen Traum, Snooker Profi zu werden, zu erfüllen, ist ein Sieg bei der Amateur Europa- oder Weltmeisterschaft nötig. Auch andere internationale Turniere, wie die QSchool in England sind eine Qualifikationsmöglichkeit.

Leider sind die Trainingsbedingungen in Österreich nicht optimal. Deshalb bin ich auf Trainingsaufenthalte in England angewiesen. Dort kann ich mich dank guter Tische und Gegner optimal auf Turniere vorbereiten.


Meine größten Erfolge

National

  • Staatsmeister Herren 2012 und 2013
  • Österreichischer Meister U21 2012 und 2013

International

  • 5. Platz Herren Europameisterschaft 2014 in Sofia, Bulgarien
  • 9. Platz U21 Europameisterschaft 2012 in Sofia, Bulgarien
  • Last 64 bei European Tour Event 1 August 2014 in Riga, Lettland



Wofür verwende ich Deine Spende?

  • Trainingsaufenthalte in der Star Snooker Academy in Sheffield, England
  • Kosten für Turniere (Startgeld, Reisekosten, Übernachtungskosten, usw.)


Budget

Stufe 1

Mein erstes Ziel ist die Teilnahme an der QSchool in England. Diese findet im Mai statt und ist eine der besten Möglichkeiten einen Platz auf der Main Tour zu gewinnen. Es besteht aus zwei Turnieren, die im K.o. - Modus gespielt werden. Die Halbfinalisten aus den Turnieren werden mit einem Main Tour Ticket für zwei Jahre belohnt.
Insgesamt werden sich die Kosten für die QSchool auf ca. 2.000€ belaufen. Darin enthalten sind sowohl die Kosten fürs Turnier, als auch Trainings in der Star Snooker Academy in Sheffield.

Stufe 2

Für eine komplette Saison benötige ich ca. 15.000€. Damit kann ich an allen Turnieren teilnehmen, die ich mir vornehme:
  • Österreichische Ranglisten Turniere (Grand Prix, Qualifikation zur Staatsmeisterschaft und zu Europa- und Weltmeisterschaften)
  • European Tour - Profi Turnierserie, an der auch Amateure teilnehmen können
  • Pro Ams - Offene Turniere, an denen sowohl Profis als auch Amateure teilnehmen dürfen (z.B.: Vienna Snooker Open, Innsbruck Snooker Open,...)
  • mehrere Trainingsaufenthalte in der Star Snooker Academy in Sheffield

Stufe 3

Alles was darüber hinausgeht, verwende ich für eine noch intensivere Saison. Mehr Turniere, mehr Trainingsaufenthalte, bessere Chancen, den Sprung auf die Main Tour zu schaffen!

Wie kannst Du mir sonst noch helfen?

Nicht nur mit einer Spende kannst du mir helfen. Ein einfacher Klick auf den "Teilen" und/oder "Tweet"-Button auf der linken Seite würde mir bereits sehr helfen.

Vielen Dank für deine Unterstützung!

(Bald kommen noch mehr Perks! :) )

story:
Make Music New York is a unique festival of 1,000+ free concerts in public spaces throughout the five boroughs of New York City, all on June 21st, the first day of summer.

This year, MMNY launches our first ever crowd-sourced commissioning project! Your donation to our IndieGoGo campaign will help pay for the commissioning of a Concerto for Buildings for full orchestra and 24 percussionists composed separately by four composers, and the production of the concert on June 21, 2015.

The Project

At 2pm on June 21, 2015, two New York City-based youth ensembles (Face The Music and Mantra Youth Percussion) will take over Greene St. at Broome St. to perform a concert featuring a 30-minute Concerto for Buildings — a new work for full orchestra and 24 percussionists comprised of four separate movements by four composers: Paula Matthusen (winner of the 2014-2015 Rome Prize), Scott Wollshleger, Daniel Goode, and Elijah Valongo (a student-composer in Face The Music).


Jenny Undercofler (director, Face The Music)
talks about the commission

The Kaufman Center's Face The Music is the only youth ensemble in the U.S. dedicated to the creation and performance of music by living composers. The 200+ member group has taken its place as a full-fledged player in New York City’s vibrant contemporary classical scene, rapidly becoming what Allan Kozinn of the New York Times has called “a force in the New York new-music world.”

Mantra Youth Percussion is the first youth percussion ensemble of its kind exclusively dedicated to the creation and performance of 21st century music. MYP seeks to foster the next generation of performers through collaborations with living composers, high-level ensemble playing, and diverse performance opportunities with an emphasis on creativity and artistry.  

Of this MMNY commission, Jenny Undercofler (director, Face The Music) explains:

This is an incredibly unique experience for the kids, this idea of creating a piece that is actually using part of the infrastructure of the city. This is music that deeply belongs to the kids... it's music that's being created now, it's music that's being created for them to play, and it's also music that is directly part of their city!


Aaron Friedman explains the project

The Concerto for Buildings concept began as the Make Music Winter SoHo Gamelan Walk, created by composer Daniel Goode. SoHo is known for its large number of 19th-century, cast-iron-fronted buildings. “The buildings make nice, lovely, drum-like sounds,” Goode explains. “The facades are basically hollow, and musicians are attracted to things that are hollow.” 

“The wonder of cast iron,” says Simeon Bankoff, executive director of the Historic Districts Council, in a December 2014 Wall Street Journal article about the SoHo Gamelan Walk, “is that you could put on this extraordinarily elaborate facade that was not structural and could be created by a machine, with all manners of architectural embellishment.” 


watch an excerpt from the SoHo Gamelan Walk

For this Concerto for Buildings, the composers will use the percussive qualities of the buildings (with the help of 24 percussionists), combining those timbres and pitches with a full orchestra set-up in the street! It will truly be unlike any other musical work.

What We Need
& What You Get

We are asking our community of friends and supporters to help us make history, help create an unforgettable experience for New York City, and help bring a singular and engaging piece of music to life. By contributing to this campaign you will be funding the composers who are writing these works, the rental of a professional sound system and personnel, instrument rental, music stands, chairs, and tents for the kids and their instruments.

With your donations, you can receive:

  • CD/download of the live performance
  • Tshirt and a printed event poster
  • signed copy of the score
  • invitation to exclusive party at a SoHo loft
  • dinner at a SoHo restaurant
  • private concert for you and your friends
  • and more!

The Impact

The direct benefits of contributing to the creation of a new piece of classical music, beyond enjoying the performance, are perhaps not as tangible as, say, donating to a campaign to create a new, more amazing watch. But for classical music itself, support from individuals to create new works is vital. Without the financial support of people throughout the ages, we would not have many of the great works that define the western musical canon.

The creation of new works in the classical field is what keeps the genre vibrant. It is what injects new life into an old art form.

In the Concerto for Buildings, there is the added benefit of bringing to life a new piece of classical music performed by youth ensembles. 

Literally nowhere else in the world are there not one, but two contemporary ensembles for kids focused completely on the creation and performance of new classical music. We are fortunate to live in such a place as New York City. The students in these two groups are equally fortunate to have the opportunity to work on complex music written by living composers — and more often than not, to learn from them directly. 

This new work will not only give the students the opportunity to work directly with high-level composers, but it will give the students, as their director Jenny Undercofler says, "a little secret access to get do something they wouldn't get to do otherwise... because who gets to drum on buildings!"

As well, for all three organizations — Make Music New York, Face The Music, and Mantra Youth Percussion — this will be the first major commission the groups have been able to undertake, either individually or collectively. Undercofler explains that Face The Music does not get the chance to commission music, largely for financial reasons, so "for us to participate in a collective commissioning project is exciting because it allows us to access new work by grown-up composers, that's brand new work and that is something we don't get to do enough of!"

Thank you for reading about our project! Please consider supporting it and perhaps as importantly... please, please share our campaign on social media. The more eyes that can view this campaign, the better!

Many, many thanks.

The Make Music New York Team!

For this Concerto for Buildings, the composers will use the percussive qualities of the buildings (with the help of 24 percussionists), combining those timbres and pitches with a full orchestra set-up in the street! It will truly be unlike any other musical work.
