story:
Hello! We are Wam Dingis. This is a campaign to help realize our music video concept for our new single - ‘Dark Parlor.’ Although the global pandemic has hit us all hard and we can no longer play shows to source funding for our band’s projects, we refuse to let it stop us from making awesome music and content. We’ve been working hard to write and create new music for our upcoming album, with the recent release of our new single, ‘Dark Parlor.’ We want to find a way to share our music and art in a way for everyone to enjoy from home with this new music video. 

We aspire to take our creative processes to the next level with every sense of professionalism. In order to achieve this result, we need your help to cover production expenses, while supporting other industry professionals that will need to be involved.

ABOUT US

Originally established in 2002, Wam Dingis is the Los Angeles foursome composed of Jor Avila, Mindy Dymin, Darren Cochran, and Angela Vasquez. With their gleefully warbled guitars, swirling strings, scorching keys, and frenetic rhythms - Wam Dingis conjures melodic art rock with undeniable pop hooks and an energy that is simply contagious.

Wam Dingis is the friction between silk and velvet. The mixture of pink and lime green. The image you must cross your eyes to see...the flight of champagne bubbles, the squeal of a tea kettle, the dream you remember having. The animal that pets you.

- Christian Koons of Song Exploder, Flood Magazine, The Dinner Party, and Goon

What We Need & What You Get

We invite you, our fans, friends, and friends of friends, to participate in this project. In return for your support at any level, we have prepared a plethora of exclusive experiences, merchandise, memorabilia, and more as listed below:

Merchandise

  1. Wam Dingis ‘Footkini’ Mugs 
  2. Special Edition Wam Dingis 7” Vinyl with 'Pretty is Fancy' + 'Pink Lime Green' 
  3. CDs 
  4. Handmade Footkini Pipe 
  5. Wam Dingis Vinyl Stickers
  6. Screen Printed Tote Bag 
  7. Hats 
  8. Screen Printed Masks 
  9. Screen Printed T-Shirts
  10. Wam Dingis Buttons 
  11. Wam Dingis Zines by Moonbox
  12. Wam Dingis Key Chains
  13. Wam Dingis USB Slap Bracelet 

Memorabilia 

  1. Autographed Yamaha Black Bass used in show and broken - $200
  2. Autographed Jet King Ibanez Guitar - $650
  3. Autographed Drumsticks - $50
  4. Autographed Zebra Fur Pearl Rack Tom Drum - $250
  5. Army Green Jumpsuit Worn at Wam Dingis Show (Size S) - $150
  6. Wam Dingis Leather Jacket Used in Music Video - $200
  7. Handwritten Lyrics - $50

Once in a Lifetime Perks, You Won't Find Anywhere Else

  1. Reliquary - Locks of Hair from Jordan or Darren - $50
  2. Darren’s Wisdom Tooth Resin Necklace - $100
  3. Wam Dingis Wooden Rings by Darren - $50
  4. Personalized Caricature of anything by Jor - $25
  5. Personalized Caricature of you or your pet by Darren - $80
  6. Commissioned Portrait Painting by Jordan - $300
  7. Personalized Song by Jordan - $200
  8. Jordan shaves his head - $500
  9. Footkini Fetish Photos of Wam Dingis Member Feet - $250
 

Zoom Master Class w/ Wam Dingis

  1. 1 hr Painting Class - $120
  2. 45 min. Guitar - $60
  3. 45 min. Bass - $60
  4. 45 min. Drums - $60

Choose Your Own Adventure 

  1. Photo Opp with the Band - $100
  2. 3 hr. Champagne Brunch Date w/ Wam Dingis - $750 
  3. 30 min. Livestream on Wam Dingis IG ft. You as Guest - $100
  4. Private Rooftop Concert for you + 5 friends - $1000
  5. Pearson Brother Wine Adventure Date for you + 5 friends w/ Wam Dingis - $1500
  6. Have Your Name Tattooed on Darren or Jordan - $1000
  7. 45 min. Zoom Date AMA (Ask Me Anything) w/ Band - $150
  8. Music Video Premier VIP Invite - $1500
  9. Advanced Rooftop or Boulevard Bar Lot Screening of Dark Parlor Video
  10. Girl’s Night Out with Wam Dingis 

Be in the Music Video

  1. Credit Shoutout
  2. Be an Extra
  3. Product Placement Sponsorship
  4. Early Access Viewing 
  5. Wam Dingis - Early Access or Previews to Unreleased Songs

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate your support at any level and are eternally grateful, even if you are unable to contribute financially. Just spreading the word and sharing a link to this campaign would make us happy campers.

story:
*Version française ci-dessous

 

Who is here?

Super Opong Stars (previously Kyekyeku and Ghanalogue Highlife ) arose from the will to carry on, engage and evolve. Led by Kyekyeku, SOS believes that given the chance in the face of global lockdowns and greater inactivity musically, their contributions to culture and the socio-economic space can be immense through their music; Highlife - a style of African popular music evolving from the ’20s and later influencing a host of other African styles including Afrobeat with leading musicians including Ebo Taylor, Ambolley, Pat Thomas, The African Brothers Band, ET Mensah etc.

In the last few years, Kyekyeku and his projects have brought their beautiful form of Highlife to a wide and varied audience outside its home country; Ghana.  In the process, performing in venues and festivals including Sauti Za Busara (Zanzibar), Montreux Jazz (Switzerland) Latitude (UK) Pirineos Sur (Spain) Kasumama (Austria) Canaria Jazz ( Canary Islands) Etnosur(Spain) Joy of Jazz (South Africa), New morning (France), etc with hard work and mostly without a dedicated booker, agency or label.

Kyekyeku's evolution has been greatly influenced by the experienced learned on this journey as well as the happenings in the global space in the last 2 years where society has changed a lot resulting in less music and less cultural activities. Consolidated into Super Opong Stars now, the evolution into a new sphere reflects Highlife music itself as it withstood the test of time and obstacles. 

In advancing, Kyekyeku brings Super Opong Stars to explore the heritage and sonorities of this resilient music form with excitement and passion on an all-new album!

 

A brief description of our campaign and why it's important to us.

This Crowdfunder asks to support our a new studio album which goes on Vinyl, effectively getting us ready to meet the world again and share happiness together with friends far and near, known and unknown.

The magnitude of what your contributors will help us achieve.

  • It ensures that when finally our world marches again, we can make music a big part of it and that our music stands a chance to be out there and to be heard.
  • Your contributions go a long way to help us realize our dreams and push on further.
  • Contributing to this Crowdfunder cements the ideal that the audience and musician are becoming ever closer in the realization of the future music and culture.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Minimum 7500 Euros is needed   

  • Recording (Process started already)
  • Mixing
  • Mastering
  • Vinyl pressing
  • CD Digipack
  • online stream upload

 

Perks  and what you get

In fact, there are some really cool and lovely perks that are designed to get as close to you and you to us as possible.

  • Album: CD DIGIPACK
  • Album: Digital Download
  • Album: Vinyl
  • Combinations of Vinyl, CD, Download 
  • One Big exciting secret Perk will be announced in the last week of April

Not reaching our entire goal means things are more difficult than they are now, and sadly we may not realize our dream.

 

What's more on our Crowdfunder?

You have self-produced 2 albums, why not do the same for this one?

It was a good experience to learn how it all comes together, in the album-making process. we learned a lot. Currently, we would also love to have other hands make input in our art. This album presents the perfect opportunity.

Any Specific reason why you are recording at a specific studio?

For this album unlike the first two, we are chasing specific sonorities that are quite unique and fit our style of music very well. We got recommended by a producer in France to check out the guys at Philophon. Once we did, we were convinced that was the sound we wanted. Now as the studio moved from Berlin to Ghana, we have the chance to bring our musicians in and finally make that album! However, their module of work meant it was not possible to record as an outside project which is not under their record label. so we had to persist.  

Joy sounds studios, looks great, and mostly produces their own in-house band, How did you go to them as an outsider?

It would nearly impossible to bring all the band to Germany to record especially now that tours were not happening, it would mean to put off recording until at least 2 years after. Fortunately, Philophon moved from Germany to Ghana a bit over a year ago and that met our ethos head-on. To record in Ghana, and still have the 70's sonics. There are great studios in Ghana but most are very contemporary in sound which is great but for this album, it has to fit specific sonic which only Joy Sounds can give. They are serious people and we are glad that finally they saw our seriousness as well and offered to break their rule for once to produce our album as a non-label project.

So you are recording at Philophon’s Joy Sounds Studio, why not just use any basic studio?

We are very sure of what we are going for, it meets our ideas and taste and we know everyone will love it as well when this album is done, any basic studio would never get us this amazing sound and character!

What feelings do you have about your album, can we trust it’s any good

​We are very elated over this album, when we did the tracking, without the mix we were already amazed at the color of sound that came with it, These wonderful style-defining songs we have deserve to carry the perfect character when recorded. We dare be biased and say the album is incredibly good, great Highlife, great Afrofunk, Great Afro Party, and more as it was and should be!

You are weird, it's as if the pandemic means nothing to you! You haven’t mentioned it all?

It's true, the Covid- 19 pandemic has impacted everyone so negatively that for us it's a bit ''selfish'' to talk about it but in truth like most musicians and artists, we have been heavily affected by it. Not performing means many things artistically, economically and psychologically.

There is a global pandemic with no economic activity, people do not have money, why do you ask for donations?

​No, it's not the perfect time to ask for money, however, we believe that to get society onto a more serene life again, we can all contribute in no small way to help put the smiles back on our faces. It's not strictly money, but also to share our message to your circles, sharing the campaign and helping move it around goes a long way to support us.

 

Delivery of Perks.

All shipping and postage will be made in August, reception of perks will therefore depend on distance from France. However, by mid-September, all shipments should have arrived.

Downloads will be available as soon as the album is ready for release which on our timeline is in August 2021.

 

VERSION FRANCAISE

 

Qui est là?

Super Opong Stars (anciennement Kyekyeku et Ghanalogue Highlife) sont nés de la volonté de continuer, de s'engager et d'évoluer. Dirigé par Kyekyeku, SOS estime que, étant donné la chance face aux verrouillages mondiaux et à une plus grande inactivité musicale, leurs contributions à la culture et à l'espace socio-économique peuvent être immenses à travers leur musique; Highlife -un style de musique populaire africaine évoluant à partir des années 20 et plus tard influençant une foule d'autres styles africains, y compris l'afrobeat avec des musiciens de premier plan tels que Ebo Taylor, Ambolley, Pat Thomas, The African Brothers Band, ET Mensah, etc.

Ces dernières années, Kyekyeku et ses projets ont apporté leur belle forme de Highlife à un public large et varié en dehors de son pays d'origine; Ghana. Dans le processus, se produisant dans des salles et des festivals tels que Sauti Za Busara (Zanzibar), Montreux Jazz (Suisse) Latitude (Royaume-Uni) Pirineos Sur (Espagne) Kasumama (Autriche) Canaria Jazz (Îles Canaries) Etnosur (Espagne) Joy of Jazz (Sud Afrique), New Morning (France), etc. avec un travail acharné et la plupart du temps sans booker, agence ou label dédié.

L'évolution de Kyekyeku a été grandement influencée par l'expérience acquise au cours de ce voyage ainsi que par les événements dans l'espace mondial au cours des 2 dernières années où la société a beaucoup changé, ce qui a entraîné moins de musique et moins d'activités culturelles. Consolidé comme Super Opong Stars maintenant, l'évolution dans une nouvelle sphère reflète la musique Highlife elle-même alors qu'elle a résisté à l'épreuve du temps et des obstacles.

 

Une brève description de notre campagne et pourquoi elle est importante pour nous.

Ce Crowdfunder est un appel à soutenir notre tout premier album Studio professionnel qui sera également sur vinyle, une première étape pour nous préparer à retrouver le monde et à partager de la joie avec des amis lointains et proches, connus et inconnus.
L'ampleur de ce que vos contributeurs nous aideront à réaliser.


L'ampleur de ce que vos contributeurs nous aideront à réaliser.

 

  • Cela garantit que lorsque finalement notre monde sera de retour à la normale, nous aurons l'opportunité de faire partie de la musique qui aura une chance d'être vue et entendue.
  • Vos contributions nous aident grandement à réaliser nos rêves et à ne pas abandonner.
  • Contribuer à ce Crowdfunder cimente l'idéal selon lequel que le public et le musicien se rapprochent de plus en plus dans la création du futur de la musique et de la culture.

 
Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous obtenez

Un minimum de 7500 euros est nécessaire
• Enregistrement
• Mix
• Master
• Pressage de vinyle
• CD Digipack
• diffusion de l'album sur les platformes en ligne

Ne pas atteindre notre objectif total signifie que les choses seront plus difficiles qu'elles ne le sont déjà, et malheureusement, nous ne réaliserons peut-être pas notre rêve.

 

Qu'y a-t-il de plus sur notre Crowdfunder?

 

Vous avez auto-produit 2 albums, pourquoi ne pas faire de même pour celui-ci?
Ce fut une bonne expérience d'apprendre comment tout cela s'enchaîne, dans le processus de création de l'album. Nous avons beaucoup appris. Actuellement, nous aimerions aussi que d'autres talents participent à notre projet. Cet album en est l'opportunité parfaite.
 

Une raison spécifique pour laquelle vous enregistrez dans un studio spécifique?

Pour cet album contrairement aux deux premiers, nous recherchons des sonorités spécifiques qui sont assez uniques et correspondent très bien à notre style de musique. Nous avons été recommandés par un producteur en France pour voir les gars de Philophon. Une fois que nous l'avons fait, nous avons été convaincus que c'était le son que nous voulions. Maintenant que le studio a déménagé de Berlin au Ghana, nous avons la chance de faire venir nos musiciens et enfin de faire cet album! Cependant, leur module de travail signifiait qu'il n'était pas possible d'enregistrer en tant que projet extérieur qui ne soit pas sous leur label. nous avons donc dû persister.


Joy Sound Studio a fière allure et produit principalement ses  propres groupes en interne, comment êtes-vous allé vers eux en tant qu'artiste extèrieur?

Il serait presque impossible d'amener tout le groupe en Allemagne pour enregistrer, surtout maintenant que les tournées n'avaient pas lieu, cela signifierait reporter l'enregistrement à au moins 2 ans après. Heureusement, Philophon a déménagé d'Allemagne au Ghana il y a un peu plus d'un an et cela a répondu de front à notre philosophie. Enregistrer au Ghana, et avoir toujours les sons des années 70. Il y a de grands studios au Ghana mais la plupart sont très contemporains dans le son, ce qui est génial mais pour cet album, il doit s'adapter à un son spécifique que seul Joy Sounds peut donner. Ce sont des gens sérieux et nous sommes heureux qu’ils aient finalement vu notre sérieux aussi et qu’ils aient proposé de briser leur règle pour une fois pour produire notre album en tant que projet hors label.


Vous enregistrez donc au Joy Sounds Studio de Philophon, pourquoi ne pas utiliser n’importe quel studio basique?
Nous sommes très sûrs de ce que nous recherchons, cela correspond à nos idées et à nos goûts et nous savons que tout le monde l'aimera aussi lorsque cet album sera terminé, aucun studio basique ne nous offrirait ce son et ce caractère incroyables!


Quels sentiments avez-vous à propos de votre album, pouvons-nous avoir confiance qu’il est bon?
Nous sommes très heureux de cet album, quand nous avons fait la prise de son, sans le mix, nous étions déjà étonnés de la couleur du son qui ressortait.Ces merveilleuses chansons qui définissent le style que nous avons, méritent d'avoir la texture sonore parfaite une fois enregistrées. Nous osons être impartials et affirmer que l'album est incroyablement bon, super Highlife, super Afrofunk, Great Afro Party, et plus encore comme il était et devrait être!


Quelle est la particularité des gens qui vous donnent de l'argent, il y a des dizaines d'autres projets qui ont besoin de cet argent?
En vérité, nous voulons partager la fierté de ce futur album phare avec tout le monde, c'est un moyen d'amener les gens à faire partie de notre histoire. I


Vous êtes bizarre, c'est comme si la pandémie ne signifiait rien pour vous! Vous ne l'avez pas tout mentionné?
C'est vrai, la pandémie de Covid-19 a eu un impact si négatif sur tout le monde que pour nous c'est un peu «égoïste» d'en parler mais en vérité, comme la plupart des musiciens et artistes, nous en avons été fortement affectés. Ne pas pouvoir jouer devant un public a un énorme impact artistiquement, économiquement et psychologiquement.


Il y a une pandémie mondiale sans activité économique, les gens n'ont pas d'argent, pourquoi demandez-vous des dons?
C'est vrai, ce n'est pas le moment idéal pour demander de l'argent, cependant, nous pensons que pour ramener la société à une vie plus sereine, nous pouvons tous contribuer de manière non négligeable à redonner le sourire à nos visages. Il ne s'agit pas uniquement d'argent, mais aussi de partager notre message avec vos cercles, partager la campagne parmi vos proches et votre réseau et aider à faire circuler l'information – cela est déjà d'un grand soutien.

 

Avons-nous des avantages pour vous?

En fait, il y a des avantages vraiment cools et sympas qui ont été conçus pour se rapprocher le plus possible de vous et de vous.

  •  Album: CD DIGIPACK
  •  Album: Téléchargement numérique
  •  Album: vinyle
  • Combinaisons de vinyle, CD, téléchargement
  • Une contrepartie secrète sera annoncée la dernière semaine d'avril

 

Livraison des avantages.

Tous les envois et frais de port seront effectués en août, la réception des contreparties dépendra donc de votre situation géographique. Cependant, à la mi-septembre, tous les envois devraient être arrivés.Les téléchargements seront disponibles dès que l'album sera prêt pour la sortie, ce qui sur notre chronologie est en Août 2021.

Nous osons être impartials et affirmer que l'album est incroyablement bon, super Highlife, super Afrofunk, Great Afro Party, et plus encore comme il était et devrait être!
Quelle est la particularité des gens qui vous donnent de l'argent, il y a des dizaines d'autres projets qui ont besoin de cet argent?En vérité, nous voulons partager la fierté de ce futur album phare avec tout le monde, c'est un moyen d'amener les gens à faire partie de notre histoire. I
Vous êtes bizarre, c'est comme si la pandémie ne signifiait rien pour vous! Vous ne l'avez pas tout mentionné?C'est vrai, la pandémie de Covid-19 a eu un impact si négatif sur tout le monde que pour nous c'est un peu «égoïste» d'en parler mais en vérité, comme la plupart des musiciens et artistes, nous en avons été fortement affectés. Ne pas pouvoir jouer devant un public a un énorme impact artistiquement, économiquement et psychologiquement.
Il y a une pandémie mondiale sans activité économique, les gens n'ont pas d'argent, pourquoi demandez-vous des dons?C'est vrai, ce n'est pas le moment idéal pour demander de l'argent, cependant, nous pensons que pour ramener la société à une vie plus sereine, nous pouvons tous contribuer de manière non négligeable à redonner le sourire à nos visages. Il ne s'agit pas uniquement d'argent, mais aussi de partager notre message avec vos cercles, partager la campagne parmi vos proches et votre réseau et aider à faire circuler l'information – cela est déjà d'un grand soutien.
 
Avons-nous des avantages pour vous?
En fait, il y a des avantages vraiment cools et sympas qui ont été conçus pour se rapprocher le plus possible de vous et de vous.

 Album: CD DIGIPACK
 Album: Téléchargement numérique
 Album: vinyle
Combinaisons de vinyle, CD, téléchargement
Une contrepartie secrète sera annoncée la dernière semaine d'avril

 
Livraison des avantages.
Tous les envois et frais de port seront effectués en août, la réception des contreparties dépendra donc de votre situation géographique. Cependant, à la mi-septembre, tous les envois devraient être arrivés.Les téléchargements seront disponibles dès que l'album sera prêt pour la sortie, ce qui sur notre chronologie est en Août 2021.

story:
Hi Beautiful Souls!

I'm an independent artist that loves to create pop, R&B soul music, and I'm heavily inspired by the great iconic George Michael.

In February 2020, I released my first music video for the single “Someone Just Like You”. The song quickly started to gain popularity with my amazing fans across the globe, especially in the UK where it was recognized by UKSC (United Kingdom’s Song Writing Contest) as a Semi-Finalist.

That summer of 2020 I was invited to tour and perform “Someone Just Like You” in the United Kingdom but unfortunately the COVID pandemic hit and the tour was cancelled. Being a new independent artist, it was a big hit to take, as I planned to use those funds, raised from touring and gigs to finance my new music projects.

Due to lack of funds, I began recording cover tunes instead. Here are the three cover tunes I recorded since then;

 You Are So Beautiful - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qivq5K_gIw4

Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h3hjJDX7AKo

Hero - https://youtu.be/i-ARGgoulLE

During that time, I also continued to write and produce four new great original songs in my home studio. I'm excited to finally release my first single  "I Want You Baby". The song has an old school pop vibe, with a modern twist that I know you're going to love!

Being an independent artist, the process to complete the song has taken a little longer. "I Want You Baby" is almost ready for release but requires your help and support to get it to the finish line!

Here's How You Help & What You Get!

I need to cover the additional costs of having the song, mixed and mastered, along with a music video production. 

So I’m gratefully asking for your support and donations to help me release “I Want You Baby".

In return you will receive many great perks for your donations. 

As many of you know I have a profound faith in God and Jesus. My beautiful mother showed me the way, and I’m forever grateful for that.

I’m also sincerely grateful to all the beautiful souls/supporters, that have been a continuous light in my life, supporting my music.

God has given me a gift to enrich lives using my musical talent, that brings meaning, purpose, hope and faith to each and everyone of you. 

From the bottom of my heart thank you for supporting me in any possible way and may God bless you.

Antonio 

Visit My Website @ www.antoniodidiano.com

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/antonioofficialfanpage/

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/antonio.didiano

P.S. If you can only do one thing - please share the campaign with your entire social networks!

story:
Summary

     In June of 2017, I released my very first Hip-hop album titled Raindrop under the name Luke Wayne.  My intentions for the album were a project that was void of any profanity and had a strong focus on spirituality and the God within all of us.  I see water as something pure and transparent which is what I wanted the album to represent.  All 13 tracks were written, produced, recorded, mixed, and mastered by myself.  It took about 4 months of working on the album every day to complete it.  The first month was spent making beats and writing to them in my dorm in San Francisco, CA while studying Music Production at The Academy of Art University.  Once every song was ready to be recorded, I was blessed to be able to record in the school's professional studio which was fully equipped with an isolation booth and a 5.1 surround sound set up but no engineer to work with.  Recording is one of my favorite parts of music but it was time consuming to record vocals for the 9 songs I rapped on due to the fact that it was up to me to get the studio up and running and I had to run in and out of the booth in between every take.  After about one month of recording, I worked every day for about 2 months editing, mixing, and mastering all 13 tracks in my dorm and in the school's studio.  I'm grateful that one of my friends while I was attending college is a photographer and offered to take professional pictures of me for my album's cover art.  We went with blue lighting and my hands together for a watery, spiritual feel. I created my own website to display the album and paid to have it distributed through all platforms because I was proud of my work and wanted to share it with everyone everywhere.  I even went out of my way to copyright the album through the U.S. Copyright Office to receive official documentation.  Long story short, Raindrop taught me how expensive recording music can be and how important it is to work with others who share the same vision as you.

 

The Goal

     This time around, I want to work with a mixing engineer who is more experienced than me and can help me find a creative sound.  I want to record and release an EP titled Ripples to follow the drop of Raindrop.  The main goal of this page is to raise money to help fund studio time in Ventura, CA.  I want to pay to work with a recording engineer who will help me track my vocals so that I don't have to step out of the booth.  I want to take guidance from an outside source and pay for mixing and mastering services so that I can include others in my sound and come out with one totally differently.  If anything, I want to edit down my own vocals to send out to get mixed and mastered but I do not want to apply any effects on my own.  Because I'm back home in Ventura and distance has separated me with my photographer friend who lives in San Francisco, I may have to pay to get some kind of cover art done.  Instead of making my own beats, I have made a deal with a producer for a license for 4 of his own beats to rap over.  I am currently working two minimum wage jobs and am always setting money aside for music but in order to get this project sounding how I envision it, I'm going to need your help.  Music is very spontaneous to me and I think the best way to capture the energy of a song is to record it close to the date it was thought of.  I like to record something while it is fresh and although I can afford to record this EP in the future, I do not want to wait until I have the funds to do so.  Raising $1,000 will allow me to purchase the 4 beats I have in negotiation, studio time with a recording engineer,  mixing and mastering services, cover art, and distribution. 

Other Ways You Can Help

     I am asking for help because there is only so much I can do.  I struggle financially at times but I always try my best to spread the word for friends or share their posts when I'm unable to give them exactly what they're asking for.  Please help me out by sharing this page or simply listening to my music if you are unable to contribute financially. 

     Thank you to everyone for reading and for your continued support!

story:
About

The first year of the Wyoming Singer-Songwriter Competition has wrapped up and now comes the fun part: putting it all out there!

The aim of this fundraiser is documentation, and our documentation goal has two primary objectives:

1) Record or collect recordings from every song from the competition for digital archives (to go into a museum some day, along with photographs, videos, etc).

2)  To professionally record and compile a multi-disc compilation album including at least one song from every contestant and also the top songs from each round.  This catalog of songs will start populating an ongoing Wyoming Singer-Songwriters collection that can be found on Spotify and other digital media channels (hello world!).

Here are some examples, top songs from the final round of the competition: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLK6SI6-H...

We have lined up professional recording studios in Casper and Laramie ready to record the songs that these contestants performed. At a basic level we will capture ALL competition songs.  For the songs chosen for the compilation, we will take multiple recordings and carefully mix down and master the final versions.  All of this will be professionally released with lyrics and photographs.  We are planning multiple avenues for recording including live takes before a crowd during promotional events.  These will be fun events, and this will be a fun project, and everyone who has been involved thus far can attest that this effort will produce a truly great body of work that the world needs to hear.

If we surpass our goal, additional funds will go towards professional recordings of every competition round at future events.  We will also be able to make professionally mixed recordings of all songs from the event, as opposed to just one for the compilation, with two other rougher recordings for documentation purposes.

Wyoming Singer-Songwriters is Nonprofit Corporation registered with the state of Wyoming and currently awaiting 501(C)(3) status from the IRS.  All rights to the written songs will be retained with the artist, however we will have rights to publish the recordings with the compilation so that the whole collection can be sold (very reasonably) without parsing out fractions of royalties to a large number of individuals.  Also, we will happily allow the artists to publish any recordings they make themselves.  We have promised from the start to make this effort most beneficial the incredible singer-songwriters across Wyoming

Risks and challenges

The risks of the project we think are minimal. The competition provides an avenue to showcase music that might not otherwise other reach an audience (or such a wide audience). Contestants who do not win may feel disappointed in the outcome, but as with any competition the motivation to improve and showcase your talent is often more important than winning.  This compilation effort is a way for us to ensure that everyone who competes is going to win.

story:
“Asking for help with shame says: 
You have the power over me.
Asking with condescension says: 
I have the power over you.
But asking for help with gratitude says:
We have the power to help each other.” -Amanda Palmer

 

Hi, it's fig. I need money to fund my album + press vinyl. 

Music has been my passion for the entirety of my life and I'm taking a risk and asking for help for the first time.

The money will go towards the album and vinyl pressing regardless of whether or not I make the whole amount. 

"You only have to let the soft animal of your body love what it loves." -Mary Oliver

The album, "Soft Animal," is focused around healing your body and mind after finally coming to terms with trauma and heartache.

I really want to make this release special and I want it to have the full, lush sound that it deserves with electric guitar, piano, bass guitar, drums, strings, and brass. I want to be able to pay these incredible musicians for their hard work and talent. 

 

Other ways you can help me:

Come to my shows

Share my social media. 

Text me.

story:
Nunki Bay Starship - Sigma Sagittarii

(English below)

"Az emberek még mindig nem szeretik az olyan zenekarokat, melyeket nem lehet egy – lehetőleg egyszavas – műfaji terminussal behatárolni. A bizonytalanság, a stílus változatossága és a műfaji eklektika a kevésbé ügyes zenészek menedékeként is szolgálhat, ám a Nunki Bay Starship esetében messze nem erről van szó. [...] A Művészetek Völgyét is megjárt alig egy éves bandának még nincs albuma, de lassan van annyi kész számuk, hogy egy nagylemeznyi hallgatnivaló összejöjjön tőlük." (KERET, 2017) 

A fönt idézett cikk óta eltelt lassan másfél év, és valóban összejött egy nagylemeznyi hallgatnivaló, több is. A tavaly felvett Magnetic Resonance Imagination EP munkálatai alatt is éreztük már, hogy ez a négy felvett dal nem lesz elég - persze ti is rágtátok a fülünket, hogy mikor vesszük már fel a többi dalunkat, szóval nem véletlen, hogy volt rajtunk egy kis nyomás. :)
Sigma Sagittarii című első nagylemezünk megjelenésével pedig szeretnénk újabb szintre emelni a zenekart és a minket körülvevő alkotói közösséget. Egy korszak lezárása ez a banda életében, és egy másik korszak kezdete - az ezek közötti átvezető kapu nekünk a Sigma Sagittarii, valamint az azzal egyidejűleg megjelenő új vizuális környezet, mely Bereznai Tamás munkája, és a Bolla Kolos keze munkáját dicsérő, vadonatúj videoklipünk is, ami az MRI című dalunkhoz készül éppen. 

Az, hogy ezeket mind meg tudjuk valósítani és egy újabb lépcsőfokkal följebb léphessünk a képzeletbeli karrierlépcsőházban, messze meghaladja mind a négyünk pénztárcájának kapacitását. Ebben kérjük most a segítségeteket, hogy mi megvalósíthassuk az elképzeléseinket; ti - akiknek szívügyetek a zenekarunk fejlődése - tobzódhassatok a jobbnál jobb audio és/vagy vizuális gyönyörökben és a csodás ajándékokban; és hogy a körülöttünk dolgozó emberek se maradjanak éhesek.  

Támogathattok minket tetszőleges összeggel is a BACK IT gombra kattintva, de választhattok a szuper ajándékaink közül is a PERKS listában, fix összeget utalva! 

... és hogy mit kaptok cserébe? 

Elsősorban ami a legfontosabb, hogy elkészül végre az első nagylemezünk és az MRI videoklipünk, aminek reméljük, hogy ti is legalább annyira örültök, mint mi! 
(Végtére is remélhetőleg ti többet fogjátok hallgatni a lemezt, mint mi, elég fura lenne, ha nem.) 

❤️ 5$ (~ 1200 forint) - "Thank you, babe!" pakk 
Egy nagyon menő plakátot küldünk nektek ajándékba, az elején a vadonatúj lemezborítónkkal, a hátulján pedig a dalszövegeinkkel! A plakáthoz pedig jár egy letöltőkód, amivel le tudjátok tölteni a nagylemezünket a Bandcamp oldalunkról! 

❤️ 8$ (~2200 forint) - "Nunki Bay-sic" pakk 
Pontosan ennyit ér egy Nunki Bay Starship vászontáska. Természetesen jár hozzá a plakát és a letöltőkód is! Ja, és matricák. Matricák mindenhol. 

❤️ 15$ (~4000 forint) - "Hardcore fan" pakk
Most figyeljetek: megkapjátok a Nunki Bay Starship Sigma Sagittarii de-De-DE-DELUXE CD-t, amihez csak itt az Indiegogon tudtok hozzájutni, sehol máshol!!! A lemezen az új nagylemez ÉS az EP dalai is szerepelnek, plusz egy szuperexkluzív, napfelkeltés-afterezős All the Beauty remix by Suhov. A csomag tartalma továbbá a vászontáska, a digitális nagylemez, matricák és a plakát is! 

❤️ 36$ (~10000 forint) - "Launch us to space!" pakk
Figyelem, legelvetemültebb Nunki fanok! A 15 VIP támogatónknak külön levélben és köszönővideóban fogjuk meghálálni, hogy ennyire sok pénzzel támogattak bennünket. Ezen felül természetesen minden más jár, ami az előző csomagokban szerepelt: letöltőkód, plakát, vászontáska, deluxe lemez. ​Plusz az, hogy örökké szeretni fogunk benneteket, az is. Alap!  
ÉS A MATRICÁK. Ne feledkezzünk meg a matricákról.  

Így a végén pedig hadd szögezzük le, hogy előre is nagyon szeretnénk megköszönni nektek minden egyes fillért, amit ennek a megvalósítására költötök. Viccelődhetünk itt naphosszat, de végtelenül hálásak vagyunk mindeközben, tényleg. ❤️

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"People still do not like bands that cannot be confined to one - preferably one-word - genre. Uncertainty, variety of style and genre eclecticism can also serve as a shelter for less skillful musicians, however, it is far from the case of Nunki Bay Starship. [...] The less than one-year-old band does not have an album yet, but they already have enough songs for an LP."  (KERET, 2017)

It's been a year and a half already since the quoted article above, and we have more songs by now that we could represent on our new album. During the making of our previous EP 'Magnetic Resonance Imagination' we've already felt the pressure, that we need much more than just those four songs to be recorded.  Of course many of you were always bugging us if we're planning to make an LP, so no wonder we were under a bit pressure about that... ;)
With the release of our first LP, Sigma Sagittarii, we want to bring the band and the creative community around us to a new level. This is definitely the end of a significant era in this family's life, and the beginning of a new one - the gateway between them is Sigma Sagittarii, new visual developments by our graphic designer Tamás Bereznai and our freshest, coolest music video in the making by Kolos Bolla for our song called 'MRI'.

Being able to complete all of this and move up a step on the imaginary career-staircase far exceeds the capacity of all our piggy banks. That is why we ask for your help in bringing our ideas to life; so that you - the people who care about Nunki Bay Starship so much - can experience our amazing audio and/or visual pleasures and get other wonderful gifts; thus all the people working with us won't stay hungry.

You can support us with any amount of money you'd like to donate by clicking on the BACK IT button, but you can also choose from our superb gifts in the PERKS list by donating a fixed amount!

... and what is it exactly that you get in return?

First of all, the most important thing is that we (as you and us) will complete our first album and our 'MRI' music video together, which we hope you'll love as we do!
(After all, you will listen to the album more than we do, hopefully. It'd be a bit awkward otherwise.)

❤️ 5$  (~ 1200 HUF) - "Thank you, babe!" package 
You'll receive a very cool poster as a gift, with our brand new album cover on the front and all of our lyrics on the back! The poster comes with a code which is an access to download our album from our Bandcamp site. 

❤️ 8$  (~2200 HUF) - "Nunki Bay-sic" package
That's the exact price for a Nunki Bay Starship tote. Of course it also comes with the poster and the code! Yeah, and also stickers. Stickers everywhere.

❤️ 15$  (~4000 HUF) - "Hardcore fan" package
Listen up: You will receive the Nunki Bay Starship Sigma Sagittarii de-De-DE-DELUXE CD, which you can only get via this Indiegogo campaign! The deluxe CD includes the new LP Sigma Sagittarii, AND our Magnetic Resonance Imagination EP, plus a super-exclusive, "sunrise-afterparty" 'All the Beauty' remix by Suhov. The package also includes a tote, the digital album, stickers and the poster!

❤️ 36$  (~10000 HUF) - "Launch us to space!" package
Attention, all our most enthusiastic fans! We will send a personal thank you-letter and post a video on our Facebook page mentioning all you ultimately special babes for supporting us with that much money. In addition, of course, everything else is included from the previous packages: code, poster, tote bag, deluxe CD. Plus, we will love you forever and ever, that's essential!
AND THE STICKERS. Don't forget the stickers.

In the end let's just say that we would like to thank you in advance for each and every penny you spend on this project. We can joke around all day, but the truth is that we are infinitely grateful, really. ❤️
story_txt: Nunki Bay Starship - Sigma Sagittarii(English below)"Az emberek még mindig nem szeretik az olyan zenekarokat, melyeket nem lehet egy – lehetőleg egyszavas – műfaji terminussal behatárolni. A bizonytalanság, a stílus változatossága és a műfaji eklektika a kevésbé ügyes zenészek menedékeként is szolgálhat, ám a Nunki Bay Starship esetében messze nem erről van szó. [...] A Művészetek Völgyét is megjárt alig egy éves bandának még nincs albuma, de lassan van annyi kész számuk, hogy egy nagylemeznyi hallgatnivaló összejöjjön tőlük." (KERET, 2017) A fönt idézett cikk óta eltelt lassan másfél év, és valóban összejött egy nagylemeznyi hallgatnivaló, több is. A tavaly felvett Magnetic Resonance Imagination EP munkálatai alatt is éreztük már, hogy ez a négy felvett dal nem lesz elég - persze ti is rágtátok a fülünket, hogy mikor vesszük már fel a többi dalunkat, szóval nem véletlen, hogy volt rajtunk egy kis nyomás. :)Sigma Sagittarii című első nagylemezünk megjelenésével pedig szeretnénk újabb szintre emelni a zenekart és a minket körülvevő alkotói közösséget. Egy korszak lezárása ez a banda életében, és egy másik korszak kezdete - az ezek közötti átvezető kapu nekünk a Sigma Sagittarii, valamint az azzal egyidejűleg megjelenő új vizuális környezet, mely Bereznai Tamás munkája, és a Bolla Kolos keze munkáját dicsérő, vadonatúj videoklipünk is, ami az MRI című dalunkhoz készül éppen. Az, hogy ezeket mind meg tudjuk valósítani és egy újabb lépcsőfokkal följebb léphessünk a képzeletbeli karrierlépcsőházban, messze meghaladja mind a négyünk pénztárcájának kapacitását. Ebben kérjük most a segítségeteket, hogy mi megvalósíthassuk az elképzeléseinket; ti - akiknek szívügyetek a zenekarunk fejlődése - tobzódhassatok a jobbnál jobb audio és/vagy vizuális gyönyörökben és a csodás ajándékokban; és hogy a körülöttünk dolgozó emberek se maradjanak éhesek.  Támogathattok minket tetszőleges összeggel is a BACK IT gombra kattintva, de választhattok a szuper ajándékaink közül is a PERKS listában, fix összeget utalva! ... és hogy mit kaptok cserébe? Elsősorban ami a legfontosabb, hogy elkészül végre az első nagylemezünk és az MRI videoklipünk, aminek reméljük, hogy ti is legalább annyira örültök, mint mi! (Végtére is remélhetőleg ti többet fogjátok hallgatni a lemezt, mint mi, elég fura lenne, ha nem.) ❤️ 5$ (~ 1200 forint) - "Thank you, babe!" pakk Egy nagyon menő plakátot küldünk nektek ajándékba, az elején a vadonatúj lemezborítónkkal, a hátulján pedig a dalszövegeinkkel! A plakáthoz pedig jár egy letöltőkód, amivel le tudjátok tölteni a nagylemezünket a Bandcamp oldalunkról! ❤️ 8$ (~2200 forint) - "Nunki Bay-sic" pakk Pontosan ennyit ér egy Nunki Bay Starship vászontáska. Természetesen jár hozzá a plakát és a letöltőkód is! Ja, és matricák. Matricák mindenhol. ❤️ 15$ (~4000 forint) - "Hardcore fan" pakkMost figyeljetek: megkapjátok a Nunki Bay Starship Sigma Sagittarii de-De-DE-DELUXE CD-t, amihez csak itt az Indiegogon tudtok hozzájutni, sehol máshol!!! A lemezen az új nagylemez ÉS az EP dalai is szerepelnek, plusz egy szuperexkluzív, napfelkeltés-afterezős All the Beauty remix by Suhov. A csomag tartalma továbbá a vászontáska, a digitális nagylemez, matricák és a plakát is! ❤️ 36$ (~10000 forint) - "Launch us to space!" pakkFigyelem, legelvetemültebb Nunki fanok! A 15 VIP támogatónknak külön levélben és köszönővideóban fogjuk meghálálni, hogy ennyire sok pénzzel támogattak bennünket. Ezen felül természetesen minden más jár, ami az előző csomagokban szerepelt: letöltőkód, plakát, vászontáska, deluxe lemez. ​Plusz az, hogy örökké szeretni fogunk benneteket, az is. Alap!  ÉS A MATRICÁK. Ne feledkezzünk meg a matricákról.  Így a végén pedig hadd szögezzük le, hogy előre is nagyon szeretnénk megköszönni nektek minden egyes fillért, amit ennek a megvalósítására költötök. Viccelődhetünk itt naphosszat, de végtelenül hálásak vagyunk mindeközben, tényleg. ❤️--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------"People still do not like bands that cannot be confined to one - preferably one-word - genre. Uncertainty, variety of style and genre eclecticism can also serve as a shelter for less skillful musicians, however, it is far from the case of Nunki Bay Starship. [...] The less than one-year-old band does not have an album yet, but they already have enough songs for an LP."  (KERET, 2017)It's been a year and a half already since the quoted article above, and we have more songs by now that we could represent on our new album. It'd be a bit awkward otherwise.)❤️ 5$  (~ 1200 HUF) - "Thank you, babe!" package You'll receive a very cool poster as a gift, with our brand new album cover on the front and all of our lyrics on the back! The poster comes with a code which is an access to download our album from our Bandcamp site. ❤️ 8$  (~2200 HUF) - "Nunki Bay-sic" packageThat's the exact price for a Nunki Bay Starship tote. Of course it also comes with the poster and the code! Yeah, and also stickers. Stickers everywhere.❤️ 15$  (~4000 HUF) - "Hardcore fan" packageListen up: You will receive the Nunki Bay Starship Sigma Sagittarii de-De-DE-DELUXE CD, which you can only get via this Indiegogo campaign! The deluxe CD includes the new LP Sigma Sagittarii, AND our Magnetic Resonance Imagination EP, plus a super-exclusive, "sunrise-afterparty" 'All the Beauty' remix by Suhov. The package also includes a tote, the digital album, stickers and the poster!❤️ 36$  (~10000 HUF) - "Launch us to space!" packageAttention, all our most enthusiastic fans! We will send a personal thank you-letter and post a video on our Facebook page mentioning all you ultimately special babes for supporting us with that much money. In addition, of course, everything else is included from the previous packages: code, poster, tote bag, deluxe CD. Plus, we will love you forever and ever, that's essential!AND THE STICKERS. Don't forget the stickers.In the end let's just say that we would like to thank you in advance for each and every penny you spend on this project. story:
What We Need

Funds are needed to cover costs such as:

  • Studio time 
  • Mixing and mastering tracks
  • Artwork and cover design for album & preceding singles released
  • Career-enhancing memberships such as TAXI, to get my music licensed in film, tv, games, and more

The Impact

A key part of my lifelong vision has been to awaken others to their purpose and inspire them to live with passion, living free of self-judgement and shame, fully owning who they are and feeling sexy in their own skin. And I know, life happens. As a wife and mom of four kids, I first and foremost value living with the freedom, connection, and integrity I talk about in my books and songs. When shit got real for our family after my husband slipped into a 2-year depression with inexplicable injuries, I developed an autoimmune disorder that ruled my body and life for 14 months. With grit, vision, persistence, and commitment, transformation is possible, as it was for us. Whether through coaching, speaking, or day to day relationships, my message and heart has always been to inspire and awaken, and now the journey comes around full circle as my songs now embody this bold, unapologetic message of freedom and courage.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you’re unable to contribute financially, but would still like to support this vision and mission, here are a few other ways you can support: 

  • Get the word out about this campaign.
  • Share this music with friends.
  • Buy the singles and/or album when it drops!
  • Stream the crap out of this album when it’s out!

And that's all there is to it!

story:
I have been writing and producing worship music for over 30 years, as well as leading worship and conducting training workshops for worship teams. I have enjoyed producing music for worship leaders and singers and yet always felt that there was a missing element in my own music. I needed to collaborate with another worship leader who was as passionate about singing as I was about music.

Seth and I have worked together on a number of projects over the years and during one of sessions, we started worshiping together and that was the beginning of The Merging concept.  

As you can hear on the video, Seth is an amazing singer and yet I'm drawn to the Lord when I hear him sing, and that's the true sign of an anointed worship leader. We both have a heart for worship and helping people experience His presence in a fresh dynamic way. This is a merging of Heaven and Earth as well bringing together the generations and the diversity of culture in our worship gatherings.  We enjoy gospel, soul, contemporary CCM, modern worship and even country genres. This was a perfect fit as worship has become very performance orientated and needs to be more vertical at the same time incorporating a diversity of music styles.  

We have already begun production in the studio and will continue as far as possible. We do, however, need your help to raise funds to launch our vision and bring these new songs and music to your community. We would love to come to your city to do worship gatherings and workshops for singers, musicians and songwriters. The Merging will release a new worship recording early 2018 along with a website that will contain our calendar of live events, and workshops .

Thank you for supporting this project: we would also value your help in sharing this link with your network of friends. We hope to have the opportunity to worship with you soon!

Nick Coetzee and Seth J Elbe  - The Merging.    www.mergingworship.com  www.rainmusic.org

story:
Short Summary

  • We are The Instruction, an indie-alternative rock band from Louisville KY. Our second full-length record, Monster Maker, is mastered and ready for release – almost. The last thing on the list is a kick ass, animated music video for our title track, and that is where we are opening the doors for all fans of music to help bring this video to life.

  •  This music video is a key component of a massive media package that we are releasing with our new record "Monster Maker". Rather than just the stereo typical album release, we want to release a media package for our fans comprised of sight and sound.  We know this video will be a very powerful marketing tool with Robert, Jorden and Jim's name and signature animation style.

  •  Contributing to this fund will provide a major tool for marketing our new album to an international audience and getting us to that next level of mass exposure.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  •  We need $25,000.00 to wrap up the detailed animation started by Robert Valley and his team of mad scientists. The hard footage is finished, but the intense frame-by-frame animation is currently underway. Just 6 seconds of animation can take upwards of 80 hours to complete so it is a very time consuming process. 
  • Robert had several projects to choose from when coming on board. He chose us because he really liked the story board and felt our single "Monster Maker" fit his style of animation. We are extremely excited to have the opportunity to work with him, Jorden and Jim!
  •  If for any reason we do not meet our goal, all the funds that we do receive will go to complete as much of the original animation budget as possible. 

The Impact

  •  The full impact of this campaign will be:
    • 1.) Completely funding the full animation of this video.
    • 2.) Digital Distribution and hard copies of the album CD's/Vinyl's.
    • 3.) Merchandise such as Hats, Hoodies, T-shirts, etc...
  •  Our band, The Instruction, has played shows and shared the stage with groups such as The Black Keys, Cage the Elephant, Green Jelly, Moon Taxi, The Features, Thao with the Get Down Stay Down, Mc Chris and Hunter Valentine. We have had our songs "Stray" and "You're Mine" featured in the MTV series Sixteen And Pregnant as well as "Into The Tomorrow" video played on Fuse On Demand Tv. In addition, we had our song "Holy Roller" featured on the 100th anniversary of the Belle of Louisville tribute album.

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  •  Even if you cannot contribute, please share our Indiegogo campaign with as many people as possible. It would be very much appreciated and remember you can use the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
Here we go!

 

Hi Brother and sisters of the realm! 

 

For those meeting me today I am Aurora Dawn singer, song writer and producer aka front lead female vocalist for London, Brixton based band Alabama 3 aka the guys and girls who penned the theme tune ‘Woke up this Morning”for the hit US cult HBO series the Sopranos . 

My credits include Supporting & working with some of the worlds most renown bands and producers in the music industry, such as Bass legend (aka John Lydon legendary british punk band PiL)  “Jah Wobble" and the Invaders of the heart - 2016 Guild award winning best producer with accolade“Youth” from“Killing Joke -"Roger Eno of Pink Floyd family who is featured on my track 3 letters (Fly),"Producer John Leckie Abbey Road studios, Ron Thal Guns and roses, Bob Dylan to name a few. 

I’m so very excited to be releasing my long awaited Aurora Dawn and the ScreaminSkulls first official E.P and accompanying video (To be released summer 2018 ) and believe me when i say its a true blessing to get to do this for my family of fans that have supported me throughout my musical journey and YOU! New global musical family,.I am asking for your support to raise £6,000 to achieve this goal. 

(Bam ba lama Betty baby - Written and performed by Aurora dawn)

 

A little about Aurora ...

Im a versatile artist and just love discovering, creating and performing all kinds of music. Im self taught with no formal training and self management, Iv been singing and performing from childhood and all around the globe. like the business of life, music has been a roller coaster of ups, down, upside downs, swinging ,hanging ,and little to the left metaphorically speaking l.o.l  ..none the less Im born to sing and thats kept me centred .I feel very privileged to have the opportunity to continue to perform, write, produce and work together with so many fantastic artist and producers of various different genres.

Alabama 3 featuring Aurora Dawn 

  

Writing collaboration -Jah Wobble & the invaders of the heart "Cosmic love"with Youth and Aurora dawn 

 

My fund raising efforts:

Now, Im no stranger to raising funds and supported and hosted 100s /1000,s of charitable causes mainly through collaboration of my music. One of which close to heart is my very own home grown Best in Brixton fund raiser - ( Raising funds for under privileged child and youth activity services in south London The launch and success of this sold out weekend event came together with but a small dedicated enthusiastic loving group of friends family and volunteers raising £10,000 for a historical local children and Youth adventure playground, critically lacking in any resources facing closer.

(On a separate venture My efforts also include securing this Children's Charity with an inside toilet and washing facility's , Running hot water, a new roof and gutting, flooring, heating ,furniture, Books, pens ,paper, micro wave, computers and Electricity!  Through 2 of London's biggest construction companies (Morrison's and Mear's ) of which i initiated a partnership and there much needed help  ...YES in south London folks) 

This historical musical event saw Many artist musicians and authors come out in support of our cause such as our head line act (twice)- Howard Marks aka Mr Nice, Basement jaxx, Bez -Happy Mondays, The Ruts, even daughter of  the legend that is hollywood  Peter Otoole,  My loving sister and bad girl actress Kate O’Toole. These events offered a unique arena unifying big and small local and international  business,s and artist from music photography, literature, food, children's entertainment and fashion that endorsed the event a chance meet and to work together under one umbrella ,explore, Join forces, and I'm told some still have existing partnerships today as a result 

 

Best in Brixton festival part 2 Fund raiser: - (Raising awareness and funds for under privileged Children and youth recreational activity and services in south London)

Below are some further links and to press and videos of My B.I.B fund raising events
 
Footage of my best in brixton fund Rasier part one
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rtn4l19RuUA
 
Brixton Bugle -Bassment Jaxx Joins Best in brixton line up to save our playgrounds 
http://www.brixtonblog.com/kids-playgrounds-help-prevent-riots-says-basement-jaxx-felix/2229
 
Evening standard 
https://www.standard.co.uk/news/playgrounds-keep-children-from-sliding-into-crime-say-stars-7309827.html

 

I have never raised funds for myself before & i must admit its feels a lot easier doing it for others l.o.l My desire now is to express all those sparks of inspiration and to full fill the loving request from the people iv touched and put more of my own music out there, So, I am releasing a little music magic of my own to share with you!

 

About my Band: 

The Screaminskulls have been around since 2009, we have done many live shows and festivals through out the years delivering our polyphonic, indie, soul, rock, pop, post punk, blues sound and engaging with our family of fans in a way they really let loose, enjoy and feel apart of our ScreaminSkulls Musical Revalushuuun!

Aurora and the ScreaminSkulls - Cover of "Killing Jokes" Pandemonium  

 

Aurora dawn and the ScreaminSkulls - Track "Welcome to London" (Killer perspective) 

 

 

What your support will do:

story_txt:
Here we go! Hi Brother and sisters of the realm!  For those meeting me today I am Aurora Dawn singer, song writer and producer aka front lead female vocalist for London, Brixton based band Alabama 3 aka the guys and girls who penned the theme tune ‘Woke up this Morning”for the hit US cult HBO series the Sopranos . My credits include Supporting & working with some of the worlds most renown bands and producers in the music industry, such as Bass legend (aka John Lydon legendary british punk band PiL)  “Jah Wobble" and the Invaders of the heart - 2016 Guild award winning best producer with accolade“Youth” from“Killing Joke -"Roger Eno of Pink Floyd family who is featured on my track 3 letters (Fly),"Producer John Leckie Abbey Road studios, Ron Thal Guns and roses, Bob Dylan to name a few. I’m so very excited to be releasing my long awaited Aurora Dawn and the ScreaminSkulls first official E.P and accompanying video (To be released summer 2018 ) and believe me when i say its a true blessing to get to do this for my family of fans that have supported me throughout my musical journey and YOU! New global musical family,.I am asking for your support to raise £6,000 to achieve this goal. (Bam ba lama Betty baby - Written and performed by Aurora dawn) A little about Aurora ...Im a versatile artist and just love discovering, creating and performing all kinds of music. Im self taught with no formal training and self management, Iv been singing and performing from childhood and all around the globe. like the business of life, music has been a roller coaster of ups, down, upside downs, swinging ,hanging ,and little to the left metaphorically speaking l.o.l  ..none the less Im born to sing and thats kept me centred .I feel very privileged to have the opportunity to continue to perform, write, produce and work together with so many fantastic artist and producers of various different genres.Alabama 3 featuring Aurora Dawn 
  
Writing collaboration -Jah Wobble & the invaders of the heart "Cosmic love"with Youth and Aurora dawn 

 
My fund raising efforts:Now, Im no stranger to raising funds and supported and hosted 100s /1000,s of charitable causes mainly through collaboration of my music. One of which close to heart is my very own home grown Best in Brixton fund raiser - ( Raising funds for under privileged child and youth activity services in south London The launch and success of this sold out weekend event came together with but a small dedicated enthusiastic loving group of friends family and volunteers raising £10,000 for a historical local children and Youth adventure playground, critically lacking in any resources facing closer.(On a separate venture My efforts also include securing this Children's Charity with an inside toilet and washing facility's , Running hot water, a new roof and gutting, flooring, heating ,furniture, Books, pens ,paper, micro wave, computers and Electricity!  Through 2 of London's biggest construction companies (Morrison's and Mear's ) of which i initiated a partnership and there much needed help  ...YES in south London folks) This historical musical event saw Many artist musicians and authors come out in support of our cause such as our head line act (twice)- Howard Marks aka Mr Nice, Basement jaxx, Bez -Happy Mondays, The Ruts, even daughter of  the legend that is hollywood  Peter Otoole,  My loving sister and bad girl actress Kate O’Toole. These events offered a unique arena unifying big and small local and international  business,s and artist from music photography, literature, food, children's entertainment and fashion that endorsed the event a chance meet and to work together under one umbrella ,explore, Join forces, and I'm told some still have existing partnerships today as a result  Best in Brixton festival part 2 Fund raiser: - (Raising awareness and funds for under privileged Children and youth recreational activity and services in south London)Below are some further links and to press and videos of My B.I.B fund raising events Footage of my best in brixton fund Rasier part onehttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rtn4l19RuUA Brixton Bugle -Bassment Jaxx Joins Best in brixton line up to save our playgrounds http://www.brixtonblog.com/kids-playgrounds-help-prevent-riots-says-basement-jaxx-felix/2229 Evening standard https://www.standard.co.uk/news/playgrounds-keep-children-from-sliding-into-crime-say-stars-7309827.html
 I have never raised funds for myself before & i must admit its feels a lot easier doing it for others l.o.l My desire now is to express all those sparks of inspiration and to full fill the loving request from the people iv touched and put more of my own music out there, So, I am releasing a little music magic of my own to share with you! About my Band: The Screaminskulls have been around since 2009, we have done many live shows and festivals through out the years delivering our polyphonic, indie, soul, rock, pop, post punk, blues sound and engaging with our family of fans in a way they really let loose, enjoy and feel apart of our ScreaminSkulls Musical Revalushuuun!Aurora and the ScreaminSkulls - Cover of "Killing Jokes" Pandemonium  
 
Aurora dawn and the ScreaminSkulls - Track "Welcome to London" (Killer perspective)

story:
Summary

(Listen to / download for free the single Great American Novel )

Starting in August, I will begin work on an EP and music video. Though I have recorded and released music here and there on my own before, I am considering this my first major release, due to how confident in the songs I am, and in the folks working on them with me.  My whole life so far playing music and writing songs, I was either waiting for my hands to catch up with my head or vis versa. Though I know this will continue in my whole life learning, these songs find me at a cool crossroads of the two that I think is worth documenting. This EP is stitched from tiny melodies keeping me company driving solo through the pink boulders of the Nevada desert, the clumsy goodbyes to graceful friends, and the reflections in bays of the unfairness of unpreparedness. This collection of songs is very important to me, so I want capture them the right way. This means being able to pay the musicians and collaborators that help me to fully realize it. I have really incredible artists working with me of whom I'm in awe and greatly indebted to, and I want to be able to give them the compensation they deserve for their brilliance. 

I'm creating a music video (my first ever!) with the incredible videographer Anthony Sabatino. We met this Spring while both working an odd job at the Coachella Valley Music & Arts festival. Together we've created a unique storyboard and concept based on a very pivotal book, Ask The Dust by John Fante. 

My best friend and favorite living songwriter Aaron Dennis is engineering and producing the EP, and I am so grateful for his propensity for unearthly beauty, and in the harnessing and manifestation of outlandish ideas.

In addition to the songs and video themselves I am working on creating a very unique physical copy of the album. Earlier this spring I released a mixtape for which I made handmade cassettes, and I want to run further with that idea and create physical copies that will be as important as the songs.

I'm hoping for the opportunity to add some of my favorite session musicians to the team as well, to fill out the sound to the extent I've dreamed it.

What We Need & What You Get

I'd saved up money all year for this project, but ended up spending quite a bit of it last minute on the medical expenses of a runt kitten that was handed to me behind the laundromat. She's amazing, and was totally worth it, but came into my life at a very inopportune moment, just as most true love tends to.

  • I'm trying to raise 4200 to cover the cost of musician compensation, mixing and mastering, costs incurred by the making of the video for Great American Novel, travel expenses for recording, creation of the physical copies of the EP, and in planning a tour. 
  • I'm exchanging some cool perks for donations, including digital downloads, handmade one of a kind physical copies, embroidery, custom acoustic covers, and house shows!
  • I'll make good on these promises of whether I reach my goal or not- if theres a will theres a way and I've got buckets of will!

The Impact

Being able to record and release this EP will give me an invaluable leg up in terms of approaching labels for representation, and ultimately getting exposure to a larger audience. Not only that but I'll have merch for shows, and the ability to put together a full live band, and set out on tour.

Other Ways You Can Help

No worries if you're not in a place to contribute! You can help just as much by spreading the word.

story:
Hey Family,

 

 Allow me to introduce myself. My name is Jymal Dawson. I go by the stage name Jymal Dawson. lol. Seriously though, I am a lover of Jesus, a husband, father, friend and now an artist. (feels so weird saying that. lol) but listen, I am super excited to finally start working on my very first music project.  I have been singing in church since I was about 6 or 7 years old and through my gift, I have been able to sing in front of thousands in venues such as Carnegie Hall, NJPAC, Philadelphia Performing Arts Center, and many others, but my greatest joy is singing in the church. Those who know me know that recording an album is something that I have avoided for years, perhaps because my own insecurities and the fear of my gift not being widely accepted, but my priority and focus have shifted. After much prayer and wise counsel, I feel led to share the Gospel through song with anyone who has an ear.  

I believe the Lord desires us to operate in the spirit of excellence so as a result, I am soliciting your donation in any amount to help with the cost of producing a quality record.

story:
As a singer/songwriter and hip-hop artist, creativity has always been my passion. This album and documentary project is about realizing my dream of creating something sonically impactful, visually stunning, and culturally significant. "Black Madonna" is an album that will be conceptualized and recorded in  some of the places that inspire me, with a companion documentary being simultaneously filmed. My hope is that this project brings us closer together, as women and as people, and sets us on the path to healing, equality, and the achievement of our dreams.

My goal is to raise at least $50,000 which will cover the following:

  • Music & Video equipment - I will be building a "mobile" production studio capable of recording and editing while on the road.
  • Mixing and mastering of the album - completing the audio project with professional mixing and mastering.
  • Album and documentary artwork - original artwork for both the album and documentary.
  • Post production costs for the documentary - editing and finalizing the documentary.
  • Production/post production costs for a music video - a video for the song "Black Madonna" which will be the lead single for the album.
  • Travel & accommodation expenses - the album and documentary will be recorded during travel to a select list of places that have inspired and/or are in alignment with the message of Black Madonna. The destinations on our itinerary so far are: L.A. California, Brazil, Egypt, the Caribbean, UK/London, and Mexico.
  • Artist development expenses - building myself to be a better artist physically and mentally, as well as branding.
  • Marketing and promotional expenses - related to promoting Black Madonna.

If I do not reach my goal, the funds I do raise will be spent on the recording, marketing and promotion, and artist development aspects of this plan. If I exceed my goal, I will continue to travel and record additional material for another project.

It's been a major focus of mine to cultivate a sense of sisterhood with the women in my life, both personally and professionally. Black Madonna gives me a chance to do that on a larger scale, and be a part of the growing social movement for gender equality. As a black woman, who is a hiphop artist, this is hugely significant and deeply personal to me.

Women are fighting each other everywhere you look--mostly for ratings/views and likes and shares. I’ve often said that shows featuring women fighting each other make up more than half of reality TV programming, and that's starting to translate into pop culture at large. It’s time for the rise of other narratives, that represent more than just one aspect of women--that show who we are outside of the stereotypical sexuality and cattiness.

It’s time for a change in the entertainment industry. Sexually objectifying ourselves should not be a requirement of success--it should be our choice how we want to present and define ourselves. Women who choose not to lead with their sexuality should not be excluded from mainstream music and/or pop culture for doing so.  Women in the music industry should not be pitted against each other to fight over one spot at the top. There is plenty of space for different points of view.  Black Madonna represents me taking back the power to define my own reality as a woman, and sharing that empowerment with women everywhere.

story:
"Restless"- the latest and greatest from Blues-Rock artist Hughes Taylor

About Me

Hey guys! I want to thank everyone for stopping by and checking out my latest campaign. For those who aren't familiar, I am a blues-rock guitarist and singer/songwriter based in Dahlonega, GA. I first started playing guitar at the age of 12, learning my first chords off of a bar napkin from a local musician in my hometown of Macon. Ever since then, my life has been totally encompassed by music. Over the past few years, I've been performing all over the state of Georgia, playing venues of all sizes. 

Now, after releasing a very successful first album in 2016 (with the help of all of you), I am back with what I consider to be my best work yet. I have spent the last two years honing my ability to create music, specifically my songwriting, and I can't not begin to express my gratitude to those who have helped me grow as a musician and an artist.

About the Album

My 2016 release, "Hear My Melody," was a huge success and I owe it all to you! It was an incredible start to what I pray will be a long and fruitful career. But now, I've put together something that I feel is worlds ahead of where I started, and I can't wait to share it with you.

My new album "Restless" is a collection of 7 original songs that I feel more accurately represents who I am as an artist than anything else I have created before. The music is a blend of blues and rock that brings the nostalgic sound of decades past into the modern era. Creating this album challenged me to expand my range both sonically and conceptually. I will try to have previews available to you as soon as possible!

Perks, Perks, and More Perks!

Pre-ordering "Restless" comes with a plethora of perks! Including:

  • Signed copies of the album
  • Signed concert posters
  • Digital Downloads
  • Exclusive live content
  • Handwritten lyrics 
  • T-Shirts
  • Credit in the album liner notes
  • House concerts
  • And more!

What the money will go towards

As you can probably guess, creating an album is expensive, on average costing around $10,000. Fortunately, I have been able to fund the majority of the project with the money I've earned from shows and selling my music. However, I now turn to you to help me take things to the next step. Here is a quick break-down of what your contribution will go towards:

  • Session Musicians - $500
  • Mixing/Mastering - $500
  • Album Artwork - $200
  • Administration - $300
  • CD Replication + Distribution - $2500
  • Promotional - $1000

Even though I have laid most of the groundwork for the album, there is still much to be done before it is finished. That is where you come in. I've gone just about as far as I can go on my own, now I need your help to carry out the finishing touches!

What Your Contribution Means

Making and performing music is more than just my full-time job. I believe it is my purpose in life to create music and share it with others. It is my passion and this album is the next step in what I pray will be a life-long career.

Your contribution not only funds the physical product, but it fuels my passion. Your contributions help me to see that there are people who also believe in what I do, and there is no better motivator than that!

Can’t Contribute? DON’T WORRY! You Can Still Help..

Even if you can’t contribute monetarily, you can still make a huge difference in plenty of other ways. One of the biggest things you can do is just SPREAD THE WORD; share, post, like, tweet... all of the social media platforms out there are a fantastic way to get the word out about my upcoming project.

There are fans all over, I need your help to find them!

Promotional - $1000
Even though I have laid most of the groundwork for the album, there is still much to be done before it is finished. That is where you come in. I've gone just about as far as I can go on my own, now I need your help to carry out the finishing touches!What Your Contribution MeansMaking and performing music is more than just my full-time job. I believe it is my purpose in life to create music and share it with others. It is my passion and this album is the next step in what I pray will be a life-long career.Your contribution not only funds the physical product, but it fuels my passion. Your contributions help me to see that there are people who also believe in what I do, and there is no better motivator than that!Can’t Contribute? DON’T WORRY! You Can Still Help..Even if you can’t contribute monetarily, you can still make a huge difference in plenty of other ways. One of the biggest things you can do is just SPREAD THE WORD; share, post, like, tweet... all of the social media platforms out there are a fantastic way to get the word out about my upcoming project.There are fans all over, I need your help to find them!

story:
Founded in 2008, Z V E Z D O L I K I  is a classical ensemble based in Antwerpen, Belgium.  It's named after Stravinsky's cantata and means "King of the Stars".  To celebrate our 10th anniversary, we decided to make this unique live recording of Piazzolla's tango-operita "María de Buenos Aires".  With this recording we hope to reach as many people as possible to share this wonderful music with you.  The album will be released on Evil Penguins Records' label 'Antarctica' in October 2018.

We will perform this magnificent music with 15 musicians, which asks for a high budget. Therefore we would like to ask your help to find extra funding to reach the target.

This recording will be a unique experience because it will be recorded live.  And you can be part of that!  Sign in for one of our perks and join us during one of the concerts (Saturday 3rd or Sunday 4th, 2018 at 8 pm) in KC Nona in Mechelen, a former cinema hall.  And .. who knows.. even a film might follow after the album!

So go ahead, find out everything about us, the music, the cinema hall and help us reach our goal.

We are :

Oriana Dierinck, flute . Wietse Beels, violin . Tatjana Scheck, violin . Marie Ghitta, viola . Celine Flamen, cello . Katrien Bos, double bass . Daan Vercammen - Jelle Proost, percussion . Hendrik Braeckman, guitar . Anke Steenbeke, piano and Gwen Cresens, bandoneón.

Raphaële Green (mezzo), María de Buenos Aires

Alejandro Fonte (tenor), El Payador

Annemie Van Daele, El Duende

story:
Short Summary

I need to raise some funds to shoot a music video for Love is a Fool Time Job

  • Love is a Fool Time job is the 6th and final single to come from the album Horseshoe Rodeo Hotel
  • I am hoping to make this the most fabulous video and reach a new audience.

I know many of you have backed me and I am forever grateful. Lets finish the run of this album with a Bang ! 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • The amount of funding needed is to create a top class video 
  • EVERY contributor will be acknowleged on the Video uplaods to youtube & facebook 
  • I am open to product placement or sponsorship on the shoot
  • I have some groovy perks you can get below or you can just give a little for the campaign
  • The video will be made with what ever funds I can raise 

The Impact

Your Contribution will make a real impact I hope and help with having the album and my music reach a new audience

  • This will be the final song from the album and I hope it will help with some sales 
  • I want to make this the next successful single 
  • I have always delivered on my projects and plan to deliver to the best of my ability on this one .

Risks & Challenges

Crowd funding is much harder these days .. but know even if its a tiny bit . everything helps . 

  • I will work really hard to make this work it could be my final work though I hope not
  •  

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • Please share out on Social media and tell people about the campaign 

And that's all there is to it.
