story:
Who I am and why I am doing this :)

My name is Shada Diab, I am 23 years old from Nazareth, I study Cinema and English in Tel-Aviv University. I play the piano and learn vocal lessons for a year now.
Since I was a little girl I knew I had a goal, it was to try and make my community a better place for people to live in without having to give up what makes them special, different and unique.
Through art I can express myself the best i can, I can send my message to so many people. I believe that music is the language everyone understand, it moves you even if you don't quite agree with what it says, and this is exactly what I am trying to do in my community, bring people closer to each other by understanding that our differences doesn't break up apart but rather make us stronger.

The LGBT community in the Arab world is still being severely discriminated against, and this issue needs to be discussed and talked about. The song is written by me,  it's in Arabic and English and talks about how strong you have to be if you are different, how much strength it requires to stand in front of the world and say this is who i am and i will not hide or change. The video is going to tell the story or a love song by two girls and what they have to go through in this community in order to be together. 

 

 

 

  • I need 9000 dollars, 1000 dollar is the price of the melody, the rest will go for recording and producing the video which will be in a very high level. 
  • The song will be in  Arabic and English which will be a very interesting combination 
  • If I don't get the entire fund the money i raise will go to support the project while i try to get the funds from other sources.

story:
My Project:

Hello everybody! I'm Jo Oliver — a singer-songwriter & multi-instrumentalist based in the creative city of Berlin, Germany. (Here you can visit my homepage: www.jooliver.net)

For many years I have been living from making music in many different ways: playing guitar and other instruments live and in studio-situations, composing, arranging & producing music for others, writing and publishing music-teaching-books ...

But 4 years ago, I discovered my really new passion - SINGING!

Under my artist name Jo Oliver I bring all my talents of writing songs, playing instruments, singing and arranging and producing these songs together. For me it's something totally new and a really big thing - excited where my musical journey will bring me...

So I would like to invite you to be a part of my musical journey!

I am working on a studio album that is to be supposed to be released in 2018. But first I have to release my debut single. The preproduction is already done (but I'm still working on the tune to "polish" it up...) but the next step is, to bring it on a higher level of video production. When the audio- & video-production is finished, my song "shine on (you)" should be released and promoted. But before anybody will download a new song from a unknown artist, one needs to do radio-promotion.

For both (video-production & radio-promotion) I need your support for a budget. The higher the budget the higher the video-quality and I can spend more for the (expensive) radio-promotion. There are promo-agencies to be paid, and at least the finished song has to be professionally mastered. Depending on the money to be funded, there maybe will also be a budget for a CD-printing (plus shipping costs to be shipped to as many international radio stations as possible).

 

budget & perks in detail:

As a musician you always spend all of your money for instruments & equipment - same toI do... but as a multi-instrumentalist I have to spend 5 times more for guitars, basses, drums, keyboards, microphones and studio-equipment! I'm not asking for money for my instruments & stuff in this campaign, even if I would be glad to be able for example to buy me a better bassguitar or a better drumset. (This is not part of this campaign)

production & promotion expances:

1, What I need in this case is a budget to pay one or some video-professionals to help me putting the video-production on a higher level. Everything is already planned: I will do multicam-recordings and bring it partly on a split-screen in the postproduction for a better impression of what I am doing as a single musician who is representing a whole band plus choir and lead-singer! Depending on the budget raised from this campaign I can do it more or less professionally - but it will be done anyway.

2, When the audio production is finished one needs a second pair of ears going through the mix, especially if you did all the recordings alone as this is the case. This second pair of ears should be from a professional "mastering-engineer", who is doing some "fine adjustments" on the finished mix. That will be a great effect for your ears, especially if you own a good stereo/HiFi-system. I really want my fans to enjoy my music from the performance to all technical aspects...

3, No promotion without radio: For an upcoming artist, radio is still absolutly necessary to be perceived from the world. For radio promotion you can spend thousands of dollars (like the major record companies are doing), but at least you still need a minimum of some hundred dollars to start. Even if some radio stations still like CDs, the majority of them wants to be delivered online from so called radio promotion networks or agencies. These agencies do deliver your song to the radio-stations for a certain amount of money. But furthermore, you still have to contact these stations, send them artist-informations and so on, to ask them if they have downloaded and do like your song and sometimes you should ship some more informations... it varies from country to country.

In case I receive more than the requested budget-target, I will spend every cent on the radio promotion... it's the foundation of every musical career!

fantastic perks you will receive for your support:

As I am a well-known music teaching book author (under my real name = Jörg Sieghart) in my homeland Germany, I can offer some great limited editions (in English) of some of my books. If you are interested in blues guitar, there will be some extraordinary blues lick videos for you in different bundles. And of course you will get my music as MP3-, WAV- or Video-formats... futhermore there are T-shirts, signed drum sticks or guitar belts and other intersting stuff.

It might be really valuable in some years - who knows? :-)

My Amazon author-site (in german):

https://www.amazon.de/J%C3%B6rg-Sieghart/e/B00HDPKDGQ

My (german) Youtube channel for guitar instructions:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1gbO8yUa0HH4khEZr5DZ6A

 

What it means to me:

    Music is my passion! It means to me to express myself and to carry music in your heart…. Music or rather making music is a great deal more than only exercising, cobbling sounds together and performing a song: It is always a journey into yourself, a contribution to your inner balance, zest for life and growing awareness. My song "Shine On" is about gratitude... but there are a lot of different topics my songs are about: consciousness, values, little stories, emotions and a lot of stuff to think about... and my music itself is influenced by strong grooves, rock guitars and a lot of harmony vocals (backing vocals/choir) like you know it from bands such as Queen with the singer Freddie Mercury.

    In the past some of my songs got radio airplay and some hit the chartlists, but I never sung these songs by myself and I never made big money out of that... but there is still the unstopable passion of writing good and melodic songs that will be catchy for your ears - it will transport good vibes and happyness to the listener!

    Well, the music-market is huge and if I listen to German radio stations, I hear mostly electronical beats - nevertheless, I believe in my talents and in the simple fact, that out there, there must be some more peple who appreciate real "handmade" music, with melodic songs, strong grooves, strong voice(s) and professional skills of playing the instruments... :-)

    Thus I would highly appreciate your support and if the perks don't touch your interest, but you still like what I am doing, so tell it to your friends, share it on the social media and so on... thank you!

story:
It all started with some toy pianos...

Scene: San Diego, Summer 2017

Three intrepid musicians meet at a local cafe to discuss plans to form a new music ensemble. Over coffee and pastries, they imagine a future that goes beyond the conventional boundaries of contemporary art music, one where alternative instruments and uncommon sounds come together to create – music, instruments, ideas, and community.

The obvious answer? Toy pianos.

Figmentum is more than a performing ensemble. We are a unique collective of composers, writers, builders, and more. In the past year alone, our trio of three toy pianos has traveled across America, performing in Florida, Las Vegas, Mississippi, Joshua Tree, and our home in San Diego. We have premiered six new works for toy piano ensemble and recently completed construction of a Harry Partch replica of the Harmonic Canon II, which will make its debut in San Diego in May 2018.

 

2018-2019

After our wildly successful debut season, Figmentum is coming back for more!

Some highlights of our plans for the 2018-2019 season:

  • Commissioning five new works by emerging women composers, including Kari Besharse, Annie Hui-Hsin Hsieh, Niloufar Iravani, Fernanda Aoki Navarro, and Yiheng Yvonne Wu.
  • Expanding our original instrument collection to include a never-before seen bass toy piano and Partch replica adapted viola. 
  • Developing new, creative outreach programs for school-aged children.

Well, that sounds all well and good, but where is my money actually going?

We're glad you asked! Donations to the Figmentum Ensemble will cover:

  • Commission fees for our composers 
  • Materials costs for building our new, AWESOME instruments. 
  • Production costs, including marketing, venue rental, performance materials, etc.
  • Guest artists to perform larger ensemble works alongside us

Why Should You Donate?

Because what we do is really cool. 

  • By summer 2019, Figmentum will have premiered more than 16 NEW WORKS by young composers, with an emphasis on commissioning and performing works by women.
  • We will have established an outreach program that emphasizes hands-on music education for school-aged children. Imagine getting to build your own instrument! Or listening to story time at the library with three toy pianos! 
  • With our Harmonic Canon II, Bass Toy Piano, and Adapted Viola, Figmentum will have continued to create new sounds and instruments in the spirit of Harry Partch. 
  • We want to give back to the community! Toy pianos and new instruments attract attention, and Figmentum aims to connect with new audiences in San Diego and beyond! 

Perks and More!

Donate to Figmentum's 2018-2019 season today and receive one of our amazing perks! (We're pretty partial to the t-shirts, ourselves.) You can also help spread the word by linking to our campaign.

Want to Know More?

Check us out on our website, Soundcloud, Instagram, and Facebook!

story:
As Long As I'm Alive

My name is Jonathan Robinson and I've been fortunate enough to make a living as a musician for quite a while now. Although I've always written songs and had side projects, I've mostly been a lead guitar player for up and coming artists over the years and that's a role I've enjoyed. But now it's time to release a record of my own and get out on the road as a solo artist. The title track, As Long As I'm Alive, expresses exactly what I want to say with this EP. As long as I'm alive I want to make this music with the sounds of slide guitar, extended jams, raw emotion,and lyrics that tell a story and connect with real people who have real hopes, real dreams, and real problems. 

How you can help

I've been working on recording these songs since last October. Some of it was done in Nashville, but I ended up doing a lot of it not far from my hometown in rural NC. The results were so good that the project has become bigger than my initial vision and it seems wrong not to put out the best quality product I possibly can. The songs have been tracked, but I still need to have them mastered, order the physical merchandise, including CDs, vinyl, t-shirts, hats, and stickers, pay for marketing and web design, and I need capital to help pay for transportation for a band as well as all the other expenses of getting out and playing until the project is actually making money. When you contribute, you're pre-ordering the music in whatever medium you want (digital, CD, Vinyl, or all 3), as well as hats and t-shirts. Hopefully, we'll meet our goal of $10,000, but if we don't the priority will be paying for mastering and merchandise. There will also be an intimate performance in NC that early/top contributors will be invited to. I'll also be releasing live videos and content on YouTube, Facebook and Instagram as the campaign runs. As well as pre-ordering, you can help immensely by sharing the campaign and helping to spread the word on social media!! We'd also love to hear from you about venues you'd like to see us play in your cities and towns throughout the country.

The results were so good that the project has become bigger than my initial vision and it seems wrong not to put out the best quality product I possibly can. When you contribute, you're pre-ordering the music in whatever medium you want (digital, CD, Vinyl, or all 3), as well as hats and t-shirts. Hopefully, we'll meet our goal of $10,000, but if we don't the priority will be paying for mastering and merchandise. There will also be an intimate performance in NC that early/top contributors will be invited to. I'll also be releasing live videos and content on YouTube, Facebook and Instagram as the campaign runs. As well as pre-ordering, you can help immensely by sharing the campaign and helping to spread the word on social media!! We'd also love to hear from you about venues you'd like to see us play in your cities and towns throughout the country.

story:
Short Summary

Thank you for checking out my Indiegogo Campaign! Here are a few things about me, and what I am trying to do.

  • I am a Hip-Hop artist based out of Columbia South Carolina
  • This campaign is for the production of the song "Believer". I hope to spread hope through music, and to inspire feel-good vibes for anyone listening.
  • By contributing to this project you will help to kick-start feel-good hip-hop! This would introduce this concept to industry level contacts that I hope will partner to further this movement.

What We Need 

The fund goal is $3,000. Here is a little more information on where the money is going.

  • $2,000 is going toward the production right off the bat. This goes to pay for the folks in Nashville to produce the song, pay for studio time, and involve any other artists that work with them.
  • The other $1,000 will go toward any travel to and from Nashville (if possible), paying any studio time for myself in SC, and any other mishaps or unforeseen problems that I can't afford to pay out of my personal finances.
  • Suggested donation levels are $5, $10, $25, $50, $100, $200, and $500. 
  • Any funds raised above the goal will be used to finance future projects!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you can't give at this time, please share this to any social media outlets that you are connected to.
  • Also, feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools in order to assist in getting the word out!

I appreciate your time. God bless and thank you for your consideration.

story:
Die deutsche Beschreibung findest du demnächst hier!
 

Hello and WELCOME! 

We are so totally excited YOU ARE HERE!

This is Women´s Ultimate Revolution. We believe in the Feminine Force Of Change. New role models on the rise! PLEASE SUPPORT OUR MOVEMENT by helping us to bring our first X-traordinary feature

Moni & Renate

with their Magic Energy and our Powerful Message to the world.

 

 

ARE YOU CURIOUS ABOUT OUR MESSAGE?

 

PLEASE REMEMBER: even if you cannot support us financially, you can help us BIG TIME by just SPREADING THE WORD AND SHARING OUR INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN LINK.

 

BrilliantVoices proudly announces the making of our brand-new music-video

"PASO A PASO" 

The story: in sunny Spain, two X-traordinary Ladies embark on an adventurous journey that ends up touching the lives of everyone they meet.

The video has been filmed in Spain this past summer. We are now in the process of completing the music in the studio, edit the film and beginn with the marketing.
This is where we need YOUR SUPPORT!

We were able to gather a fantastic team of professional film-makers and exquiste musicians for this musicvideo-project.

The song „Paso a Paso“ has been exclusively composed by MATATU for BrilliantVoices. The track will be co-produced by Natalie Jean-Marain & Donald Philp.

Release: March 2019!!

We want to invite YOU, YES EXACTLY YOU to join the journey and support us in the making of the SUMMERHIT 2019??

Check out our wonderful perks! YOU could also be part of one of our up-coming recording sessions LIVE! in the beginning of the new year.

 

WHO ARE WE?
 

We are Natalie Jean-Marain and Marion Kunst. 

Natalie: I am singer, composer and voice coach. I am deeply fascinated with the human voice and all it´s deeper implications. I love to support voices into unfolding and adore to initiate creative projects and bring them to life.

I have the vision of more people realizing their inborn power and bringing their unique genius to the world.

Marion: I am a photographer and visual artist. A free spirit with love for nature, travel and music. I am dedicated to give impulses for people to get out of their "social boxes" and reconquer their freedom.

Together, we conceived and created the BrilliantVoices platform to broadcast new role-models and bring Brilliant Voices to the world.

We

  • encourage people to re-connect with themselves and their inner compass
  • motivate people to ignite their inner spark and realize their most radiant potential
  • produce and feature people with a powerful message and support the realization-process of their artistic project
  • conceive, support, coach, accompany, organize our artists on their way to bring their visions to the world
     

Our main focus is to support Women´s Creative Voices. However we do love, encourage and support ❤️centered men.

 

OUR BIG WHY


Our visions motivate us. 

The messages packed into BrilliantVoices projects, THEY MATTER!

Therefore we put lots of heart-energy into bringing them to YOU.
 

We deeply care to

  • support people, especially women, to show beauty and magic in just being who they are
  • inspire people to check in with their inborn power and go for their dreams
  • motivate us all to steo out of the boxes and be less influenced by external, superficial values and standards
  • re-connect with our authentic desires and express our own uniqueness.
     

Our world becomes increasingly VIRTUALIZED. In a humorous way, BrilliantVoices cares to emphasize the importance of staying connected to REAL LIFE, living real-life relationships and finding love for our bodies as they are.

Perfection is an illusion. The abundance of unique diversity is not.

We want to spread the VIRUS OF JOY and promote autonomy and self-empowerment.

 

THE FUNDING STORY


What do we need the money for? 

After financing the video-shoot, road-movie style, in Spain, it is our now goal to reach as many people as possible with our powerful message. We therefore need to further invest in marketing, distributing and finishing up the production. We have created an outstanding video and are now in the process of completing a high-end music-track.

​Our flexible funding-goal is 7.000 Euros to support the completion of the music-video "Paso A Paso". 

Don't forget to check out our WONDERFUL PERKS and PLEASE REMEMBER:
even if you cannot support us financially, you can be of amazing support by just
SPREADING THE WORD AND SHARING OUR INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN LINK.

story:
PROOF Music is a new modern-day record label that discovers, grooms, and launches music careers, bringing talented new artists to the people.

Working with songwriters, musicians, and mentors, PROOF's team of legendary music industry veterans will hone their sound, write, produce, and take their music to the next level. 

The all-time greats from music history started just this way. With a solid support team, musicians were able to create new and innovative sounds that influenced and changed generations.

We hope to reinvigorate a dormant music industry by empowering the HUMAN element in, as of yet, undiscovered artists. 

See our intro video here.

Leading the Charge is John Custer

Judging from his clients Corrosion of Conformity (COC), Cry of Love, DAG, and BIG Something, to his newest protégés at PROOF Music, Custer is dedicated as ever to his artful craft. 

The lore accompanying  founder Mr. Custer is well-founded in a thirty year career rife with accolades and distinctions: Grammy nomination, GOLD Record, TOP 10 Billboard hits, and albums named "All-time classics."

Referred to as a "Genius," "Rock'n'Roll Jedi Master," and the "Indestructible Godfather of the North Carolina Music Industry," John Custer's storied history is easily accessible on Wikipedia, Website, and Discology.

PROOF Music's equation is strengthened by the collaboration with entrepreneur, branding, and marketing veteran Rebecca Antonelli, Custer's longtime friend and business muse. The duo combined forces, agreeing that the world needs a new way for music to be made. They conceived and formed PROOF Music in an effort to realize this dream. 

Along with PROOF's patrons, songwriters, promoters, industry insiders, supporters and musicians, their mission (with your support) is to find and cultivate the careers of the future rainmakers of music. 

What We Aim to Fund + What You Get

Our 25K+ fundraising goal will go towards the following:

  • Launch the first two PROOF Music artists
  • Organize our all-encompassing Scouting Tour, including Open Mic Nights, churches, and other music showcases
  • Acquire a new group of mind-blowing musicians to provide world-class musical tracks for singing talent 
  • Continue to update state-of-the-art recording options

To DO all this, we need your help.

Your support will make a real difference in:

  1. HOW FAST WE CAN MOVE  
  2. HOW MANY ARTISTS WE CAN SUPPORT

Join our TRIBE and become a part of PROOF Music today.   

Share the Message

We know not everyone can invest in us financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
  • Get the word out and MAKE SOME NOISE about this campaign [think Facebook, Twitter, Instagram]
  • LIKE us on FACEBOOK
  • Indiegogo has many SHARE tools to help you do this
  • Get in touch with us directly with any help / support you may be able to provide. Industry veteran?  Music promoter?  Software engineer?  Social media expert?  We welcome you to our team. Email Dillon@PROOFMusicGroup.com

And that's all there is to it.

See our intro video here.

Thank you for your SUPPORT! It means the world to us and to thousands of aspiring artists.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

Thank you for checking out "J.R. Moon's Legacy Project" campaign! Here are a few things about me, and what I am trying to do.

I am a music producer, singer-songwriter, a minister, a professional youth worker, a proud father, and blessed husband from Boston MA.

This campaign is for the production of J.R. Moon's debuted EP. By God's grace I am ready and able to spread truth, hope, and love through this one-of-a-kind Hip-Hop Soul music. 

By contributing to this project you will help Moonlight Ministries record, produce, and promote this "Legacy Project"! The success of this project would ensure opportunities to partner with other Christ-centered artists, musicians, and record labels in the future.

What We Need 

The funding goal is $17,000 and here is a little more information about how those funds will be spent.

  • $11,000 is going toward the studio recording and music production over the next 6 months. Creating professional quality music is vital to our success, so this also covers any collaboration cost with other artists, producers, and musicians. 
  • $2,500 will cover all the promotion cost. 
  • $2,500 is going towards all marketing merchandise associated with this EP. 
  • $1,000 is set aside for our backers' rewards

Pie Chart Breakdown 

Suggested donation levels are $25, $100, $250, $500, and $1000. 

Any funds raised above the goal will be used to finance future projects through Moonlight Ministries!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not positioned to contribute today, that doesn't mean you can't join the movement:

If you can't give at this time, please share this with your friends and family who are into God-honoring HIp Hop & Soul music... as well as all the social media outlets that you are connected to.  Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools in order to assist in getting the word out as well!

Go to www.moonlightministries.net to enjoy the "MLM Broadcast" and the, "Sermons by James R. Normil" podcast to help you come to know or grow in Christ. Connect with us so we know who you are, so we can inform you of our future events. 

I appreciate your time and thank you for your consideration. May His grace and peace be with you always!

story:
Short Summary

     Hello! Isaiah Ross here; frontman and lead guitarist of Jack Swing. Jack Swing is a band that has moved nonstop since our formation in 2016; steadily rising from Pittsburgh basements to the main stage at every festival in the area. Since 2016 Jack Swing has released three EP's, all being released to exponentially more excitement than the last. Our most recent EP, Get What's Mine For You made a huge splash during this pandemic, gaining over 20k listens on Spotify alone and the leading music video approaching 20k Youtube views. Jack Swing has made it clear that we are here for the long haul. 

      We have been extremely busy during this pandemic. Living together during this time has been a blessing. We hunkered down and carefully constructed our debut full length record and are confident that it is our strongest piece of work yet. The older I've become, the more concerned I've become with doing things the right way and to do this record the right way, we need your help. 

     Jack Swing has become a Pittsburgh staple and we would have it no other way. Whether it's hearing us on your radio on the ride home or at a Steeler's game, we want our music to continue to be a part of your lives. These songs are our undoubtedly our best material and it is crucial to their integrity that we record them the right way. Your donation will go directly towards helping us do just that. This is a record that will bring everyone along with it. As Pittsburgh finally has gained some musical spotlight we want to help shift the musical narrative of this city  because there are so many incredible artists here who deserve recognition. This record will continue to shift that narrative towards Pittsburgh being recognized as the music city that it truly is. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

     This campaign will directly assist with funding the recording and mastering of Jack Swing's debut full length album, as well as assist with marketing and funding of visual content to promote the album. Recording, mixing, and mastering this album will cost roughly $10,000 which is where we will set our goal. 

     We have created a tier perk system within which perks range from unique and exciting Jack Swing merchandise to a personal song written for the donor by myself to be uploaded to a unique Bandcamp album. Donations of $150 or more will automatically pre-order a physical copy of the album when physical copies are available as gain early access to special recordings such as demos of the record before they are publicly released. 

     If we do not reach our entire goal all the funds will still go directly towards the creation and promotion of the album. While we need your help to make this album what it should be we will still do whatever necessary to make it according to our standards regardless of reaching the goal. 

 

The Impact

     This record is one that needs to be made. I know what it feels like to be saved by music, to be rescued from a dark time by art that resonates with you, to be inspired to be the best version of yourself from an outside force. I honed these feelings with each Jack Swing release and confidently present them on this record. This is a time for songs of light, inspiration, and empowerment, which is exactly what this album turned out to be. Coming out of this tumultuous year music and art will be crucial in reassembling our culture and this is a record that should be at the forefront of said transition. Jack Swing has always had a way of bringing all types of people together, an energy that this record carries, and the we will undoubtedly need as we attempt to move forward from a  year with so many unforeseen challenges.  Jack Swing has gotten to this level because we believe in music. Music that reflects passion, collaboration, dedication to the craft, and innovation. I started this band because I felt the music I was surrounded by lacked these things and I attribute the success that we have had to sticking true to ourselves and these themes. I believe its time for rock music to get with the times, and this record is one step in that direction. 

     As previously stated, each Jack Swing release has been met with exponentially more excitement than the last. We finally are at the point where we know how to both create the record that we intend to, as well as get it to the people that need to hear it. We have gotten to this point because we truly believe in music that reflects dedication to the craft, innovation, and collaboration. It has taken years of trial and error as it does to grow confident in any craft but through that trial and error comes true confidence and with true confidence I can say to you with your help with we can truly make something special. 

 

Risks & Challenges

There are always risks when starting a project of this magnitude. What if the band breaks up? What if the record flops? I'm sure you've seen examples of these, I myself have lived them and have made every decision with all of my past experiences in mind. Jack Swing has moved at a steady but careful pace and I wanted to wait to create this record until a few things were certain; I needed Jack Swing to be a team, one that would understand my vision and see it through to the end. The lineup now consists of myself and the people that I have been playing music with the longest in my life, my closest friends, and people that I would trust not only with my life, but with my grooves. After playing live music for over 10 years you begin to identify what it takes to create a true foundation. Every step taken in this band has been done with the intention of building that foundation into something powerful, something that is not going anywhere anytime soon. 

We completely understand if you cannot help financially as it is a tough time for all of us! There are still ways that you can be involved: 

  1. Help us out by sharing the campaign around on social media!
  2. Head to our Bandcamp and purchase one of our tapes and listen with a friend!
  3. Follow us on all streaming services and run those streams up!
story_txt:
Short Summary
     Hello! Isaiah Ross here; frontman and lead guitarist of Jack Swing. Jack Swing is a band that has moved nonstop since our formation in 2016; steadily rising from Pittsburgh basements to the main stage at every festival in the area. Since 2016 Jack Swing has released three EP's, all being released to exponentially more excitement than the last. Our most recent EP, Get What's Mine For You made a huge splash during this pandemic, gaining over 20k listens on Spotify alone and the leading music video approaching 20k Youtube views. Jack Swing has made it clear that we are here for the long haul. 
      We have been extremely busy during this pandemic. Living together during this time has been a blessing. We hunkered down and carefully constructed our debut full length record and are confident that it is our strongest piece of work yet. The older I've become, the more concerned I've become with doing things the right way and to do this record the right way, we need your help. 
     Jack Swing has become a Pittsburgh staple and we would have it no other way. Whether it's hearing us on your radio on the ride home or at a Steeler's game, we want our music to continue to be a part of your lives. These songs are our undoubtedly our best material and it is crucial to their integrity that we record them the right way. Your donation will go directly towards helping us do just that. This is a record that will bring everyone along with it. As Pittsburgh finally has gained some musical spotlight we want to help shift the musical narrative of this city  because there are so many incredible artists here who deserve recognition. This record will continue to shift that narrative towards Pittsburgh being recognized as the music city that it truly is. 
 

What We Need & What You Get
     This campaign will directly assist with funding the recording and mastering of Jack Swing's debut full length album, as well as assist with marketing and funding of visual content to promote the album. Recording, mixing, and mastering this album will cost roughly $10,000 which is where we will set our goal. 
     We have created a tier perk system within which perks range from unique and exciting Jack Swing merchandise to a personal song written for the donor by myself to be uploaded to a unique Bandcamp album. Donations of $150 or more will automatically pre-order a physical copy of the album when physical copies are available as gain early access to special recordings such as demos of the record before they are publicly released. 
     If we do not reach our entire goal all the funds will still go directly towards the creation and promotion of the album. While we need your help to make this album what it should be we will still do whatever necessary to make it according to our standards regardless of reaching the goal. 
 

The Impact
     This record is one that needs to be made. I know what it feels like to be saved by music, to be rescued from a dark time by art that resonates with you, to be inspired to be the best version of yourself from an outside force. I honed these feelings with each Jack Swing release and confidently present them on this record. This is a time for songs of light, inspiration, and empowerment, which is exactly what this album turned out to be. Coming out of this tumultuous year music and art will be crucial in reassembling our culture and this is a record that should be at the forefront of said transition. Jack Swing has always had a way of bringing all types of people together, an energy that this record carries, and the we will undoubtedly need as we attempt to move forward from a  year with so many unforeseen challenges.  Jack Swing has gotten to this level because we believe in music. Music that reflects passion, collaboration, dedication to the craft, and innovation. I started this band because I felt the music I was surrounded by lacked these things and I attribute the success that we have had to sticking true to ourselves and these themes. I believe its time for rock music to get with the times, and this record is one step in that direction. 
     As previously stated, each Jack Swing release has been met with exponentially more excitement than the last. We finally are at the point where we know how to both create the record that we intend to, as well as get it to the people that need to hear it. We have gotten to this point because we truly believe in music that reflects dedication to the craft, innovation, and collaboration. It has taken years of trial and error as it does to grow confident in any craft but through that trial and error comes true confidence and with true confidence I can say to you with your help with we can truly make something special. 
 

Risks & Challenges
There are always risks when starting a project of this magnitude. What if the band breaks up? What if the record flops? I'm sure you've seen examples of these, I myself have lived them and have made every decision with all of my past experiences in mind. Jack Swing has moved at a steady but careful pace and I wanted to wait to create this record until a few things were certain; I needed Jack Swing to be a team, one that would understand my vision and see it through to the end. The lineup now consists of myself and the people that I have been playing music with the longest in my life, my closest friends, and people that I would trust not only with my life, but with my grooves. After playing live music for over 10 years you begin to identify what it takes to create a true foundation. Every step taken in this band has been done with the intention of building that foundation into something powerful, something that is not going anywhere anytime soon. 

We completely understand if you cannot help financially as it is a tough time for all of us! There are still ways that you can be involved: 

Help us out by sharing the campaign around on social media!
Head to our Bandcamp and purchase one of our tapes and listen with a friend!
Follow us on all streaming services and run those streams up!

story:
Welcome!

Hola mi gente! My name is Reina Mar and I am a Latin Pop artist from New Jersey!

I'll first start off saying, I think this past year was pretty insane! There were definitely a lot of set backs during the pandemic, but I think we could all say there were some positive breakthroughs and situations that have come out of it. One of those positive breakthroughs for me, was being able to focus on creating my original music and really diving deep into my style & sound as an artist.  

I am so blessed to say I was able to release my very first debut latin pop single called "Novela" last March! Novela means the world to me because it was not only my first song, but a song that truly expressed my latin culture &  helped me discover different parts of me artistically that I never thought I had. Novela also paved the way for me artistically and led me to create my debut EP! I am so blessed that Novela has become the most popular song off of the EP and continues to grow and bring in so many opportunities for my music career.

The Opportunity 

I'm so blessed to say, I have been granted with an opportunity to bring "Novela" to main stream radio and produce my very first music video with one of the finest NYC videographers Aresmendi Merejo from AD Media Films!

Since I am an unsigned artist, it has been extremely difficult to be able to back myself thus far and it continues to get harder as more opportunities come. This is why I need your help and support! Donating any amount(small or large)to this campaign, will give me that extra push to bring my career to the next level and expose Novela across the globe! NO AMOUNT IS TOO SMALL!

Details On Project Expenses:

Here is the approximate break down in what is needed for both projects:

  1. Radio Campaign to Bring Novela onto main stream Radio is: $3,000
  2. Music Video shot & directed by AdMedia Films: $5,000
  • Videography/Post Production: $2,500
  • Hair/Make Up: $350
  • ​Wardrobe/Styling : $800
  • Dancers/ Choreagrapher/Actors: $600
  • Locations/Permits:  $700
  • Props/Set: $100

Approximate Total: $8,000

Different Levels of Giving

I have created different levels of giving that include awesome perks! You do NOT have to choose a "perk' in order to contribute. They are simply available for me to be able to give something back to you for your generosity. I just appreciate your kindness and willingness to be a part of this! 

Other Ways You Can Help

It is 100% understandable if you can't contribute at this time, but there are definitely other ways you could help! You could go stream my music on any platform of you choice or spread the word about my Indiegogo by sharing the campaign! This would still be a HUGE help to me!

 

-I am so thankful for every single one of you and the love & support you've shown me thus far & I hope we could make these projects a reality! Please feel free to contact me with any questions you may have at:

Reinamarmusic@gmail.com

Thanks so much! :)

-Reina

story:
Like most of you, life changed drastically for Roxy Roca starting in March 2020. All of the momentum we'd built from years of making music vanished overnight as shows, tours, and the music industry itself faced widespread cancellations.  Our plans to write music, rehearse, record, and perform were abruptly put on hold with the uncertainty surrounding the pandemic.  Flash forward nearly a year and a half later and we are finally ready to start making moves as a band once again.

Throughout Roxy Roca's 10+ years of playing, our fans have always been the lifeblood and biggest motivator of the band.  We have amazing fans here in Texas, across the US, and around the world, and because of that we've got no plans of packing it in and calling it a day.  But for the first time ever, we do need some help going forward, so we are asking for your support!

It's no secret that recording and promoting an album is an expensive endeavor.  Tracking, mixing, mastering, pressing, replication, publicity, advertising, touring expenses.  These things add up QUICKLY.  In the past, we've always been able to foot the bill ourselves by playing shows, but COVID-19 shattered those plans and we've got to find another way.

We have a handful of demos written and an excellent team at Edgewater Music Group lined up to help lead us through the process of creating something great for you--all we need now is that extra push to help us achieve those goals.

Take a look at the perks we have on offer in exchange for your support.  If you're a fan of our music, we want to give you unprecedented access and rewards in exchange for your support of this new initiative to help the band come back stronger than ever!

Risks & Challenges

Any campaign like this comes with a certain amount of risk.  We're still in the midst of a global pandemic, and it has not been kind to the music industry.  But the biggest risk we face is that the project doesn't get funded and this new record won't get made.  If you can help us with that part, we promise to take it the rest of the way and deliver you guys with unforgettable music that we know you'll enjoy!

story:
Short Summary

Hello!  I am a performing and recording artist on my second album project in Nashville, TN.  I did this once successfully on my first album and I'm reaching out to you again to continue our momentum with my second 7-song EP album titled "Ain't My Baby Grand".   

I have been performing full-time for over 10 years.  If you aren't familiar with my style or music from my first album "Painting You Gone", you may know me from a pianobar or that girl that plays keytar.    I continue to have over 200 dates a year in pianobars all over the U.S. and the world.   I sing, play piano and other instruments in a high energy show.  If you know pianobars, you know what I do!  I love my life!

These 7 songs on this album were selected for me by my Nashville Creative Director and former 16-year ASCAP Executive and music industry veteran Herky Williams as well as my legendary manager Butch Stone.   The writers on these songs are some of the best writers in history. 

This title track "Ain't My Baby Grand" couldn't be more perfect for me and my brand.  Think Ray Charles on keys meets Bonnie Raitt vocals.

I'm currently an independent artist and have managed myself for years but I'm on the verge of a big break with my new management and team in Nashville!  

I can only do it with YOUR HELP!  Today's music industry allows artists like me to reach YOU my fans and followers to ultimately achieve financial goals to in turn reach our artistic goals and aspirations.

2nd Album Songs & Songwriters:

  1. Ain’t My Baby Grand - Brett James and James Slater
  2. I’m Just Lookin’ - Tony Arata
  3. Getaway Car - Billy Mann
  4. I See Sky - Steve Diamond
  5. Maybe You Should - Mike Reid / Taylor Hicks / Gary Nicholson
  6. Do I Ever Cross Your Mind - Michael Smotherman / Billy Burnette
  7. Used  - Bekka Bramlett

Producer & Musicians:

  • Larry Beaird (Producer, Acoustic/Classical Guitar)
  • Eli Beaird (Bass)
  • Jim DeBlanc (Engineer)
  • Steve "Prez" Nathan (Piano/B3/Strings)
  • Chad Cromwell (Percussion)
  • JT Corenflos (Electric Guitar)
  • Russ Pahl (Steel)

What We Need & What You Get

If I raise the money I've targeted, I will achieve the following:

  • Finish "Ain't My Baby Grand" recording, mix, master and have album shrink wrapped and ready for distribution.
  • Complete a PHOTOSHOOT with a famous celebrity photorapher for my album cover art.
  • Hire Nashville's finest musicians and throw one heck of a NASHVILLE SHOWCASE in October 2015 for music label exec's to attend.  eek!!!
  • Hire a MARKETING & PRESS FIRM to get the exposure I need to labels and the masses.
  • AND......shoot a MUSIC VIDEO.  Music videos are a very important of an artist's development and I already have the creative vision in mind!
I'm an artist on many levels.  My art (paintings/drawings) and graphic design can be seen on my website www.susanerwin.com.  I've done all my web and marketing design and CD art on all projects. 

CHECK OUT THESE PERKS I CAME UP WITH!
  • I'm offering the obvious album downloads, signed CDs, posters, tshirts, and more
  • ...but the COOLEST?  My original artwork.  I'm a watercolor and pen artist.  I have sold over 75 paintings in the last year.  My success began during my first Indiegogo campaign and now my art is ALL OVER THE WORLD!
  • I've also got a studio visit, home or skype motivational visit, at-home concert, and more!
  • .....Scroll and click on PERKS in this campaign to read more!

Where will funds go if $30,000 isn't reached?

  • If I don't reach the entire goal, I will have to choose what money I've raised to apply to the most important milestones, such as CD completion first, then press firm, then music video... something similar to that.

The Impact

  • Your contribution makes you a part of my self-made grassroots artistry in today's challenging music industry.  You get to be a part of my success and ability to bring good music to the world.
  • I've been honing my performance craft for over 10 years.  They say it's a slow burn to the top and an overnight success is 15 years in the making...well I'm ripe and ready! 

  • My first album put me on the map as a legitimate original singer/songwriter in Nashville.  I was successful with my fanbase and through my growth in that project, I'm coming to you with the next step on my dream ladder of success.

Risks & Challenges

I know people value the transparency and behind the scenes look at what goes down in projects like these.  I've worked to mitigate any risks and obstacles I may face on the way to achieving this goal primarily by having a steady income stream from former and current venue and merch sales. 

The following shows the resources needed in today's market to "break" an artist like me.  Keep in mind, music labels break artists for no less than $200,000.  I'm doing it with you for less but it still is A LOT of money for me at this point in my career.  I need your help!

  • Creative Director fees
  • Management fees
  • Producer fees
  • Studio Musician fees (the best of Nashville's music row!)
  • Mix Engineer fees
  • Mastering fees
  • Art and Photography fees (I do my own art but obviously need a photographer)
  • CD print and burning for distribution
  • Press & Marketing fees
  • Music video storyboard developer, videography and editing fees
  • Social media and web development resources
  • Live venue band fees
  • Merchandise creator fees
  • ....there's more but you get the point I'm sure!

I didn't realize the first time I did this what all it entails until I went through it.  I've learned so much! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but you can still help me by sharing this on your social media sites.  That would mean just as much!

  • Let's cause a RUCKUS and make some noise about my campaign on your social media accounts!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
We’ve Just Finished Our 21st Season in Greve in Chianti!

19 talented singers from around the world experienced this life-changing program and 3 beautiful concerts.

We're Still Raising Funds For This Season to Take Care of Expenses That the Fee Does Not Cover.
We Know You Will Open Your Hearts and GIVE Generously TODAY!
All Donations are Tax-Deductible!

One of The Ways We Want to Thank Our Loyal Contributors
Is to Share a Taste of Tuscany With You Through Our Special Perks Listed in the Side Bar.

YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS MAKE ALL THE DIFFERENCE!

Your contributions are very important to the mission of “Passing on the Torch of Beautiful and Healthy Singing to the Next Generation” and supporting this seasons objectives:

  • The Guest Teacher Program with four teachers attending with their students from the U.S, France, and China.
  • Maintaining an Affordable Fee for talented singers to attend regardless of their financial means.  Past participants continue to say, “The program changed my life.”
  • Publication of Materials Representing 60 Years of Daniel’s Experience and Life-Long Work.  A frequent comment from former students is “I am still using the vocalizes and techniques you gave me years ago.”

More About Who We Are

The Daniel Ferro Vocal Program, Inc.  is an intensive, three-week vocal studies course, established as a means for singers to experience the rich musical and cultural traditions of Italy. The past twenty seasons in the charming town of Greve in Chianti have been resounding successes, featuring over 500 singers from 29 countries. The distinguished international faculty is headed by Maestro Daniel Ferro of The Juilliard School, Lincoln Center, New York City.

Dušica Bijelić (Soprano), Royal Opera House, London and DFVP scholarship recipient, guest artist at Greve concert.

This program engages participants in a lively schedule comprised of master classes, private lessons, coachings, and Italian language study. The 2014 program presented three splendid public concerts, which were received with great enthusiasm and appreciation.

Students at DFVP Master Class in Greve.
Classical Singer Magazine featured Daniel Ferro and his vision and mission for the future of the program. As we approach our twenty-first year in Tuscany we remain committed to providing a uniquely thorough artistic experience, encouraging talent and developing artists to realize their fullest potential. Each year, we are gratified to see past participants continuing to distinguish themselves on operatic and concert stages including:

  • The Metropolitan Opera
  • The San Francisco Opera
  • Bayreuther Festspiele
  • The Royal Opera House: Covent Garden
  • Chicago Lyric Opera
  • Teatro alla Scala

In addition, we are proud to have a number of past participants successfully teaching at leading conservatories and universities.

We hope you will be inspired to support this exciting program for young vocal artists!

Other Ways You Can Help!

Become an "Underwriter" 

Join our family of sponsors and help underwrite an element of the Program. Young singers can be a vulnerable group, constantly confronted with the dual pressures of performance and pocketbook. We consider it among our responsibilities to alleviate some of that burden by raising money for both scholarship aid and the supplemental funds that keep program fees affordable. The assistance of our growing family of friends and supporters is vital to the successful fulfilment of that pledge.  

As an exclusive "Underwriter of the Program," you'll enjoy all the benefits from our list of Thank You Gifts, as well as recognition in concert programs and published materials for the following gifts:

  • Sponsor a Full Week of Piano Rentals ($1,200)
  • Sponsor the Concert at Chiesa di San Leolino ($2,500)
  • Sponsor the Opening Concert and Reception at Castello di Verrazzano ($5,000)
  • Sponsor a Young Artist with a Full Scholarship ($6,000)
  • Sponsor a Guest Teacher for the entire program ($7,500)      

Behind the scenes preparation for Greve concert.

PLEASE SPREAD THE NEWS!

We understand some friends just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help! Please spread the news of our campaign with friends and stay connected with us on our social media platforms:

  • "Like" our Facebook Page - Daniel Ferro Vocal Program - to stay up to date with news and events of the current season and connect with past participants
  • "Follow" us on Twitter (@DFVocalProgram) for up-to-the-minute reports during this summer's session
  • Visit our website Daniel Ferro Vocal Program for additional information!

We greatly appreciate all our past, current,

and future supporters!

Grazie Mille!
story_txt:
We’ve Just Finished Our 21st Season in Greve in Chianti!

19 talented singers from around the world experienced this life-changing program and 3 beautiful concerts.We're Still Raising Funds For This Season to Take Care of Expenses That the Fee Does Not Cover.

We Know You Will Open Your Hearts and GIVE Generously TODAY!

All Donations are Tax-Deductible!One of The Ways We Want to Thank Our Loyal ContributorsIs to Share a Taste of Tuscany With You Through Our Special Perks Listed in the Side Bar.

YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS MAKE ALL THE DIFFERENCE!Your contributions are very important to the mission of “Passing on the Torch of Beautiful and Healthy Singing to the Next Generation” and supporting this seasons objectives:
The Guest Teacher Program with four teachers attending with their students from the U.S, France, and China.
Maintaining an Affordable Fee for talented singers to attend regardless of their financial means.  Past participants continue to say, “The program changed my life.”

Publication of Materials Representing 60 Years of Daniel’s Experience and Life-Long Work.  A frequent comment from former students is “I am still using the vocalizes and techniques you gave me years ago.”






More About Who We Are
The Daniel Ferro Vocal Program, Inc.  is an intensive, three-week vocal studies course, established as a means for singers to experience the rich musical and cultural traditions of Italy. The past twenty seasons in the charming town of Greve in Chianti have been resounding successes, featuring over 500 singers from 29 countries. The distinguished international faculty is headed by Maestro Daniel Ferro of The Juilliard School, Lincoln Center, New York City.Dušica Bijelić (Soprano), Royal Opera House, London and DFVP scholarship recipient, guest artist at Greve concert.
This program engages participants in a lively schedule comprised of master classes, private lessons, coachings, and Italian language study. The 2014 program presented three splendid public concerts, which were received with great enthusiasm and appreciation.




Students at DFVP Master Class in Greve.
Classical Singer Magazine featured Daniel Ferro and his vision and mission for the future of the program. As we approach our twenty-first year in Tuscany we remain committed to providing a uniquely thorough artistic experience, encouraging talent and developing artists to realize their fullest potential. Each year, we are gratified to see past participants continuing to distinguish themselves on operatic and concert stages including:

The Metropolitan Opera

The San Francisco Opera


Bayreuther Festspiele


The Royal Opera House: Covent Garden


Chicago Lyric Opera


Teatro alla Scala



In addition, we are proud to have a number of past participants successfully teaching at leading conservatories and universities.
We hope you will be inspired to support this exciting program for young vocal artists!




Other Ways You Can Help!
Become an "Underwriter" 
Join our family of sponsors and help underwrite an element of the Program. Young singers can be a vulnerable group, constantly confronted with the dual pressures of performance and pocketbook. We consider it among our responsibilities to alleviate some of that burden by raising money for both scholarship aid and the supplemental funds that keep program fees affordable. The assistance of our growing family of friends and supporters is vital to the successful fulfilment of that pledge.  
As an exclusive "Underwriter of the Program," you'll enjoy all the benefits from our list of Thank You Gifts, as well as recognition in concert programs and published materials for the following gifts:


Sponsor a Full Week of Piano Rentals ($1,200)

Sponsor the Concert at Chiesa di San Leolino ($2,500)

Sponsor the Opening Concert and Reception at Castello di Verrazzano ($5,000)

Sponsor a Young Artist with a Full Scholarship ($6,000)

Sponsor a Guest Teacher for the entire program ($7,500)      







Behind the scenes preparation for Greve concert.
PLEASE SPREAD THE NEWS!
We understand some friends just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help! Please spread the news of our campaign with friends and stay connected with us on our social media platforms:


"Like" our Facebook Page - Daniel Ferro Vocal Program - to stay up to date with news and events of the current season and connect with past participants

"Follow" us on Twitter (@DFVocalProgram) for up-to-the-minute reports during this summer's session

Visit our website Daniel Ferro Vocal Program for additional information!





We greatly appreciate all our past, current,
and future supporters!
Grazie Mille!

story:
We have been incredibly blessed this past year with so many opportunities, experiences, and connections we can't even count. Our band has been growing exponentially. So much so that we are ready to get on the road and as Rafael is always saying, 'Take it to the next Level'! We are so excited to announce that this October The Rafael Tranquilino Band will going on our longest tour stretch of all! FOUR WEEKS and  FOUR STATES, It's the  much anticipated 'Music Without Borders' TOUR!!

We have the connections. We have the dates booked. We have the album recorded...but there are a few things that we still need to make this trip possible and successful...and the need is pretty big...

We need a touring vehicle that can fit four-six people, a lightweight travel trailer or camper, and merchandise to sell.

Touring is absolutely essential to the success of an artist, especially for independent artists. Unfortunately touring without major label support can be really limiting (we can only play where the budget includes lodging for the band) , expensive (fast food/dining out,hotels, gas...etc), and even dangerous (relying on 'friends of friends of friends' for a place to stay between shows). If we are able to pull our lodging with us there will never be a concern about whether or not we can afford the hotel at the next stop or be crashing on someone's pool table. This also means that we can save on food and eat healthier. A kitchen, even a mini kitchen means we can buy groceries and prepare food for ourselves. The other really exciting plus is that if we are completely self contained we can afford to go to the small towns and play for venues that maybe can afford to pay us but can't put us up. We don't need something new and fancy. There are tons of great deals on used campers and travel trailers on Craigslist and at dealerships online and on site!

The other side to the travel aspect is the vehicle to haul the trailer! Nothing fancy, and again it doesn't have to be new. We are looking at low mileage pre-owned minivans. Something similar to a  Dodge Grand Caravan. The few times we have needed to rent a vehicle for regional touring the Dodge Grand Caravan has been perfect! Fits the whole band in one car, tons of cargo space for all the gear, doesn't kill you on gas mileage, and has enough power to haul the small trailer we need!

Lastly but just as importantly we desperately need high quality merchandise to sell! We have all the artistic materials; albums recorded but unable to duplicate, t-shirt and poster designs ready to be put to press, we just need the funds to do it! Oh and P.S. that merchandise DOUBLES as the perks listed for this campaign!! You get a piece of the action too!!

Owning a trailer and understanding what it truly means to travel with one can be a daunting task. Even knowing how to drive a car with a trailer is tricky. However we are very fortunate to have veteran traveling musicians who use similar set-ups who are able and willing to help teach us all the ins and outs of trailer travel. You can know that whatever equipment you help us to purchase will be well maintained and operated safely. We are also fortunate to have friends in the car business and maintenance industries who are able to help us with choosing the right vehicle as well.

We know that this is a big need and a big ask. We would just like you to know that by helping us achieve this goal you are not just investing in a one time opportunity. You are directly affecting our future and success for years to come. These are two literal vehicles to success! Having reliable touring equipment will enable us to tour regularly across the country throughout the year without the extras stress, expense and limitations. Please consider donating to our campaign. Every single dollar helps! If you are unable to donate, no worries. Please forward and share this campaign to anyone that you think may be interested and able to help us on our way,... and keep listening to the music! We appreciate and love all of you! Thank you so much for your continued support and God willing with your help we will see you on the road!!


BLUES ON!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

story:
The mixes are in and we are on our way polishing the album! Day 1 Digital Copies will be out before physical copies (Jan. 2017) as we finish the final step! Thank you all so much!!

 

 

"Finer Things" will mark my first full studio album with songs that reflect what I have been though these last few years. I am very excited to have such a talented pool of musicians here in Nashville to see this to completion. I know that you will love the results and melodies we will create!

All funding from this campaign will go directly to complete this album and add another level of polish to the tracks. Recording is expensive, and I live solely on my music. To have a complete full-album costs around 4k which pays the studio (Big Punch Music, Nashville, TN) the musicians (5) and post-editing & mastering of tracks which is around $250 per song. By showing your support, you are not just helping me finish the album but also supporting everyone else involved who all share the same passion as I do to create the best music possible!

Supporters will be given an early copy of the album before it goes on iTunes, Pandora & Amazon as well as additional gifts such as signed copies of the album, hand-written lyric sheets and personal messages to show my appreciation for helping me create "Finer Things".

 

Tracking was completed in November and now we are on the process of editing and mastering the album! This campaign will help fund the last half of the albums costs for printing & distribution

 

Risks & Challenges -

The biggest foe in any project is budget. Since my living is based solely off my music, your support will help off-set these expenses while getting fun perks for doing so!

 

Other Ways You Can Help -  

We all have bills to pay and I understand that! If you are not able to support the album with donations, please feel free to share the campaign with your friends & family or other music lovers so this can be a success! Together we can make it happen.

 

Sincerely, 

Sean Ryan

story:
MJ Ultra

Let me start by telling you that music is a part of me.  It is what I need to do with my life and now I've spent years working on my craft to show it to you and ask for you to jump in while the iron is hot.

The way something is made popular is by repetition and reach, which is done by Marketing, promotions, and public relations.   If you fund this crowdfunding campaign, it will give us the resources needed to do these things INDEPENDENTLY!  The world of music has changed so much and with so much music for free, it is very difficult to push over the top and monetize, which I am so close to making happen.  This campaign will put my career into the position to make money making music and continue to provide that to my fans.

Listen to the album yourself if you have not already heard it and decide for yourself.  Here is a private link for you:

OCEAN DRIVE - THE COMPLETE ALBUM

https://soundcloud.com/ultralove/sets/private-o...

Upon the digital release of the album in March '17, there will be a few additional tracks added to what you've heard above! 

Here's one of them:

LA '09 - https://soundcloud.com/ultralove/la-09

We are releasing the song "Paradise" which is on the album in 2 weeks.  The video for it is complete and ready to launch as well.

4.9m views of my new song with BoxinLion called Black and White

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ugpvZ61CnD8

Currently the album is spinning on over 100 college and non-commercial radio stations throughout North America and will continue to do so well into the next year. (Planetary PR)

We have booked various appearances, shows, and radio interviews in cities and towns where the album is performing best. In the spring we are concentrating on a regional tour of the northwest starting off on March 10th at Oregon State University. (More details TBD)

In addition to some exciting new collaborations in the coming months we are only weeks away from premiering a BRAND NEW music video for the song, "Paradise"!

Here's a bit more we achieved over the last year. 

ROXY (OFFICIAL VIDEO) 

 

THUNDER (OFFICIAL VIDEO) 

 

OCEAN DRIVE (LIVE)

 

WASTING AWAY (LIVE)

Throughout the course of the crowdfunding campaign I will keep you up to date, right here, with any new and exciting news as grow closer to our goal of $18k. Since we've begun work on the PR and marketing phase of the launch, each week brings more exciting news. Plus we have tons of new content we will start to release. 

Contribute what you can, but if for whatever reason you cannot contribute it is just as valuable to us that you SHARE our campaign!

Thank you so very much for your continued love and support and I'm looking forward seeing you in a city near you.

-MJ

story:
Short Summary

I'm an Atlanta based jazz vocalist, lyricist, composer and educator with a sincere need to share the healing power of jazz music all over the world.  Although I’ve spent the last several decades serving  society through a very different platform, it’s time to take my music out of my heart and put it out front.  This project is the connective tissue between my Gospel roots, rural & urban Blues, and modern Jazz – all of which are steeped with emotional messages to the human spirit.

I need your help to get this message heard.

 

Here is my Estimate of what the project will cost:

 

Rehearsals

400

Musicians

3250

Video /Editing

600

Audio Tracking/Editing/Mixing

2800

Studio Time

2600

Additional Tracking/Editing/Mixing

1800

Mastering

2000

Artwork & Cover design

800

Printing CDs, /Duplication/Vinyl

2200

Radio/Promotion/ Press campaigns

4500

Photo shoot w/ head shots

500

Producer Fee

3500

Guest Artist Fee

500

Mechanical licenses

400

Professional liner notes

1000

TOTAL

26, 850.00

 

I've been able to save some funds from gigs I've done over the last year and a half, but no matter how I count it, I'm about 20K short.  That's why I need your help.    

I’m seeking 20-thousand dollars to complete this project.  The bottom line is the money will go for making beautiful Jazz music, Music that inspires and touches your spirit.

Let's make this music together, you and me.

 

Thanks, for your help,

 

Lu (Sweet Lu) Olutosin

story:
WHO ARE BEARS FOR YEARS?

Hello & Welcome! We are Bears For Years, your very own Boston based jazzy folk-rock duo, and this is our story...

Bears For Years began as a songwriting collaboration and in-studio project between Boston-area musicians Gina Monafo and Patrick S. Barry in late 2013. Over the course of the following few years we had written enough songs for a full album and began work on our debut Ursa Major in August of 2016. The record, which is being engineered and produced at Watch City Studios by Joel Simches, features Monafo and Barry covering nearly all vocals and instrumentation, accompanied by Joel Silloway (The Life Electric) on drums. Bears For Years have also been taking their music to the stage, along with Mr. Silloway and bassist Matt Ohanian (Daeves).

We like to think of our sound as a blend of jazz and folk, with elements of wistful pop and dark prog rock undertones. Working with a live rhythm section has inspired us by injecting a sense of raw excitement into our sound, something we hope to achieve on Ursa Major. Joel Simches, whose work within the Boston community as both producer and musician is prolific, brings years of experience and creative empathy to the production of this record . With basic tracks completed, we cannot wait dig in and finish this up!

The album and songs are halfway done! We've got the drums, bass, and basic acoustic guitar and keyboard tracks completed, now for the finishing touches...

WHY ARE WE MAKING THIS RECORD?

A professional representation of our sound is key to our success. This will greatly impact our ability to spread our sound and reach a wider audience.

Having a quality, but also genuine, representation of one's music is crucial for any musician/band. We put so much work into the composition and arrangement of our songs, and it's important to us that we can give this album a fully fledged studio treatment that will bring the songs to life. We have done so much in the way of home recording for demos and other projects, and we feel this album deserves better than what we can produce ourselves on a low budget or at home. We want to represent our music in the best light, the light it deserves. After hearing how the basic tracks came out, we feel it was well worth the initial investment and can't wait to finish recording the album!

CAMPAIGN BREAKDOWN

Here’s everything we need and how much it goes for:

Studio Time ~ 3days@$450ea= $1,350 - to record the remaining parts: vocals, electric guitar, keyboard/synth, auxilliary percussion

Mixing ~$150 x 10 songs= $1,500 - Each track will be mixed to create the best sounding balance of instrumentation, volume, dynamics, effects, etc. This is where the magic happens.

Mastering ~$50 x 10 songs= $500 -  Each track will be mastered to ensure the album provides a seamless listening experience, cohesive in volume, texture and color. The finishing touch.

Pressing CD’s ~$3 x 100= $300 - We'll need to press physical copies of the album to CD format

Album Artwork ~$200 - We'll contract with an artist for album artwork design and production

Indiegogo/shipping fees ~$200 @5% - Fees the fundraising platform charges us to use their service

Music Video ~ whatever we have left over! - If we have any funds left over they will go toward making the very first Bears For Years music video

HOW YOU CAN HELP!

Please consider making a contribution of ANY size, every gesture makes a difference! If you can't contribute, consider sharing the campaign for all to see.

If you'd like to contribute, just click the pink "BACK IT" button and enter your contribution amount. If there is a specific perk you're interested in, click on it to contribute and secure your perk!

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

Mixing ~$150 x 10 songs= $1,500 - Each track will be mixed to create the best sounding balance of instrumentation, volume, dynamics, effects, etc. This is where the magic happens.
Mastering ~$50 x 10 songs= $500 -  Each track will be mastered to ensure the album provides a seamless listening experience, cohesive in volume, texture and color. The finishing touch.
Pressing CD’s ~$3 x 100= $300 - We'll need to press physical copies of the album to CD format
Album Artwork ~$200 - We'll contract with an artist for album artwork design and production
Indiegogo/shipping fees ~$200 @5% - Fees the fundraising platform charges us to use their service
Music Video ~ whatever we have left over! - If we have any funds left over they will go toward making the very first Bears For Years music video
HOW YOU CAN HELP!
Please consider making a contribution of ANY size, every gesture makes a difference! If you can't contribute, consider sharing the campaign for all to see.
If you'd like to contribute, just click the pink "BACK IT" button and enter your contribution amount. If there is a specific perk you're interested in, click on it to contribute and secure your perk!
THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
-Hey Pals!

Can you believe I've been DJing and producing for 5 years and this is my first album!? Crazy right!?
Well after nearly a year of writing and scrapping songs and sounds, I have finally put together a cohesive album that I am really excited to share with you! I call it ≠ - Not Equal.

This record is not for the clubs. Rather, it is music to get you through the cold harsh months of winter stuck inside and get you ready for the lovely spring and summer months. It is electronic music that bares my passion and soul. You will not find vocals on this record, it is purely an instrumental album to vibe out to.... ≠ is Music. 

-Copyright Game Changer
Not Equal will be released under an atribution Share-Alike Creative Commons Copyright License... what the heck does that mean? Let me explain!
It's of my opinion that art is never finished and music is art. If you are a singer and would like to sing over top of something on this album and release it, please feel free. If you are a producer and would like to remix something on this album, Please do so freely! IF you are a band and want to cover something on this and record it? Go Right ahead! The copyright on this will allow you to remix, cover or elaborate on this body of work and make something new! All I ask is that you simply credit me then create something timeless and beautiful!

-You have already written the record, why the Indiegogo?
Well, I have spent countless hours writing and mixing this record with Producer Quinn Danielis (Death Cohen, Japain, Vibes)  who has done all of the mixing for absolutely free.
While the actual writing and mixing process has only cost me a few thousand dollars over the span of a year, Mastering and Packaging are upon me and that stuff costs a ton of dough! Being an avid vinyl collector I am going all out on this pressing!

-Perks and stuff
I have come up with some pretty fun perks that will help me achieve my goal and will put some neato exclusive stuff in your hands!
Everything in this Campaign will be exclusive to my pals who back it! So I will never re-print the tees, and never repress the album with this vinyl coloration format! There will also be a secret exclusive song on the Vinyl option which will never be on another pressing, it won't be on the digital download and I won't be uploading it online!


I know money can be tight these days, some of you are still in school or have kids or are a musician like me just trying to get by, so I have really tried to make a wide variety of perks that are reasonably priced to what they include. Even just sharing this campaign and helping me spread the word would mean more to me than you can imagine!

To save on costs, I will be hand packing and shipping all perks out to everyone, so expect some fun messages and things inside them! 
 

-Where's All This Dough Going?

Here is a rough breakdown of where this money is going to go! 
 

  1. Mastering                     $900
  2. Vinyl Manufacturing $3800
  3. T Shirt Printing           $300
  4. Sticker Printing          $150
  5. USB's                             $100        
  6. Total                               $5250
  7. Indie GOGO 5%          $262
  8. Credit Card 2%          $105
  9. Revised Total              $5617

- Track Listing
1: Slope 

2: Secaucus

3: Bay Bound

4: Freyja

5: One Is The Loneliest Number

6: Cottage

7: Dog Bowl

8: Sundial

9: But Home Is Somewhere (Vinyl OnlySecret Song)

 

If you are still reading, Thank you from the bottom of my heart for taking the time out of your day to go read through all of this and for your interest in supporting independent music! 

Stay beautiful my Friends!

George Thoms

story:
We are currently working on our debut album in Los Angeles (CA) w/ Charles "Kallaghan" Massabo (Falling In Reverse, Cry Venom, Davey Suicide) at the Kallaghan Studios!

We are ZE GRAN ZEFT, the Alternative Crunk Rock band from France, composed of BOOTS (Vocals/Guitar/Synths) SIDEMAN (Bass/Back Vocals/Synths) & THE KID (Drums/Back Vocal).

Our influences are : Nirvana, The Beastie Boys, Meshuggah, Daft Punk, Prince,  Thunderdome, Rage Against The Machine, Cypress Hill, Busta Rhymes, Shabba Ranks, Periphery, Serge Gainsbourg, Zapp

We've all been raised with Super Nintendo & Sega Genesis games, Arnold Schwarznegger & Dragon Ball Z! (Everybody tried this once in its life haha)

ZE GRAN ZEFT is the shape of the new punk that has come!

Listen to ZGZ, build your body and mind,

Love.
____________________________________________________________
ZE GRAN ZEFT ~ MMXVI ©
